description:
Currency Converter for more than 200 currencies with live exchange rates and offline mode. Setup your personal currency list and see all the important currencies at first glance.

• Supports all currencies of the world, some metals and cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, ...)
• Our exchange rates are updated once every second
• Offline mode: While offline, the app uses the data from the last connection
• Historic graphs: display the exchange rate development since 2011
• Search function to quickly find a currency


NOTE: Click the ‘All currencies’ button below your personal currency list to add a new currency.

description:
Transfer money abroad quickly, at great rates, straight from your phone. 

It’s as simple as tap, tap, send - fast and convenient for you and your family back home. 

With Taptap Send you enjoy:
• Fast remittances: normally within minutes!
• Safe & secure service: your card is protected by bank-level security and encryption.
• Great exchange rates: we negotiate rates every day to try and deliver great ones for you!
• No surprises: no hidden fees here. And if there’s a problem with your transfer, we’ll let you know as soon as possible.

We’re focused on giving you the best experience to send money internationally. And because our team is from the countries to which we send, we know how to make things as smooth and easy as possible for you.

SECURE
• Taptap Send is licensed in the UK, Canada, the US, the UAE and the EU for sending money
• PCI compliant -- we do not store your credit or debit card information
• We do NOT sell any of your personal information to ANY third parties

MOBILE MONEY, CASH PICKUP AND BANK TRANSFERS: Send money from your debit card or account (depending on your location) to your recipient’s wallet / account

LOCAL: Our teams are from the communities we serve and speak over 30 languages

OUR SUPPORT: We’re here to help. If you ever need us or have questions, please email us at support@taptapsend.com.

OUR MISSION: We started Taptap Send because we believe diaspora communities deserve to have someone fighting for them on their most important financial needs: first and foremost, the need to send money to friends and family. Too often, other companies have overlooked, over-charged and not treated these communities with the respect they deserve. We aim to change that, obsessively pursuing solutions to lower costs, reduce delays, and increase convenience.

Send from: GBP (British Pound), EUR (Euro), CAD (Canadian Dollar), USD (US Dollar), AED (Arab Emirates Dirham)

Send to one of the counties listed on our website: https://www.taptapsend.com/

We are not affiliated with Western Union, MoneyGram, Zepz (Worldremit or Sendwave), Remitly, Transferwise, Azimo, Small World or Ria.

developer.name: Taptap Send, Inc.
developer.legalAddress:
20 St Thomas St, London

description:
Save money effortlessly! Spendee is a FREE budget app and expense tracker loved by nearly 3,000,000 users worldwide. Track your expenses, optimize your budget, and gain full control over your finances.
Seeing all your financial habits in one place helps you stay on track, reach your savings goals, and be more mindful of your spending. With Spendee, you have a powerful budget app and expense tracker that makes managing money simple and effective!

💰 All Your Money in One Expense Tracker
Sync your bank accounts, e-wallets (e.g., PayPal), and crypto-wallets (e.g., Coinbase) with Spendee’s budget app and expense tracker. Monitor all your finances in real time and never lose track of where your money goes.
📈 Organize & Analyze Your Spending
The Spendee budget app and expense tracker automatically categorizes transactions and presents them in visually appealing graphs and insights. Get a clear breakdown of your financial health and make smarter budgeting decisions.
💸 Optimize Your Budget & Spending
Create personalized budgets for different categories and let Spendee’s budget app and expense tracker guide you to better money habits. Receive notifications to help you stay within budget and maintain positive cash flow.
👩‍🎓 Learn with Personal Finance Insights
Build financial awareness with Spendee’s intelligent insights. This budget app and expense tracker acts as your personal financial advisor, offering tips to help you save more and make better spending choices.

🔑 MORE BUDGET APP KEY FEATURES
✅ Budgets – Set spending limits and achieve financial goals with the best budget app and expense tracker.
✅ Wallets – Manage cash, bank accounts, and separate expenses for different occasions.
✅ Shared Finances – Share expense tracker with partners, roommates, or family members.
✅ Multiple Currencies – Manage international spending with ease.
✅ Labels – Categorize transactions for detailed spending analysis.
✅ Dark Mode – Enjoy a sleek, eye-friendly interface.
✅ Web Version – Access your budget app and expense tracker on a larger screen.
✅ Secure Data Sync – Keep your financial information safe and private.

🏆 AWARD-WINNING BUDGET APP DESIGN
Spendee’s intuitive budget app and expense tracker make financial management seamless. The more you use it, the more valuable insights you’ll gain—helping you track spending, compare trends, and make better financial choices.
Download Spendee today! Take charge of your finances with a budget app and expense tracker designed to help you save, plan, and build a better financial future.
📢 Follow Us:
📸 Instagram: @spendeeapp
📘 Facebook: Spendee
🐦 Twitter: @spendeeapp

description: PhonePe is a payments app that allows you to use BHIM UPI, your credit card & debit card or wallet to recharge your mobile phone, pay all your utility bills and to make instant payments at your favourite offline & online stores. You can also invest in mutual funds & buy insurance plans on PhonePe. Get Car & Bike Insurance on our app. Link your bank account on PhonePe and transfer money with BHIM UPI instantly! The PhonePe app is safe and secure, meets all your payment, investment, mutual funds, insurance & banking needs, and is much better than Internet banking. Things you can do on PhonePe (Phonepay) App: Money Transfer, UPI Payment, Bank Transfer - Money Transfer with BHIM UPI - Manage Multiple Bank Accounts– Check Account Balance, Save Beneficiaries across multiple bank accounts like SBI, HDFC, ICICI & 140+ banks. Make Online Payments - Make online payment on various shopping sites like Flipkart, Amazon, Myntra etc. - Pay for online food orders from Zomato, Swiggy etc. - Pay for online grocery orders from Bigbasket, Grofers etc. - Pay online for travel booking from Makemytrip, Goibibo etc. Make Offline Payments - Scan & Pay via QR Code at local stores like kirana, food, medicines etc. Buy/Renew Insurance Policies with PhonePe Insurance App Health & Term Life Insurance - Compare/Buy Health & Term life Insurance with monthly premiums - Coverage for individuals, senior citizens & families Car & Two Wheeler Insurance - Browse & get India’s most popular bike & car insurance - Buy/renew your car & bike Insurance in less than 10 minutes Other Insurance - PA Insurance: Insure yourself against accidents & disablement - Travel Insurance: Get international travel insurance for business & leisure trips - Shop Insurance: Insure your shop against fire, theft, natural calamities and burglaries. PhonePe Lending Get pre-approved personal loans ready to be disbursed into your bank account through seamless & digital loan onboarding journey. Attractive interest rates, easy repayment options & single click self serve modules are some of the salient features being offered. Repayment Period: 6 - 36 Months Interest Rate: Max 30% (Reducing) Example: Principal Amount: ₹100,000 Interest Rate: 15% p.a. (Reducing) Processing Fees: 2% Tenure: 12 Months Total interest amount payable: ₹8309.97 Total processing fee amount payable: ₹2000 Total cost to the user: ₹110,309.97 Mutual Funds & Investments App - Liquid Funds: Get higher returns than savings bank - Tax-Saving Funds: save up to ₹46,800 in tax & grow your investment - Super Funds: Achieve financial goals with expert help on our app - Equity Funds: High growth products curated as per risk appetite - Debt Funds: Get stable returns for investments without any lock-in period - Hybrid Funds: Get a balance of growth & stability - Buy or Sell 24K Pure Gold: Assured 24K purity, build gold savings on our app Recharge Mobile, DTH - Recharge Prepaid Mobile Numbers like Jio, Vodafone, Idea, Airtel etc. - Recharge DTH like Tata Sky, Airtel Direct, Sun Direct, Videocon etc. Bill Payment - Pay Credit Card Bills - Pay Landline Bills - Pay Electricity Bills - Pay Water Bills - Pay Gas Bills - Pay Broadband Bills Buy PhonePe Gift Cards - Buy a PhonePe Gift Card for easy payments across 1 lakh+ leading offline & online outlets and across the PhonePe app. Manage your refunds - Manage & track refunds from your favorite shopping websites on PhonePe. For more details, Visit www.phonepe.com Permissions for App and reasons SMS: to verify Phone number for registration Location: a requirement by NPCI for UPI transactions Contacts: for phone numbers to send money to and numbers to recharge Camera: to scan QR code Storage: to store scanned QR code Accounts: to pre-populate email ID while signing up Call: to detect single vs dual sim & let user choose Microphone: to carry out KYC video verification

description:
Your one stop place to find Shariah Compliant stocks using screening method approved by renowned scholars and islamic institutes.

IslamicStock app screening criteria.

The App lets you find halal stocks listed in Indian stock markets (NSE & BSE)

There are broadly six key criteria set by renowned scholars, which must be met so that a company’s shares may be considered sharia-compliant for investment. 

1.The Business
2.Income from non-sharia compliant investments
3.Interest-bearing debt to total assets
4.Illiquid assets to total assets ratio
5.Net liquid assets vs market capitalisation
6.Non compliant investment to Total Assets

The thought

Stock market is one of the best  place for investments. With the growing interest of people in stock market, there was a requirement to address the need of muslims by imparting education about Shariah principles of investing as well as providing a unique platform to assist them in finding compliant stocks for free. This led to the development of IslamicStock.

 Unique Feature

The Taqwa feature of our app is a unique concept that offers flexibility in screening the stocks according to one's Taqwa. This unique concept allows one to apply more strict Shariah screening as per his/her choice.

Salient features

Beautiful user friendly UI.
Create watchlists for tracking stocks.
Create portfolio to track your investments
Get real time alert of different unique strategies.
Save data on cloud.
Academy section to enhance ones knowledge of stock market.
summary: App lets you find halal stocks listed in Indian stock markets (NSE & BSE)
title: IslamicStock - Screener India

4. Can I invest in fixed deposits and mutual funds? Yes, you can easily open a fixed deposit account and invest in mutual funds directly through the app.

Download the Kotak811 App Today

Start your journey with Kotak811, one of the leading account opening app for modern banking. Whether you’re exploring 0 balance account opening bank options, looking for a fixed deposit account, or seeking a reliable UPI app, Kotak811 has you covered.

Open your zero balance account now and unlock a world of possibilities!

description:
Office Calculator is a calculator with a virtual tape. It supports commercial rounding, easy percentage calculation and does correct tax calculation.

Install it on your device and you get the optimal calculator for office tasks.

Virtual Tape

You can switch between calculator view and and tape view to have a full screen view of the tape. Just tap on the tape icon to switch between views. The tape of the calculator can have up to 1000 lines.

Corrections on the Tape Tape

You can change values on the virtual tape to make corrections. For corrections go to the context menu of the tape line with a long press.

Percentage Calculation

The calculator has percent calculation to add or subtract percent values. The tape will display the percentage and the resulting value.

Tax Calculation

The calculator has tax buttons (TX+, TX-) to add or sub tract tax (sales tax, VAT) This makes it very easy to calculate tax amounts with the calculator. The tape will display the tax rate and the resulting value.

Annotations on the Tape

You can write a comment to a tape line.

Fixed Point and Floating Point Calculation

The fixed point arithmetic has 20 digits and 0 - 4 decimal places. The floating point arithmetic has 64 bits (IEEE double precision). By default, the calculator works with fixed point arithmetic and 2 decimal places as needed for most calculations with amounts.

Rounding

The calculator supports three rounding modes: up, down or 5/4. This is the Pro variant of Office Calculator (without ads), a Free variant with ads is also available.

summary: Manage your mining farm on the go with CryptoTab Farm App
title: CryptoTab Farm: Digital Gold

extra.descriptionHTML:
CryptoTab Farm is the easiest way to earn your first BTC. All you need to get started is just your phone! With the app, you can easily manage your farm remotely via a handy dashboard. Continue mining wherever you are: at home, at work, or on vacation getting a constant profit. Withdraw any amount of your earnings with no commission at any time! Millions of users around the world are already earning with the powerful CryptoTab mining algorithm on their miners. Join them and provide yourself with a stable income in BTC!

Build your own crypto farm using idle computing power. Make any available computers work for you: connect them to the CryptoTab Farm app, install a high-performance miner on PC, and enjoy a lightning-fast income!

If you don’t have your own computer, you can use the Pool Miner feature. It gives you an opportunity to start building your own mining farm. You don’t have to install mining software on your own PC, you just need to have the app on your phone*.

*Please note that this app is not a mobile mining app. You don't use your smartphone processing power for mining if you have CryptoTab Farm mobile app installed.


Features:

● Handy dashboard;
● Unlimited number of miners;
● Pool Miners;
● Miner connection via a QR code;
● Remote control;
● Up-to-date statistics;
● Flexible schedule planner;
● Adjustable push notifications;
● Separate mining groups;
● Unlimited withdrawals;
● No withdrawal fee;
● BTC withdrawals from the mobile app at any time;
● Mining schedule for groups and individual miners;
● Unique CryptoTab mining algorithm.

Easy, fast, efficient! Start mining – make all available computers a source of a real and steady income in BTC!

✅ Earn even with one computer, start now and get your share of BTC! Or build a powerful mining farm: сonnect an unlimited number of computers – Windows or macOS – and gain profit 24/7 no matter where you are.

✅ Start earning without installing mining software on your own PC. Use the Pool Miner feature: choose a preferred configuration, define a miner working period, manage the process with the same powerful dashboard, and get profit.

✅ You can easily control the entire farm or a single miner with a full-fledged dashboard: track performance and your income, adjust settings, manage mining speed, view statistics, add and regroup miners.

✅ Start mining with your computer first and connect it to your farm later via a QR code. Use our simple instructions and add the miner to your dashboard any time you want.

✅ Manage your miners with a simple and easy-to-use app. We offer a clear and user-friendly interface that even a beginner can handle. As for professionals and experienced users, they will appreciate the wide and well-thought-out options for configuring the farm.

✅ Use the scheduler to set the mining speed (computer load) for specific hours or days for individual miners and entire groups to achieve better results. Monitor everything that happens on your farm remotely. For example, enable mining during assigned hours or schedule work in your absence.

✅ Get notified of important announcements and changes. You can adjust notification settings and receive them based on their importance or reason. Select which farm activities you want to receive push notifications of, and turn them on.

✅ With us, your income is under reliable protection. Once logged in, you will never lose access to your farm and earnings. Withdraw your funds with no limitations anytime, even on the first day of mining.

description:
With our app, you can easily pay bills, recharge your mobile, make gas payments, and more, all in one convenient place.

Our app offers a variety of features, including multiple color themes, so you can personalize your experience and make it your own. With the ability to add multiple beneficiaries, managing your accounts and making transactions has never been easier.

You can also access your accounts balance, and statements all through our app. Our DTH recharge feature allows you to recharge your TV with ease, and our bank-to-bank money transfer feature makes sending money to friends and family a breeze.

Our app is designed with security in mind, so you can rest assured that your personal and financial information is protected. Plus, with our user-friendly interface, you’ll find it easy to navigate and use.

Note-
To protect user privacy and security, we do not expose sensitive data, such as names, account numbers, or other personal information. End users will see personalized content relevant to their accounts, generated dynamically and not repetitively. The attached screenshots are provided with testing data.

Download our banking app today and experience the convenience of having all your financial needs in one place.

description:
Airtel Thanks App puts the whole Airtel world on your mobile! Enjoy a hassle-free experience while making your everyday payments - prepaid mobile recharge, DTH recharge, postpaid mobile bill payment, broadband bill payment, FASTag recharge, and utility bill payments. Experience 30x faster speed with Airtel 5G Plus. Track your data usage balance, missed calls while out of network, and much more. Scan any QR code to send and receive money via your UPI ID and online wallet. Check out financial services like personal loans, insurance, and free credit card in the shop section (only for Indian citizens). Get the best entertainment with a free subscription to OTT platforms like Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+ Hotstar, and Xstream.

Prepaid Mobile Recharge

Recharge your prepaid number for talk time, 5G data, and more. Tap on recharge and select prepaid Enter the recharge number and select operator Choose a prepaid recharge plan for your mobile Complete the payment for your online phone recharge Add and manage your family’s mobile recharge on the app Tap on add an existing connection Select mobile and enter prepaid recharge number Put the OTP and the number will be added Get mobile recharge reminders for all added sim connections

Postpaid Bill Payment

Get a new Airtel postpaid connection on the app Never miss a bill payment with postpaid recharge Activate auto-pay for regular bill payments Add and manage multiple postpaid connections

DTH Recharge

Use Airtel app as your go-to DTH TV recharge app! Head to the ‘pay bills’ section in the app Tap on DTH Recharge Enter your DTH recharge account number Select a DTH TV recharge plan from the list & pay your DTH bill online

Broadband Bill Payment

Recharge your broadband connection online Check broadband data balance View various airtel broadband recharge plans Add and manage multiple fiber connections & wifi recharges on the app

UPI Payment

Airtel UPI allows you to send & receive money from one bank account to another instantly Scan any QR code for UPI bill payments Pay to any UPI ID from Airtel Thanks Link your bank account to UPI ID Use the UPI payment feature to pay online for mobile recharge, utility bill payments, and more Check bank balance for accounts linked to Airtel UPI Do safe and secure online transactions with the Airtel UPI payment

Call Manager

Get real-time missed call alerts when not latched to the network Block unwanted numbers and report spam calls

Online Bill Payment

Electricity, Water, Book Cylinder, Piped Gas, school fees and other utility online bill payments are exclusively available on app Open the app and tap on pay bills Explore the available online bill payment utilities. Select a utility bill payment (electricity, water, piped gas, and more) Choose an operator and enter customer ID Review and make online payment

Check Data Usage

Keep a check on your mobile data usage on the app Check MB data balance for prepaid and postpaid sim numbers

Airtel Payments Bank & Online Wallet

Open an account with just a video call and get up to 6% interest rate p.a. Invest the smart way with DigiGold, fixed deposits, mutual funds & more. Pay with Airtel UPI and money wallet to avail cashback offers & more

Financial Services

Get Personal loans with complete digital process, instant disbursal and flexible repayment options from Airtel. Lending Partner: Axis Bank, DMI Finance, Moneyview, Credit Saisson Minimum period of repayment = 3 months Maximum period of repayment = 60 months Privacy Policy: https://www.airtel.in/finance/personal-loan/privacy-policy Financial services is only available for Indian citizens having valid Aadhaar and PAN Card. Download the app Now!

description: Yono Lite SBI is Mobile Banking Smart Phone application for SBI Customers in English, Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, Marathi, Gujarati, Punjabi, Bengali, Odia, Assamese, and Kashmiri languages. Yono Lite is SBI’s retail internet banking-based application for your smartphones. A safe, convenient, and easy to use application with a host of features to help users manage your finances on the move. Please complete the one-time registration process to start using the application. New Registration process: - A message will be shown on the screen regarding initiating an SMS to +917208871299 from the mobile device for validating user's mobile number. Users has to send this app generated encrypted SMS manually. Users have an option to retry sending SMS to an alternate number 8422833333. - Click on ‘Proceed’ button and an SMS containing a unique code will be sent from the device to a predefined number. Kindly note that for sending SMS will incur standard SMS charges as per your telecom SMS plan. - On registration screen, please enter Username and Password and click REGISTER button. - Accept the Terms & Conditions for registration by selecting the check box and click ‘Ok’ button. - An activation code will be sent to the registered mobile number. User has to complete the activation by inputting the Activation code in the app. - User can now login to Yono Lite application. Features: My Accounts • Detailed account information (Transaction / Deposit /Loan / PPF / SSA accounts) • Mini Statement (Last 10 transactions) • mPassbook (upto 150 transactions) • View /Download statement • eStatement Subscription • PPF Accounts Fund Transfer • Funds Transfer within Self Accounts • Third Party Transfer within SBI • Inter-Bank Transfer (RTGS / NEFT /IMPS) • Quick Transfer to Unregistered Beneficiaries using QR Code • IMPS Transfer (using IFSC & Account Number or Mobile Number & MMID) • Transfer to mobile number or email id using mCash • Schedule Transactions • Add / Manage Beneficiary eDeposits • Open Fixed Deposit • Open Recurring Deposit • Open Multi option deposit UPI • Fund Transfer to Unregistered beneficiaries through beneficiary VPA • Fund Transfer to registered beneficiaries using Account No & IFSC code • Dispute Status • Set UPI transaction limit within overall daily limit • Enable/ Disable UPI Manage Cards • Physical Debit Cards • Virtual Debit Cards • Prepaid Cards Bill / Merchant Payments • Pay Bills • SBI Life Premium • Credit Card (VISA) Transfer • Bill Payment History SBI Voice Assist • Voice assisted functionality to know Balance, mini-statement, Mobile & DTH recharge and Quick Transfer using voice instructions Top-up and Recharge options are available under 'Bill Payments' Menu • Mobile Recharge • DTH Recharge • Top-up of State Bank Prepaid Cards • Google Pay Recharge Code • Gift Voucher Requests • IPO • Get MMID • Cancel MMID • Cheque book • Positive Pay System • TDS Enquiry Services • Standing Instruction • Online Nomination • Submit 15 GH • Transfer of Savings account • eLocker • My Certificates Facility of QR based Cash withdrawal from ATMs. - User can withdraw cash by scanning the QR displayed on ATM screen through Yono Lite app. Quick Transfer and Donations • Send Money using Account Details • Donations Facility of Yono Cash for Card less cash withdrawal through ATMs Prelogin • Bhim SBI Pay • Bharat QR • FasTag • SBI Collect • Donations to Religious Entities • Bharat Bill Pay • SBI Finder • Complaints • Lock/Unlock User ID • Apply for Loan • FAQs • Ask SIA • Branch/ATM • Cyber Crime Helpline • Transit Cards • Complaints of Unauthorized Transactions

description:
Simple for beginners and effective for technical analysis experts, TradingView has all of the instruments for publication and the viewing of trading ideas. Real-time quotes and charts are available for wherever you are at whatever time.

At TradingView, all data is obtained by professional providers who have direct and extensive access to stock quotes, futures, popular indices, Forex, Bitcoin and CFDs.

You can effectively track stock market and major global indices such as the NASDAQ Composite, S&P 500 (SPX), NYSE, Dow Jones (DJI), DAX, FTSE 100, NIKKEI 225, etc. You can also learn more about exchange rates, oil prices, mutual funds, bonds, ETFs and other commodities.

TradingView is the most active social network for traders and investors. Connect with millions of traders from around the world, learn from the experiences of other investors and discuss trading ideas.

Advanced Charts
TradingView has excellent charts that surpass even desktop trading platforms in quality.
No compromises. All of the features, settings and tools of our charts will also be available in our app version. Over 10 types of charts for market analysis from different angles. Starting with an elementary chart line and ending with Renko and Kagi charts, which focus heavily on price fluctuations and barely take time into account as a factor. They can be very useful for determining long-term trends and can help you earn money.

Choose from a large selection of price analysis tools, including, but not limited to, indicators, strategies, drawing objects (i.e. Gann, Elliot Wave, moving averages) and more.

Individual watchlists and alerts
You can track major global indices, stocks, currency pairs, bonds, futures, mutual funds, commodities and cryptocurrencies all in real-time.

Alerts will help you not to miss the smallest of changes in the market and will allow you to react in time to invest or sell profitably, increasing your overall profit.

Flexible settings help you to track the indices you need and also group them in a way that is convenient for you.

Syncing your accounts
All saved changes, notifications, charts, and technical analysis, which you began on the TradingView platform will be automatically accessible from your mobile device through the app.

Real-time data from global exchanges
Gain access to data in real-time on more than 100,000 instruments from over 50 exchanges from the United States, the East, and countries in Asia and Europe, such as: NYSE, LSE, TSE, SSE, HKEx, Euronext, TSX, SZSE, FWB, SIX, ASX, KRX, NASDAQ, JSE, Bolsa de Madrid, TWSE, BM&F/B3 and many others!

Commodity prices
In real-time, you can track prices for gold, silver, oil, natural gas, cotton, sugar, wheat, corn, and many other products.

Global indices
Track major indices of the world stock market in real-time:
■ North and South America: Dow Jones, S&P 500, NYSE, NASDAQ Composite, SmallCap 2000, NASDAQ 100, Merval, Bovespa, RUSSELL 2000, IPC, IPSA;
■ Europe: CAC 40, FTSE MIB, IBEX 35, ATX, BEL 20, DAX, BSE Sofia, PX, РТС;
■ Asian-Pacific Ocean Regions: NIKKEI 225, SENSEX, NIFTY, SHANGHAI COMPOSITE, S&P/ASX 200, HANG SENG, KOSPI, KLCI, NZSE 50;
■ Africa: Kenya NSE 20, Semdex, Moroccan All Shares, South Africa 40; and
■ Middle East: EGX 30, Amman SE General, Kuwait Main, TA 25.

Cryptocurrency
Get the opportunity to compare prices from leading cryptocurrency exchanges.

Westerville, OH

description:
[The one of best tools for keeping accounts, efficiently tracking each expense report]

[ Support iOS and Android ]

This is the Ad-free edition of AndroMoney. The functions on both edition are the same.  If you are happy with free edition there is no need to upgrade to pro edition. We hope this app can help you to manage your expense and money easily !

If you install the pro version, the free version would remove all Ads. If you don't like the pro version style. You still can enjoy the free version without any ads .

Data from AndroMoney to AndroMoney Pro
AndroMoney:
Menu =>Export/Import =>Backup Database=>SD

AndroMoney Pro:
Menu=>Export/Import =>Import From AndroMoney=>SD

AndroMoney is a personal finance tool for use on your mobile phone. By using this tool, we hope you can better manage your wealth.
 
We focus on:
1.Ease of use: keep it intuitive to operate
2.Powerful:daily accounting, managing categories, or even drawing detail reports, AndroMoney can easily manage it.

As this App's name suggests, we hope AndroMoney will be the best personal finance tool on Android! If you have any problems about how to use it or ideas about how to improve it, feel free to email us. We appreciate your feedback!

features
- Multiple accounts and support account balance & account transfer
- Cloud Storage (Dropbox , Google Docs)
- SYNC with other devices 
- Any currency with downloadable rates
- Number pad with calculation
- Hierarchical categories with custom attributes
- Simple/ Detail / Custom Budgets
- Trend, Pie and Bar charts for Expense and Cash Flow
- Password Protection
- Overview your expense and income summary
- Back up data to Excel/ Mac Number

Manage your expense and money easily !

If you have problem please e-mail to us! 
service@andromoney.com
Thank you!

Thanks for recommendation of Shady Al Aref Bellah :
https://nazzam.com/easily-track-expenses

Special thank to 
Mario Lüthy for German translation.
Mike Kazonis for Greek translation.
Jean Marie for French translation.
Елена Трифонова for Russia translation.
Alessio Salerno and Carlo Pite for Italian translation.

description:
Welcome to Beyond Budget! Our comprehensive personal finance management app is here to revolutionize the way you manage, track, and plan your financial life. We offer a one-stop solution, encompassing everything from budgeting and expense tracking to financial insights and forecasting. Learn more with our built-in Knowledge Hub, a repository of educational articles and tips to elevate your financial literacy. Take the stress out of money management with Beyond Budget!

# Feature:

- Budgeting & Expense Tracking: Our robust budgeting feature allows you to categorize your spending down to the last penny. Navigate daily, weekly, bi-monthly, monthly, or annual expenses with ease.

- Debt Management: Our tools help you create a clear roadmap to become debt-free. Set a monthly repayment goal and get a visual representation of your progress.

- Savings Goals: Set precise savings targets, whether you're saving for a dream holiday, a new car, or building a retirement nest egg. Your financial dreams are achievable with Beyond Budget.

- Income Tracking & Allocation: Track your income effectively and allocate it efficiently using our income tracking and allocation features.

- Advanced Forecasting: Our forecasting tool uses your data to predict future balances, helping you plan and prepare for upcoming expenses.

- Reminders: Never miss a payment or exceed a budget again with our customizable reminders.

- Financial Calculators & Projections: Use our built-in calculators to project savings growth, retirement readiness, loan payoffs, and more.

- Insights: Get valuable insights into your spending habits, savings progress, and financial trends with our comprehensive analytics.

- Tags & Payees: Our tagging feature makes tracking expenses simple. Identify where your money is going by tagging expenses to specific payees.

- Family Group: Share budgets, track joint expenses, and work towards common financial goals with your family using our family group feature.

- Intuitive UI: Our user-friendly interface is designed to simplify personal finance management. Navigating your financial world has never been easier.

- Multiple Accounts: Manage all your accounts in one place - checking, savings, credit cards, and more.

- Achievements & Rewards: Celebrate your personal finance milestones with our achievement badges, motivating you on your journey to financial freedom.

- Knowledge Hub: Access a collection of educational resources, articles, and tips designed to boost your financial understanding and inspire smarter money habits.

Use Beyond Budget to manage, track, or plan your financial life:
- Budget planner
- Detailed budgeting tool
- Personal budget tracker
- Income and budget allocation
- Advanced budget forecasting
- Budget-friendly reminders
- Savings goals within budget
- Debt management strategy
- Financial calculators for budgeting
- Budget insights & trends
- Family budgeting in groups
- Multiple budget account management
- Achievements & rewards for budget goals
- Knowledge hub for budget literacy
- Comprehensive budget guide
- Tools for financial freedom within budget

Beyond Budget is more than just a budgeting app. It's a comprehensive personal finance guide, supporting you in managing your finances, reducing debt, building wealth, and achieving financial freedom. With its user-friendly interface, powerful tools, and insightful analytics, Beyond Budget is the ultimate app for budgeteers ready to take charge of their financial life.

Embark on your personal finance journey with Beyond Budget today. You're beyond awesome, and with Beyond Budget, you can be beyond financially secure too.

description:
Spaid: Pay Rent & Education Fees via Credit Card!

Spaid is the fastest, most secure, and hassle-free way to pay rent, education fees, and professional services using your credit card. Whether you want to pay rent via credit card or pay education fees using your credit card, Spaid makes it easy while offering up to 50 days of interest-free credit and rewards on every transaction.

With Spaid, you can send money directly to a bank account to pay for rent, tuition, and professional services—quickly, securely, and efficiently. Download Spaid today and make smarter, more rewarding payments!

🚀 Why Choose Spaid?
Spaid is your go-to app for seamless credit card payments. Whether it’s for monthly rent, school tuition, or professional fees, Spaid helps you maximize your credit card benefits, maintain cash flow, and earn cashback with every transaction.

🔹 Top Features & Benefits

💳 Pay Rent via Credit Card – Fast, Secure & Low Fees
Easily transfer rent directly to your landlord's bank account without hassle.
Low 1.3% transaction fee – More affordable than other platforms.
Earn reward points & cashback while paying your rent.
Avoid cash flow issues – Use your credit card to manage rent payments conveniently.
🎓 Pay Education Fees via Credit Card – School, College & Tuition Fees
Pay school fees, college tuition, and coaching fees seamlessly.
Leverage your credit card's interest-free period to manage education costs better.
Ensure uninterrupted learning by making timely tuition fee payments without financial stress.
💰 Earn Cashback & Rewards on Every Payment
Get Spaid Tickets on every transaction, which can be converted into real cashback.
Save money on rent and education payments with one of the best cashback programs available.
🔒 Fast, Secure & Reliable Payments
Direct bank transfers from your credit card, ensuring smooth transactions.
Pay with Any Credit Card 
Use Visa, MasterCard, or RuPay cards to pay rent, tuition fees & professional services.
Bank-level encryption for 100% safe & secure payments.
Instant processing – No delays, no complications.
🏦 More Than Just Rent & Tuition Payments
Spaid isn’t just for rent and education fees! You can also use it to:
✔ Pay society maintenance & housing deposits
✔ Settle professional service payments (freelancers, consultants, etc.)
✔ Handle utility bills (electricity, water, gas, etc.)

📌 How to Get Started?
1️⃣ Download Spaid from the Google Play Store.
2️⃣ Securely add your credit card (Visa, MasterCard, RuPay & more).
3️⃣ Authenticate with Aadhaar & card details for security.
4️⃣ Start paying rent, education fees, and professional services instantly!

🔒 Why Millions Trust Spaid?
✔ Seamless Rent Payments – Pay rent directly from your credit card with minimal fees.
✔ Hassle-Free Education Fee Payments – Tuition and school fee payments made easy.
✔ Advanced Security – Bank-level encryption ensures all transactions are safe.
✔ Cashback & Rewards – Convert Spaid Tickets into real money and maximize your savings.
✔ From the makers of SuperPe – Trusted by millions for seamless credit card payments.

📲 Download Spaid Today & Take Full Advantage of Your Credit Card!
Make smarter payments for rent, tuition fees, and professional services while earning cashback & rewards. Download Spaid now and manage your payments effortlessly! 🚀

description: Bank Balance Checker & Enquiry, the ultimate banking app that revolutionizes the way you manage your finances. Take control of your bank accounts with ease, check balances effortlessly, and unlock a world of convenient banking services all in one place. Experience banking like never before with our sleek and feature-packed app. 🌟 Check Balance: Simplified Banking at Your Fingertips Say goodbye to the hassle of visiting multiple banking apps or websites. With All Bank Passbook - Statement, you can effortlessly check the balance of all your bank accounts in one central hub. Enjoy the convenience of instant balance updates anytime, anywhere. 💰 Money Transfer Made Effortless Experience the power of seamless money transfers with Check Balance: All Bank Balance. Utilize our USSD banking feature to send money to any mobile number or make lightning-fast UPI payments. Explore the versatility of net banking, enabling you to transfer funds using the popular IMPS and NEFT platforms. 📱 Mobile Banking Redefined Empower yourself with our cutting-edge mobile banking capabilities. Access USSD banking to send and receive money, review account balances, dive into transaction details, and effortlessly update your profile information. Embrace the future of mobile payments with our secure and convenient mobile payment options. 🔍 Locate ATMs and Branches with Ease Never find yourself stranded without cash or clueless about nearby branches again. description:
In today’s complex financial landscape, managing loans can be a challenging endeavor. Whether you’re considering a mortgage, an auto loan, or financing for education, having a reliable tool to help you understand and plan your loan repayments is essential. This is where Loan Cash-EMI Calculator steps in, offering you a seamless, secure, and user-friendly solution to take control of your financial journey.

What Makes Loan Cash-EMI Calculator Unique:
1. Precision EMI Calculation
At the core of Loan Cash-EMI Calculator is its ability to provide highly accurate calculations for your Equated Monthly Installments (EMIs). By inputting just a few key details—such as the loan amount, interest rate, and loan duration—the app quickly delivers a precise EMI figure. It handles a wide variety of loan types, whether they are short-term or long-term, and whether the interest rate is fixed or variable. This ensures you have a clear and detailed understanding of your repayment schedule.

2. Comprehensive EMI History
Loan planning often involves exploring multiple scenarios and making adjustments. Loan Cash-EMI Calculator keeps a detailed record of all your past calculations. This history feature allows you to easily review previous computations, compare different loan scenarios, and make informed decisions based on a thorough analysis of your financial options.

3. Comparative Loan Analysis
Choosing the right loan from various financial institutions can be a daunting task due to differences in interest rates, terms, and repayment structures. Loan Cash-EMI Calculator simplifies this process with its comparative analysis tool. You can input details of multiple loan offers and visually compare their EMIs and total interest costs. This feature empowers you to identify the most cost-effective loan option, ensuring you make the best financial choice for your needs.

4. Loan Affordability Insights
Before committing to a loan, it’s crucial to assess your financial capacity. Loan Cash-EMI Calculator offers a Loan Affordability Analysis feature that evaluates your income, expenses, and existing debts to determine the maximum loan amount you can comfortably afford. This proactive approach helps you avoid overextending your finances and maintains your financial stability.

With its focus on security and user experience, Loan Cash-EMI Calculator is the ideal tool for anyone looking to manage their loans effectively. Download Loan Cash-EMI Calculator today and take the first step towards smarter financial planning. Simplify your loan calculations and ensure your financial future is secure.

Contact Us:
Panorama Financial Services (P) Ltd
Sir Rnm House 5Th Floor Block 2 3B Lalbazar Street Kolkata West Bengal 700001

description:
IndiaPay Application is used for AEPS, Bill Payments, Domestic Money Remittance, Recharges and many more services through agent assisted model. IndiaPay is the most advanced financial transaction platform and money transfer and withdrawal more efficient and reliable.
The best way to go digital. We are delivering 4 major services in this IndiaPay application.

1. AEPS -
Aadhaar Enabled Payment System (AEPS) was launched to empower a bank customer to use Aadhaar as his/her identity to access their Aadhaar enabled bank account. Using AEPS the bank account holder can perform basic banking transactions like cash withdrawal, and Balance Enquiry System also can get mini statements of bank account.

2. DMT -
Domestic Money Transfer. Money Transfer allows you to send money instantly 24 x 7 x 365 to any IMPS supported banks in India. A receiver will get the money credited into their bank account within 5 -10 seconds.

3. BBPS -
Bharat Bill Payment System (BBPS) is an integrated bill payment system in India offering interoperable and accessible bill payment service to customers through a network of agents of the registered member as Agent Institutions (AI), enabling multiple payment modes, and providing instant confirmation of payment.

4. RECHARGE -
Instantly add credit to your prepaid phone for seamless calls, texts, and data usage. Conveniently top up anytime, anywhere to stay connected on the go

description:
Welcome to the ledger program

In addition to ease of use, this program provides you with:
1- Recording your debts and debts that you or you owe.
2- Completing aggregate accounts automatically.
3- A group of reports that save you effort and time
4- Share accounts via Bluetooth or social networking sites.
5- A search/order function that enables quick and easy access.
6- The feature of exporting and importing the database.

Add amount:
 By clicking on the Add Amount (+) button:
The Add Process screen will appear:
Enter the name (if it is new) or choose the name from the list that will appear after printing the first letter of the name.
You can also specify the date of the operation by clicking on the date which has today's date as the default value.
After clicking on the Save button, the added history will appear where you can click and hold, to show you the edit and delete button.

Account closing:
This feature enables you to delete all records of transactions registered for any name and collect them in one transaction that contains the final balance.
Click on the name in the main menu. On the details page, click on the Settings button and then on the “Close Balance” option.

Reports:
The ledger contains a set of analytical reports that save you effort and time.
You can access the reports by clicking on the Settings button on the main page.

search:
You can search for (word, date, amount) or part of it. You can employ the search feature to filter the data, for example, you can get the operations of the month of February only by entering the text "2016-02" in the search box.

Ranking:
This feature enables you to redisplay the data in the desired order by clicking on the column name. One click will be in ascending order and the other in descending order.

Delete/modify data:
Long clicking on the name or any specific process that allows you to edit or delete. By clicking on the edit or delete icon at the top of the screen.

Database Protection (Backup):
If your device is lost or damaged, God forbid.... What should be done?
It is very important to keep a backup copy of your data from time to time.
From the main menu there is an option to "save a backup copy", which enables you to share the database via Bluetooth, social networking programs or e-mail.
On the other hand, there is an option "Restore Database" which enables you to restore a previously saved copy.
Note: It is always better to make a backup copy before restoring.

developer.name: Abdullah Abdulrahman
developer.legalAddress: Sana’a - Yemen

description:
Quid is an AI-powered loan marketplace and aggregator (personal loan app) that connects you with RBI-approved banks & NBFCs to get a business or personal loan. Trusted by 3 Mn+ users, every student, salaried, self-employed & business owner can complete the online personal loan application process in just 59 seconds! With the Quid personal loan app, get loan offers from verified lenders with 100% transparency, no hidden charges, low interest rates & fast loan approval. Now, you can make utility bill payments, all in one app.

Quid Personal Loan App Features:

* Quick Application: Apply in just 59 seconds
* 100% Digital: Easy online loan application with minimal documents
* Personal Loan Matchmaker: Tailored personal loan offers from verified lenders
* Trusted Platform: Personal loans from RBI-approved banks & NBFCs
* Fast Loan Approval: Disbursal that won’t take months
* Low Interest Rates: Get competitive interest rates
* Credit Card: Apply to get exclusive benefits
* Loan Tenure: 3-60 months
* Easy EMI: Flexible EMI options
* Collateral-free: Zero assets at stake
* Bill Payments & Recharges: Pay your utility bills with ease (Upcoming feature)

Use the Quid Personal Loan App for: 

* Home Renovation Loan: Upgrade your home with our personal loan app
* Medical Loan: Cover medical expenses with a personal loan
* Pre-owned Vehicle Loan: Fund your pre-owned vehicle purchase
* Travel Loan: Explore new places with a personal loan
* Wedding Loan: Fund your dream wedding with a personal loan
* Shopping Loan: Buy your desired products with a personal loan 
* Education Loan: Finance your education with the Quid personal loan app
* Consumer Durable Loan: Buy home appliances with a personal loan

Repayment Timelines, APR and Transparent Processing Fees & GST:

* Interest rates start from 1% to 3% per month, corresponding to a maximum APR of 12% to 36%*
* The repayment tenure ranges from 3-60 months
* Processing fees will be charged separately as applicable by the lending partner

Eligibility:

* Age: 18-55 years
* Eligible: Salaried, self-employed & students
* Nationality: Indian 

Personal Loan Example:

Loan amount: ₹1,50,000
Interest rate: 13% minimum
Repayment tenure: 1 year
Processing fee of 2%: ₹3,000 + GST = ₹3,540
Loan EMI: ₹13,398
The total interest: ₹10,771
Loan repayment amount after 1 year: ₹1,60,771
The maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR) can go up to 36%*

*Note: These figures are for illustrative purposes only. The final interest rate and APR are subject to the customer’s credit assessment, as evaluated by Quid's Lending Partner(s).

Documents for a Business or Personal Loan:

* Identify Proof: Aadhar card, PAN card, Driver’s license, Passport, Voter ID card
* Address Proof: Aadhar card, Utility bills, Voter ID card, Passport
* Income Proof: Bank account statement, Salary slip (for salaried individuals)

How to Apply for a Personal Loan:

➡️ Download the Quid personal loan app
➡️ Sign-up with mobile/email
➡️ Enter details (personal/professional/business)
➡️ Specify your loan requirements
➡️ Submit your personal loan application
➡️ Choose from our verified lenders

Our RBI-registered NBFC Partners:

* Bhanix Finance and Investment Limited - https://bhanixfinance.com/ourpartners.html - (CIN No. U65910MH1996PLC300645)

* mPokket Financial Services Private Limited - https://www.mpokket.in/lsp-dla - (CIN No. U65999WB2019PTC233120)

* Arham Finance & Investment Services Limited - https://arhamfinance.com/sourcingPartner - (CIN No.U74899DL1992PLC050484)

Contact Us:

For any queries, get in touch with us at support@quid.money
summary: Personal loan app: Get fast personal loans with low rates and quick approval.

description:
Trust Wallet is a multi-chain self-custody cryptocurrency wallet and secure gateway to thousands of Web3 decentralized applications (dApps).

Trust Wallet is already “trusted” and used by 200 million people, and is the easiest way to store, send and receive digital assets, manage your NFT collection, explore DeFi, GameFi, and the metaverse. 

As a secure self-custody crypto wallet, Trust Wallet allows you to take complete control of your crypto assets. That means no one can freeze your funds, halt your withdrawals, or take your funds without your permission.

Trust Wallet supports 10+ million digital assets, non-fungible tokens (NFTs), 100+ blockchains, and allows you to connect safely to thousands of Web3 dApps.

So what can you do with dApps?
Swap coins and tokens across different blockchains, explore and manage your favorite NFT collections, earn rewards on your crypto, play popular Web3 games, access the metaverse, and everything in between. 

With the Trust Wallet Mobile App, you get:

A SECURE SELF-CUSTODY CRYPTO WALLET
Instantly turn your mobile device into a powerful self-custody Web3 wallet and gateway to thousands of dApps. Trust Wallet also supports WalletConnect v2.
With a self-custody wallet like Trust Wallet, you’re always in complete control of your digital assets. Use the app as your bitcoin wallet, NFT wallet, or crypto wallet for millions of assets.

INDUSTRY-LEADING SECURITY
Secure login and built-in security features that prevent unauthorized access to your assets.

Your private keys are safely stored on your device and are strongly encrypted with an AES algorithm. Also, we do not collect any contact information or personal details.

MULTI-CHAIN FUNCTIONALITY & THE LARGEST TOKEN SUPPORT
Trust Wallet supports 100+ blockchains, and 10+ million assets including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), (XRP) XRP, Cardano (ADA), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), BNB (BNB), Polygon (MATIC), Avalanche (AVAX), zkEVM, zkSync Era, and more. 

Manage NFTs from different blockchains easily in one place

THE MOST EASY-TO-USE CRYPTO WALLET
Helpful integrations like Coinbase Pay and Binance Pay to deposit crypto seamlessly from your exchange account in just a few clicks.
Leverage our integrated tax feature, which is an optional tool for those who want to report their taxes without the usual complexity of manually adding transactions and wallets.

Take advantage of our dApp browser and “plug and play” network auto-detect feature, which makes connecting to dApps across different blockchains quick and easy.

ADVANCED FEATURES FOR CRYPTO TECHIES
Dive into more advanced features (if you consider yourself a crypto techie) like adding custom tokens and adjusting your node settings.
Use “watch addresses” to monitor all your crypto wallets in one place.

A WALLET USED BY 200 MILLION PEOPLE
Trust Wallet is used by over 200 million people worldwide and supports multiple languages.
Securely store, send and receive crypto from family and friends, or your exchange account.

Ready to turn your mobile device into your go-to Bitcoin Wallet, NFT Wallet, and crypto wallet for thousands of other digital assets?

If you’re already a Trust Wallet Browser Extension user, you can quickly import your wallet to move between mobile and desktop seamlessly — and if you’re new to Trust Wallet, we’ll help you get started quickly and securely.

Join 200 million people who already trust our Wallet  — get Trust Wallet today!

Trust Wallet is built with, and for our community. Have an idea, want to share feedback, or need support? Reach out to us here: support@trustwallet.com and follow us on Twitter: @TrustWallet
summary: Trust Wallet is a self-custody crypto wallet trusted by 200 million people.

Looking for an easy way to calculate your loan EMIs? The Instant Loan EMI Calculator app is the perfect tool for you! Whether you're planning to take out a personal loan, home loan, car loan, or any other type of loan, our app allows you to quickly and accurately calculate your monthly EMIs in just a few seconds.

Key Features:
Instant EMI Calculation: Get immediate loan EMI results with just a few inputs – loan amount, tenure, and interest rate.
Multiple Loan Types: Calculate EMI for all types of loans – personal loan, home loan, car loan, education loan, and more!
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and easy-to-use design ensures a hassle-free experience for all users.
Customizable Parameters: Adjust loan amount, interest rate, and loan tenure to see how different factors affect your monthly payments.
Accurate Results: Get precise and reliable EMI calculations based on current financial formulas and algorithms.

Whether you are planning a big purchase or simply want to manage your finances better, the Instant Loan EMI Calculator app is your one-stop solution. Download now and start making smarter financial decisions today!

description:
FundsMama is a company that helps people in India get loans quickly and easily. If you need money for everyday expenses or an emergency, FundsMama can help you out. They have a simple process and you meet our eligibility criteria and submit requisite documents loan amount to your bank account within 30 minutes final of approval.
There are many reasons to choose FundsMama for your loan needs. They offer a safe and secure digital platform to borrow money, and you don't need collateral to get a loan. Plus, they can help you with multiple unexpected expenses at once.
To apply for a loan with FundsMama, you need to be an Indian resident who is at least 21 years old and has a savings bank account. You also need to have a decent CIBIL score. You'll need to fill out an application form and provide some documents, like your PAN card, bank statements, and salary slips.
WHY CHOOSE US?
1) UNSECURED PERSONAL LOAN:
In the recent covid scenario we offer a safe secure
digital platform to borrow quick money for emergency situations.
Eligibility is based on your creditworthiness and no collateral is required. We provide advance salary
loans for emergencies when you don’t have a financial backup or enough cash to meet unforeseen expenses/losses.
2)EASY FAST REDRESSAL
Secure and fast loan disbursal process is our forte. You don’t have to worry about the long and heavy Documentation/waiting process for getting a loan. Just a quick upload of required documents digitally would suffice and upon scanning, we approve and transfer your loan in 15 minutes.
3)FLEXIBLE
We can help you meet more than one unexpected expenses at a time; be it home/vehicle repair, medical bills, housing, utilities, wedding or other family emergencies. We have an easy go to application process without any upfront fees or charge.
Disclaimer: The interest rates could be higher compared to other long-term loans. We give only advance salary loans to Indian residents.
Application Process:
1) SHARE DETAILS: Fill out the easy loan approval form online. Your information is safe and secure with us. Be rest assured.
2) QUICK SCAN: Upon upload of the required documents we do a quick run through and verification via our fintech system.
Our software technology is a secure accredited system that is manually updated by our team. 
We do not allow for any misuse of your personal information and adhere strict rules and procedures in the company.
3) SAVE THE DAY TOGETHER: We shall inform over a phone call or email if any discrepancy occurs during loan approval process.
4) LOAN DISBURSAL IN 3O MINUTES: Once all is clear,
We transfer the loan amount securely to your bank account on the same day of the application process!
Eligibility
1)Indian resident
2)Salaried Employee/Business
Owner/Self Employed
3)Above 21 years of age
4)Savings Bank Account Holder
5)Decent CIBIL Score
Documentation:

title: FundsMama - Instant Loan App

extra.descriptionHTML:
FundsMama is a company that helps people in India get loans quickly and easily. If you need money for everyday expenses or an emergency, FundsMama can help you out. They have a simple process and you meet our eligibility criteria and submit requisite documents loan amount to your bank account within 30 minutes final of approval.
There are many reasons to choose FundsMama for your loan needs. They offer a safe and secure digital platform to borrow money, and you don't need collateral to get a loan. Plus, they can help you with multiple unexpected expenses at once.
To apply for a loan with FundsMama, you need to be an Indian resident who is at least 21 years old and has a savings bank account. You also need to have a decent CIBIL score. You'll need to fill out an application form and provide some documents, like your PAN card, bank statements, and salary slips.
WHY CHOOSE US?
1) UNSECURED PERSONAL LOAN:
In the recent covid scenario we offer a safe secure
digital platform to borrow quick money for emergency situations.
Eligibility is based on your creditworthiness and no collateral is required. We provide advance salary
loans for emergencies when you don’t have a financial backup or enough cash to meet unforeseen expenses/losses.
2)EASY FAST REDRESSAL
Secure and fast loan disbursal process is our forte. You don’t have to worry about the long and heavy Documentation/waiting process for getting a loan. Just a quick upload of required documents digitally would suffice and upon scanning, we approve and transfer your loan in 15 minutes.
3)FLEXIBLE
We can help you meet more than one unexpected expenses at a time; be it home/vehicle repair, medical bills, housing, utilities, wedding or other family emergencies. We have an easy go to application process without any upfront fees or charge.
Disclaimer: The interest rates could be higher compared to other long-term loans. We give only advance salary loans to Indian residents.
Application Process:
1) SHARE DETAILS: Fill out the easy loan approval form online. Your information is safe and secure with us. Be rest assured.
2) QUICK SCAN: Upon upload of the required documents we do a quick run through and verification via our fintech system.
Our software technology is a secure accredited system that is manually updated by our team.
We do not allow for any misuse of your personal information and adhere strict rules and procedures in the company.
3) SAVE THE DAY TOGETHER: We shall inform over a phone call or email if any discrepancy occurs during loan approval process.
4) LOAN DISBURSAL IN 3O MINUTES: Once all is clear,
We transfer the loan amount securely to your bank account on the same day of the application process!
Eligibility
1)Indian resident
2)Salaried Employee/Business
Owner/Self Employed
3)Above 21 years of age
4)Savings Bank Account Holder

description: PLANET by L&T Finance is your trusted companion for instant and secure financial solutions. Boasting over 30 years of trust, it is a reliable loan app that takes the hassle out of traditional borrowing. From instant secure loans for personal goals to specialized options like farm loans and business loans online, this finance app offers everything you need in a single place. For personal loans, business loans, or home loans, PLANET provides a wide range of options for you to avail on its user-friendly interface. So take charge of your finances and enjoy the convenience of competitive rates, minimal documentation, and fast approvals. Comprehensive Online Secure Loan Services Under One App The range of loan options makes PLANET the best online loan app available for you: ● Low Rate Personal Loans: Avail loans with low-cost EMI plans, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayments. ● Two-wheeler Loans: Finance your dream two-wheeler in just a few clicks. ● Home Loans: Make your dream home yours with instantaneous approvals and competitive rates. ● SME Loans: Avail curated SME loans for professionals, including online business loans, doctor loans, CA loans, professional loans, and CS loans. ● Farmer Loans: Give your farm the best resources with special farmer and farm loans from PLANET. With offerings like tractor loans and seed loans, get curated agricultural finance solutions. ● Micro Loan: Boost your business with micro-loans for small financing needs, including rural loans, group loans, women's loans, and more. ● Loan Against Property: Utilise your property to get the funds you need with LAP offerings from PLANET. With your property as collateral, get loans at attractive rates and fund all your personal or business financial needs. Unique Features that Make PLANET by L&T Finance Stand Out ✅ Quick Approvals and Fast Disbursals: Get instant secure loans with disbursals in just 5 minutes on this online cash loan app. ✅ Minimal Documentation: Apply for loans without any excessive documentation, ensuring faster approvals. ✅ Manage Loans Easily: Access your transaction history, EMI schedules, and loan statements. ✅ Flexible Loan Repayment Tenures: Easy repayments on low-rate instant loans with manageable EMIs on this personal and business loans app. ✅ Secure and Multilingual Interface: All online loan transactions are protected with MPIN and biometric logins. Combined with a multilingual interface, this is one of the best instant loan apps and financial service apps. ✅ Versatile Payment Options: Repay with debit cards, BHIM UPI, wallets, or net banking. Get Started in Just 7 Steps 1️⃣ Download and open PLANET 2️⃣ Allow the app to access your location and perform a credit assessment 3️⃣ Choose your preferred language 4️⃣ Create your account with your mobile number, verifying it with an OTP. 5️⃣ Set a 4-digit PIN to keep your app secure. 6️⃣ Provide location access for better offers localized to you. 7️⃣ Start exploring the many loan offers and services tailored to your eligibility. Highlights of Our Online Personal Loan Services ● Finance Amount: ₹50,000 to ₹25Lakh ● Repayment Tenure: 12 to 60 months ● Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 10.5% to 26% reducing ● Processing Fees: 0% to 3% For example: ● Loan Amount: ₹ 10,00,000/- ● Interest Rates: 12% p.a. on a reducing basis ● Tenure: 48 months ● Processing Fee (PF): 2% (₹ 20,000/-) In this case, the actual loan details will be: ● Net disbursement amount - ₹9,80,000/- (Loan amount – PF) ● Estimated EMI: ₹ 26,445/- If you have opted for any insurance product, the value of such an insurance product will be added to the loan and the EMI will increase accordingly. Fee & charges information: https://www.ltfs.com/our-products/personal-loans/fees Privacy Policy URL - https://www.ltfs.com/privacy-policy PLANET by L&T Finance - your go-to financial service app for NBFC loans. For feedback or queries, reach out at ltfs-mobileapp@ltfs.com. T&C Apply.

title: L&T Finance PLANET - Loan App

extra.descriptionHTML:
PLANET by L&T Finance is your trusted companion for instant and secure financial solutions. Boasting over 30 years of trust, it is a reliable loan app that takes the hassle out of traditional borrowing. From instant secure loans for personal goals to specialized options like farm loans and business loans online, this finance app offers everything you need in a single place. For personal loans, business loans, or home loans, PLANET provides a wide range of options for you to avail on its user-friendly interface. So take charge of your finances and enjoy the convenience of competitive rates, minimal documentation, and fast approvals.

Comprehensive Online Secure Loan Services Under One App
The range of loan options makes PLANET the best online loan app available for you:
● Low Rate Personal Loans: Avail loans with low-cost EMI plans, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayments.
● Two-wheeler Loans: Finance your dream two-wheeler in just a few clicks.
● Home Loans: Make your dream home yours with instantaneous approvals and competitive rates.
● SME Loans: Avail curated SME loans for professionals, including online business loans, doctor loans, CA loans, professional loans, and CS loans.
● Farmer Loans: Give your farm the best resources with special farmer and farm loans from PLANET. With offerings like tractor loans and seed loans, get curated agricultural finance solutions.
● Micro Loan: Boost your business with micro-loans for small financing needs, including rural loans, group loans, women's loans, and more.
● Loan Against Property: Utilise your property to get the funds you need with LAP offerings from PLANET. With your property as collateral, get loans at attractive rates and fund all your personal or business financial needs.

Unique Features that Make PLANET by L&T Finance Stand Out

✅ Quick Approvals and Fast Disbursals: Get instant secure loans with disbursals in just 5 minutes on this online cash loan app.
✅ Minimal Documentation: Apply for loans without any excessive documentation, ensuring faster approvals.
✅ Manage Loans Easily: Access your transaction history, EMI schedules, and loan statements.
✅ Flexible Loan Repayment Tenures: Easy repayments on low-rate instant loans with manageable EMIs on this personal and business loans app.
✅ Secure and Multilingual Interface: All online loan transactions are protected with MPIN and biometric logins. Combined with a multilingual interface, this is one of the best instant loan apps and financial service apps.
✅ Versatile Payment Options: Repay with debit cards, BHIM UPI, wallets, or net banking.

Get Started in Just 7 Steps
1️⃣ Download and open PLANET
2️⃣ Allow the app to access your location and perform a credit assessment
3️⃣ Choose your preferred language
4️⃣ Create your account with your mobile number, verifying it with an OTP.
5️⃣ Set a 4-digit PIN to keep your app secure.
6️⃣ Provide location access for better offers localized to you.
7️⃣ Start exploring the many loan offers and services tailored to your eligibility.

Highlights of Our Online Personal Loan Services

● Finance Amount: ₹50,000 to ₹25Lakh
● Repayment Tenure: 12 to 60 months
● Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 10.5% to 26% reducing
● Processing Fees: 0% to 3%

For example:
● Loan Amount: ₹ 10,00,000/-
● Interest Rates: 12% p.a. on a reducing basis
● Tenure: 48 months
● Processing Fee (PF): 2% (₹ 20,000/-)
In this case, the actual loan details will be:
● Net disbursement amount - ₹9,80,000/- (Loan amount – PF)
● Estimated EMI: ₹ 26,445/-
If you have opted for any insurance product, the value of such an insurance product will be added to the loan and the EMI will increase accordingly.
Fee & charges information: https://www.ltfs.com/our-products/personal-loans/fees
Privacy Policy URL - https://www.ltfs.com/privacy-policy

PLANET by L&T Finance - your go-to financial service app for NBFC loans.

For feedback or queries, reach out at ltfs-mobileapp@ltfs.com.
T&C Apply.

Receive payments from all UPI Apps, Rupay Cards & Paytm Wallet Print or order a QR code & display it next to the cash counter or a prominent place in the shop to show the code and collect payments. summary: Accept Digital Payments at 0% fee with India's most trusted payment platforms.
title: Paytm for Business

extra.descriptionHTML:
More than 10 Million businesses trust Paytm for their payments

Accept Payments Everywhere

Paytm for Business app is the fastest & easiest way to collect payments from customers. If you are a merchant, run a small business, a startup, a freelancer, a shop or a delivery service; then accept payments for your business from millions of Paytm customers.

All Payment Methods Accepted

Accept payments using any UPI app, Debit/Credit Card, Net-banking & Paytm Wallet. merchants can also accept payments from mobile number, QR code or card machine

Request Money through Payment Link

Create payment links on Paytm for Business app & collect payments over chat or email with Payment Links.

Accept Payments with All-In-One QR Code

Get Paytm All-In-One QR Code & start accepting payments for your store. Receive payments from all UPI Apps, Rupay Cards & Paytm Wallet

Print or order a QR code & display it next to the cash counter or a prominent place in the shop to show the code and collect payments.

Track Payments Real-time

Get notified via SMS & push notification every time you receive payments. Check all merchant payments and transactions, initiate refunds, see bank transfers, get useful insights & watch your business grow all within one app!

Instant Bank Settlements

Select the frequency of the settlements or manually settle the amount yourself & get money in your preferred bank account!

Door to Door Shipping: We have tie-ups with major courier partners & assure on-time delivery across the country.

Business Loans
Avail unsecured loans upto Rs 10,00,000 with tenure of 3 to 36 month. Simple and digital loan journey, apply at your convenience without any paperwork. There are no prepayment charges and you can use multiple repayment modes. Loans can be availed by new credit customers at an attractive APR from 15% to 46%. E.g. loan amount of Rs 10,000 @18% rate of interest for 3 months and 2%PF, total interest payable will be Rs 301, and PF of Rs 200 + GST will be applicable.

Our partners are (NBFC):
- Clix Capital Services Private Limited - https://www.clix.capital/our-partners/
- SMFG India Credit Company Limited (Formerly known as Fullerton India Credit Company Limited) - https://www.smfgindiacredit.com/digital-lending-partner.aspx?tab=partner_details
- Piramal Capital and Housing Finance Limited - https://www.piramalfinance.com/about-us/lending-partners
- Aditya Birla Finance Limited - https://personalfinance.adityabirlacapital.com/pages/individual/platform-partners.aspx

All loans are subject to T&C (sample): Read Here

Personal Loans
Important: Paytm for Business is a facilitator between you and the lending partner.
Get Loan amount starting from 10K to 2.5 lac
Repay loan within 3-60 months
Annual percentage rate (APR) (per annum monthly reducing): 10.5-48%
Loan Processing fee: 0- 6%
Please Note: Personal Loans are only available to Indian citizens within the territory of India
Lending partners (NBFC):
- Aditya Birla Finance Limited - https://personalfinance.adityabirlacapital.com/pages/individual/platform-partners.aspx
- Clix Capital Services Private Limited - https://www.clix.capital/our-partners/
- Hero Fincorp Limited - https://www.herofincorp.com/partners

Loan amount: 100000, Interest 23%, Processing fee 4.25%, Tenure 18
Loan processing fee: Rs.4250
Stamp duty charges: applicable as per law
EMI per month: Rs.6621
Total interest: Rs.19178
Disbursal amount: Rs.94785
Amount Payable: Rs.119186

description:
Want to shop online on no-cost installments but don't have a credit card? Get a credit line on debit card/UPI from Snapmint.  Buy now, pay later in EMIs!
Snapmint gives you access to buy on credit across 1000+ electronics, fashion, and lifestyle brands. Your dream mobile, headphone, sports shoe, watch or TV is now a reality. Just buy today with some down payment and you can pay later in easy monthly installments. You can also avail of no-cost EMI options on a lot of products. You can also purchase products from top online and offline stores like Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra, Shopper’s Stop, Kaya and 800+ merchants and payback in easy EMIs.
Why should you choose Snapmint?
•	Shop online on installment. No credit card required
•	No cost EMI available 
•	0 Downpayment plans available
•	No Preclosure fee
•	Choose from a wide range of products and top brands across lifestyle, electronics, and appliances
•	Affordable and friendly payment terms
•	100% online application process
•	No application fees
•	Secure and convenient payments
How can you get started?
• Register on Snapmint App
• Get your Credit Limit
• Shop Online/Offline 
• Pay Later in Instalments

Who can get a Snapmint Credit Limit?
• Age 18 or older
• PAN Number required

Personal Loan is available for Premium Customers
Snapmint allows its premium customers making advance or on-time payments an opportunity to take a Personal Loan of up to Rs. 40,000. The loan tenures can vary from 3 – 12 months with a maximum annual percentage rate (APR) of 35%. APR ranges from 16% - 35%.
For example
Principal Amount: Rs.40,000, Processing Fees (charged upfront): Rs. 1,800, Tenure: 5 months, Interest Rate : 34%, Monthly Payment/EMI: Rs. 8,694. Interest Amount: Rs. 3,470, Total repayment amount: Rs. 43,470

description:
PNB ONE is an amalgamation of various banking processes being delivered through single platform.  PNB ONE mobile banking app  is an all in one application which allows you to transfer funds, view account statement, invest in term deposits,  manage debit card & credit card and many other exclusive services at your fingertips.
Note:-  PNB ONE is official mobile banking application of Punjab National Bank. This application provides access to PNB banking services across all operators.
Services Available / Features of PNB ONE Mobile Banking App.
Interactive Interface:-
•	Redesigned dashboard with more features available on the dashboard.
•	Access all the accounts on the dashboard itself.

Accounts:-
•	All accounts will be displayed in illustrative manner. ( Savings, Deposits, Loan, Overdraft, Current).
•	Detailed view of account statement.
•	Check Balances.
 
Transfer Funds:-
Regular Transfers
•	“Self” (for own accounts), “Within” (for PNB accounts) & “Other” (for non-pnb accounts) will be there.
•	NEFT/IMPS/UPI for Interbank fund transfers.
Instant Transfers (without adding beneficiary).
•	IMPS using MMID.
•	Quick Transfer without adding beneficiary.
Indo- Nepal Remittance.
 
Invest funds:-
•	Open a term deposit account.
•	Mutual Funds.
•	Insurance.
 
Transactions:-
•	My transactions will display all the recent transactions.
•	My Favorite Payee will show list of recent payees.
•	Schedule a transaction.
•	Recurring transactions.

Safe and secure:-
•	Sign in much faster and simpler with your fingerprint.
•	2 factor authentication.
•	Encryption.

Manage Debit Card:-
•	Apply for a new card.
•	Update limits of ATM withdrawal, POS/ E-Comm transaction.
•	Hotlist debit card.

Manage Credit Card:-
•	Link/De link Credit Card.
•	Auto Payment Registration.
•	Auto Payment De-Registration.
•	Change card limit.
•	Statement on e-mail.
•	Damaged card replacement.

Unified Payment Interface (UPI):-
•	Send/ Collect money through UPI.
•	Transaction History.
•	Complaint Management.
•	User Deregistration.

Scan & Pay (BHARAT QR):-
•	Make Payment by scanning QR directly.
•	Link your cards once and make the payment directly from the account.

Pay Bills/Recharge:-
•	Register your biller pertaining to Mutual find, Insurance, Telecom, Electricity, DTH, credit card etc.
•	Pay bills directly to your registered biller.

Languages:-
•	Available in English and Hindi.

Cheques:-
•	Inquire Cheque Status.
•	Stop Cheque.
•	Request for Cheque book.
•	View Cheque.

M-Passbook:-
•	View account statement of account.
•	Download account statement in PDF for offline purposes.

Favourites:-
•	Customer can add/delete most frequently used functionalities as favourite.

Value Added Services:-
•	PAN/ Aadhar Registration.
•	E-mail ID Updation.
•	E statement registration.
•	E-statement de registration.
•	MMID( used for IMPS).
•	Last 10 SMS.

Complaint Service Management:-
•	Raise a complaint/ Service Request.
•	Track your request.
•	Request history..
summary: Punjab National Bank's official mobile banking application.
