• Register your biller pertaining to Mutual find, Insurance, Telecom, Electricity, DTH, credit card etc.
• Pay bills directly to your registered biller.

Languages:-
• Available in English and Hindi.

Cheques:-
• Inquire Cheque Status.
• Stop Cheque.
• Request for Cheque book.
• View Cheque.

M-Passbook:-
• View account statement of account.
• Download account statement in PDF for offline purposes.

Favourites:-
• Customer can add/delete most frequently used functionalities as favourite.

Value Added Services:-
• PAN/ Aadhar Registration.
• E-mail ID Updation.
• E statement registration.
• E-statement de registration.
• MMID( used for IMPS).
• Last 10 SMS.

Complaint Service Management:-
• Raise a complaint/ Service Request.
• Track your request.
• Request history..

description:
Set Sail! From the smallest Satoshi to a full Bitcoin—no technical expertise required. Join us and embark on a new journey into the blockchain world.
Why rely on expensive hardware or worry about complex technical terms? With our cloud solution, you can easily start your Bitcoin mining journey.
No mining on your phone. We do not use your device for mining—our remote servers handle the computing power. Simply choose the cloud mining configuration you want, and watch your Bitcoin balance grow in your built-in wallet. You can even start with our free cloud mining option to easily experience the mining process.
Experience the Cutting Edge of the Digital World
Say goodbye to cumbersome Proof-of-Work (PoW) algorithms, high electricity costs, and complex hardware setups. Our platform handles core processes like network difficulty, Bitcoin halving, and mining pool management, allowing you to focus on expanding your digital assets.
With cloud GPUs and ASICs, there’s no need to install or maintain equipment locally. Your earnings will be securely stored in your built-in Bitcoin wallet, and when you’re ready, you can easily transfer them to a personal wallet, exchange, or other Bitcoin-compatible addresses.
Key Features
	1	On-Demand Bitcoin Cloud Mining Choose the mining power you need, and we will activate the appropriate cloud GPU or ASIC to help you continuously earn Bitcoin. We adjust dynamically based on network computing power, Bitcoin prices, and hardware availability to provide a mining experience that aligns with market trends.
	2	Intuitive Cloud Platform Easily get started in just a few steps and monitor your online mining resources. Track your Bitcoin balance growth in real-time on your built-in wallet page. No professional knowledge required—just curiosity and enthusiasm for the digital age.
	3	Secure and Reliable We employ advanced encryption and robust server architecture to protect your data and transactions. Your mining earnings are fully protected while stored on the platform.
	4	Transparent Model Whether it's service fees or contract costs, we make everything clear, so you're always aware of the costs involved in the mining process—no hidden charges.
Disclaimer
	1	No Guaranteed Returns We do not guarantee a specific amount of Bitcoin, nor do we promise any fixed returns. The actual mining output you receive may fluctuate due to market conditions, network difficulty, and other uncontrollable factors.
	2	Potential Costs While you don’t need to manage hardware directly, the mining process may involve electricity, maintenance fees, and hardware wear and tear. These costs are factored into our pricing and may vary depending on the subscription plan.
	3	Market and Regulatory Risks Cryptocurrency prices are highly volatile. Past performance does not guarantee future results. You must fully understand the risks and comply with local laws and regulations regarding the legality of cloud mining. Risk is borne by you.
	4	Not Investment Advice All information provided on this platform is for educational and reference purposes only. We do not offer financial, legal, or investment advice. If you have concerns about risks or regulatory compliance, please consult a professional.
	5	User Responsibility Users must understand and comply with the laws and regulations of their jurisdiction before using this service. We are not liable for any indirect or direct losses incurred through the use of this platform.
	6	Right to Modify Services We reserve the right to adjust, modify, or terminate services (including mining configurations and fee structures) based on operational needs, market conditions, or regulatory guidelines.

Privacy Policy: https://bitcoinlucky.xyz/#/pages/privacy/index
summary: Bitcoin mining NFT,mining BTC on cloud mining,miner Btc on blockchain

description:
As you can understand from the name, you can follow the customer and the suppliers with this application.

The amount paid is for one time only and includes all updates and adjustments

It is very simple to use, the size of the application itself is really small.

Application Properties

If you are using the customer and supplier add-on phone, you can choose from contact list.

You can use different units together by adding currencies like TL-USD-EU.

You can make a call from the list as the phone numbers of the connected persons are registered.

You can see the total payments and debts that can list payments and debts at the desired date range.

You can share the payment and debt sheet of the quote in PDF format. You can share the PDF file with your customers via instant mail.

You can set a password for the application

You can choose application color from 4 different colors.

You can backup the database and install it on other devices when needed. You can set up the database for automatic backup for the forgetting situation.

You can store your backup database instantly via Mail and share it with another device via Bluetooth.

If you are looking (credit tracking, customer tracking, supplier tracking, current follow-up, debt collection, account book, budget tracking, debt book, current account)

For any questions or comments, please contact info@renklikodlar.net and memisibram@gmail.com.



New features
1 Stock section opened (Products can be purchased with purchase price and picture)
2 Cash status opened (You can track the total amount of borrowing and postpaid amount in the warehouse at different time intervals)
3 Google Drive can be backed up when the database is set up directly and automatically (Restore only with paid version)
4 Added section for adding person description
5 The price and explanation for the payments are made selectable from the products in the stock
6 The image attachable feature is enabled for Payments (You can add a picture or payment receipt for the submitted product)
7 Automatic borrowing was done (With this option, elevator repairers can owe fixed customers and fixed customers at automatic fixed price every month)
8 Settings update check was made (new version check can be done from within this application)

corrections
1 Fixed invisibility of pop-up windows with Android 7
2 The Application Could not be detected on some devices, causing the application to stop
3 Full-screen ad will show 50% less than previous impression after first impression

developer.name: Mehmet Ibrahim
developer.legalAddress: memisibram@gmail.com

description:
Money Manager - the #1 financial planning, review, expense tracking, and personal asset management app for Android!

Money Manager makes managing personal finances as easy as pie! Now easily record your personal and business financial transactions, generate spending reports, review your daily, weekly and monthly financial data and manage your assets with Money Manager's spending tracker and budget planner.

* Applying double entry bookkeeping accounting system
Money Manager facilitates efficient asset management and accounting. It does not just record your money coming in and out of your account but deposits your money into your account as soon as your income is input and draws money from your account as soon as your expense is input.

* Budget and expense management function 
Money Manager shows your budget and expenses by a graph so you can see the amount of your expense against your budget quickly and make suitable financial inferences

* Credit / Debit Card management function 
Entering a settlement date, you can see the payment amount and outstanding payment at the asset tab. You can arrange the automatic debit by simply connecting your debit card with your account.

* Passcode 
You can check passcode so you can safely manage your financial review account book with Money Manager

* Transfer, direct debit and recurrence function 
Transfer between assets is possible, which makes your personal and business asset management more efficient. In addition, you can manage you a salary, insurance, term deposit and loan more easily by setting automatic transfer and recurrence.

* Instant statistics 
Based on the data entered, you can instantly see your expense by category and changes between each month. And you can see the change of your assets and income/expense indicated by a graph as well.

* Bookmark function 
You can easily input your frequent expenses all at once by bookmarking them.

* Backup / Restore
You can make and view backup files in Excel file and backup/restore is possible.

* Other functions
- Change of starting date
- Calculator function (Amount > upper right button)
- Sub Category ON-OFF function

* Paid version *
- No Ads.
- Unlimited Assets (In the free version, limited to 15.)
- Edit PC (http://youtu.be/5S4S3EQ3AZE)

You can view ‘“Money Manager” application using Wi-Fi. You can edit and sort the data by date, category or account group on the screen of your PC. In addition, you can see fluctuations of your accounts indicated on graphs on your PC.

So, what are you waiting for? Download Money Money right now and start managing, tracking, and planning your budget, expenses and personal finances!

developer.name: Realbyte Inc.
developer.legalAddress: 2210-ho, 397, Seocho-daero, Seocho-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea

description: The Bajaj Finserv App is trusted by 50 million+ customers across India for their financial and payment needs. Using this app, you can apply online for a set of loans including personal loan, home loan, gold loan, professional loan etc, and fulfil your requirements. You can shop offline from 1 million+ products on Easy EMIs, invest in FDs, get insurance & do much more. You can also easily pay all your utility bills, recharge your mobile, DTH services & transfer money using BHIM UPI. Instant Personal Loan App ● Get instant personal loans up to ₹55 Lakh with this loan app. ● Doctors & Chartered Accountants can get funding via professional loans. ● Self-employed individuals can get affordable business loans. Highlights of Personal Loan ✔️ Loan Amount: ₹20,000 to ₹55 Lakh ✔️ Repayment Tenure: 6 to 96 months ✔️ Rate of Interest: 10% to 31% ✔️ Processing Fees: Up to 3.93% of the loan amount (inclusive of applicable taxes) Example: For a loan of ₹1,00,000 at an interest rate of 15% per annum for 12 months resulting in ₹8,310 interest amount (interest rate on a reducing balance method), with a processing fee of 3.93% (₹3,930) and other charges of ₹100, the total amount to be repaid after a year is approximately ₹1,12,340. Note: This is an estimate; the actual interest rate and processing fees may vary depending on the product. Shop on Easy EMIs ● Shop from 1 million+ products at 1.5 lakh+ stores across India. ● From electronics to sports equipment to smartphones to furniture - shop everything on Easy EMIs. ● Shop genuine products from top brands with exciting offers and discounts. Recharge & Bill Payments in One Place ● Pay all your utility bills such as water, LPG, electricity, etc. online using the Bajaj Finserv app. ● Recharge your mobile numbers, DTH & FASTag from leading providers. ● Instantly pay fees towards education, clubs & associations, housing societies, etc. ● Earn exciting cashback when you pay using Bajaj Pay UPI & use it for future bill payments. Payments Simplified with BHIM UPI App ● Create your unique Bajaj Pay UPI ID, enjoy UPI offers & send/receive money, or pay bills by scanning any QR code & authorize your UPI payments by entering the UPI PIN. ● Add money to your Bajaj Pay Wallet & make payments in seconds. Invest with Ease in Fixed Deposits ● Get high ROI on fresh FDs and renewal of existing FDs. ● Enjoy special rates on Digital FD through the app. ● You can start investing in FD online for just ₹15,000 and get a loan against it. ● Secure your savings with high-yield FD. Mutual Funds for Everyone ● Invest in Mutual Funds with as low as ₹100 with this Top Mutual Fund App. ● You can invest in any Mutual Fund via monthly SIPs or pay a lumpsum. ● Pay monthly mutual fund investment via UPI. ● Make the most of your investment by paying 0% distributor commission. Insurance for Every Need ● The Bajaj Finserv app offers 300+ plans for Health Insurance, Motor Insurance, Pocket Insurance, and more. ● Getting insurance is even easier with a 100% digital process. One App for All Needs ● Fulfill your shopping and travel needs on one platform with 100+ brand partners. Features ● Find all your financial transactions in one place ● Calculate your EMIs for your preferred tenure using the EMI Calculator ● Check your CIBIL score and get the credit health report online ● Download your loan account statements ● Get quick assistance & timely resolution for your queries Contact Us: Bajaj Finserv- Off Pune-Ahmednagar Road, Vimannagar, Pune-411014
summary: BHIM UPI, Fixed Deposit, Personal Loan, Credit Card, Pay Bill, Wallet, Insurance
title: Bajaj Finserv: Loans, UPI & FD

extra.descriptionHTML:
The Bajaj Finserv App is trusted by 50 million+ customers across India for their financial and payment needs. Using this app, you can apply online for a set of loans including personal loan, home loan, gold loan, professional loan etc, and fulfil your requirements. You can shop offline from 1 million+ products on Easy EMIs, invest in FDs, get insurance & do much more. You can also easily pay all your utility bills, recharge your mobile, DTH services & transfer money using BHIM UPI.

Instant Personal Loan App
● Get instant personal loans up to ₹55 Lakh with this loan app.
● Doctors & Chartered Accountants can get funding via professional loans.
● Self-employed individuals can get affordable business loans.

Highlights of Personal Loan
✔️ Loan Amount: ₹20,000 to ₹55 Lakh
✔️ Repayment Tenure: 6 to 96 months
✔️ Rate of Interest: 10% to 31%
✔️ Processing Fees: Up to 3.93% of the loan amount (inclusive of applicable taxes)

Example: For a loan of ₹1,00,000 at an interest rate of 15% per annum for 12 months resulting in ₹8,310 interest amount (interest rate on a reducing balance method), with a processing fee of 3.93% (₹3,930) and other charges of ₹100, the total amount to be repaid after a year is approximately ₹1,12,340.
Note: This is an estimate; the actual interest rate and processing fees may vary depending on the product.

Shop on Easy EMIs
● Shop from 1 million+ products at 1.5 lakh+ stores across India.
● From electronics to sports equipment to smartphones to furniture - shop everything on Easy EMIs.
● Shop genuine products from top brands with exciting offers and discounts.

Recharge & Bill Payments in One Place
● Pay all your utility bills such as water, LPG, electricity, etc. online using the Bajaj Finserv app.
● Recharge your mobile numbers, DTH & FASTag from leading providers.
● Instantly pay fees towards education, clubs & associations, housing societies, etc.
● Earn exciting cashback when you pay using Bajaj Pay UPI & use it for future bill payments.

Payments Simplified with BHIM UPI App
● Create your unique Bajaj Pay UPI ID, enjoy UPI offers & send/receive money, or pay bills by scanning any QR code & authorize your UPI payments by entering the UPI PIN.
● Add money to your Bajaj Pay Wallet & make payments in seconds.

Invest with Ease in Fixed Deposits
● Get high ROI on fresh FDs and renewal of existing FDs.
● Enjoy special rates on Digital FD through the app.
● You can start investing in FD online for just ₹15,000 and get a loan against it.
● Secure your savings with high-yield FD.

Mutual Funds for Everyone
● Invest in Mutual Funds with as low as ₹100 with this Top Mutual Fund App.
● You can invest in any Mutual Fund via monthly SIPs or pay a lumpsum.
● Pay monthly mutual fund investment via UPI.
● Make the most of your investment by paying 0% distributor commission.

Insurance for Every Need
● The Bajaj Finserv app offers 300+ plans for Health Insurance, Motor Insurance, Pocket Insurance, and more.
● Getting insurance is even easier with a 100% digital process.

One App for All Needs
● Fulfill your shopping and travel needs on one platform with 100+ brand partners.

Features
● Find all your financial transactions in one place
● Calculate your EMIs for your preferred tenure using the EMI Calculator
● Check your CIBIL score and get the credit health report online
● Download your loan account statements
● Get quick assistance & timely resolution for your queries

Contact Us:
Bajaj Finserv- Off Pune-Ahmednagar Road, Vimannagar, Pune-411014

description:
IL TakeCare

Your personalised all-insurance app for a simplified life with a stress-free future.

Being prepared with the right insurance will help you cope with any uncertainty in life. “Nibhaye Vaade” is a deep-rooted culture in ICICI Lombard’s IL TakeCare online insurance app. With just a few taps, explore bike insurance, health insurance, home insurance, and travel insurance, along with fitness and wellness options. Easily buy insurance online for all your insurance needs

How does IL TakeCare app make your life easier?

Car Insurance & Bike Insurance

Get comprehensive car insurance and bike insurance policy in minutes. Buy insurance online or renew insurance policy with a few taps. Our motor insurance extends to EV bikes. Enjoy the convenience of online insurance and a hassle-free experience for vehicle insurance.

Health Insurance

Buy health insurance online for yourself or a family medical insurance in our app. Beyond medical insurance policy, we offer valuable health assistance features. Add your Mediclaim policy to the medical insurance app to get 24/7 access to online consultations from your home.

Travel Insurance

Worried about the unexpected on your adventure? Get ready with our comprehensive trip insurance on our user-friendly travel insurance app. Avail benefits like medical assistance, baggage loss coverage, and passport theft protection on our online travel insurance options.

Home and Property Insurance

Our home insurance app makes it easy to buy home insurance online and secure your most valuable asset. Our property insurance protects you against unforeseen events like fire and special perils, burglary, and more. Manage your home insurance policy, and easily file a claim.

Wellness App and Fitness Tracker

Alongside managing your insurance policies, our insurance app seamlessly integrates with your fitness tracker and set personalized wellness goals. This wellness app empowers you to take control of your health and make informed decisions for a brighter future.

Features & Benefits

  • Quick & Easy Claims - Our insurance app allows you to register your health insurance policy. Submit directly through the app & motor claims easily.
  • Online policy renewal - Manage your entire insurance portfolio: car, health, travel, and more - all within the app. Renewing existing policies or purchasing new ones takes just a few taps.
  • Wellness and Fitness Tracker - Track your diet, exercise, sleep, and step count with our health services app.
  • Cashless Hospitals Network - Search from a wide hospital network based on current location, city, pin code and specialty-wise. Find the care you need fast!
  • Online Doctor’s Consultation - Talk to a doctor anytime & get prescriptions online.
  • Cashless Garage Network - Bike and car insurance policyholders can access a comprehensive list of cashless garages through the app.
  • InstaSpect - Fast claims, easy process! Use the mobile app's self-inspection feature for car & bike claims to record a video of your vehicle without the need for physical inspection.
  • Motor News & Views - Be the first to hear the latest information on vehicle launches, reviews, analysis & more on this online car insurance app.

Our insurance app is designed to manage your coverage effortlessly. Buy insurance online, renew policies, file claims, and access valuable wellness features - all in one convenient place. Download the IL TakeCare app today for a simpler way to handle all your insurance needs.

If you have any queries related to any insurance, call our toll free number - 1800 2666 or get in touch with our customer support team.

Email: customersupport@icicilombard.com

Website: www.icicilombard.com

description:
A calendar-based household account book app is a tool that allows users to integrate schedule management and financial management, with the following key features and characteristics:

Intuitive Calendar Interface
Visualize income and expense items in monthly/weekly calendar views, distinguishing expense types with color codes

Manual Text Input System
Minimal UI design for direct keyboard input of amount/category/memo. Includes quick recording feature in the format of 'Food 15,000 won #lunch'

Semi-Automation
Automatically register periodic bills (utilities, rent) on a monthly basis when set

Real-time Balance Projection
Calculate future account balances by date based on registered transactions

Data Visualization Reports
Analyze monthly spending patterns with pie charts and bar graphs

Budget Setting and Monitoring
Allocate monthly budgets by category and display warnings when overspending

Search Filter System
Extract specific period/category history with searches like 'July 2024 ~ January 2025 #cafe'

Receipt Image Attachment
Manage transaction evidence through camera capture/gallery selection

Flexibility in Settings
User-defined month start date (1st/5th/25th)

Backup and Recovery
Local backup

Widget Functionality
Check daily spending status with home screen widget

Offline Mode
Use basic functions without internet connection
summary: A calendar-based household account book app
title: Account Book

extra.descriptionHTML:
A calendar-based household account book app is a tool that allows users to integrate schedule management and financial management, with the following key features and characteristics:

Intuitive Calendar Interface
Visualize income and expense items in monthly/weekly calendar views, distinguishing expense types with color codes

Manual Text Input System
Minimal UI design for direct keyboard input of amount/category/memo. Includes quick recording feature in the format of 'Food 15,000 won #lunch'

Semi-Automation
Automatically register periodic bills (utilities, rent) on a monthly basis when set

Real-time Balance Projection
Calculate future account balances by date based on registered transactions

Data Visualization Reports
Analyze monthly spending patterns with pie charts and bar graphs

Budget Setting and Monitoring
Allocate monthly budgets by category and display warnings when overspending

Search Filter System
Extract specific period/category history with searches like 'July 2024 ~ January 2025 #cafe'

Receipt Image Attachment
Manage transaction evidence through camera capture/gallery selection

Flexibility in Settings
User-defined month start date (1st/5th/25th)

Backup and Recovery
Local backup

Widget Functionality
Check daily spending status with home screen widget

Offline Mode
Use basic functions without internet connection

description: Welcome to new way of mobile application My BAFL Mobile App. First time in NBFC history, Bajaj Finance Limited is providing 11 Indian Language Support in its mobile app with content and information access. It’s a one stop shop for all the informational and transactional services related to loans of existing and prospective Two-Wheeler and Three-Wheeler customers. My BAFL is a quick, easy and convenient to use instant self-service App on the move. The app offers a wide range of Self Services which reduces customers need to visit our branch or to wait and speak to company executive / representative for information. Just login into the app with your Registered Mobile Number & OTP received and get access to host of Instant features like, important services mentioned below: * Check your Two Wheeler or Three Wheeler Loan Account Status  * Pay your dues, Partial Foreclosure, Foreclosure payment and EMI online  * Raise a Service Request (i.e., Address Change, NOC Request, etc.,)  * View Latest Offers and get important Loan related notifications  * Apply for Instant Loans  * Online Map enabled branch locator and address * Vehicle Details and Registration Certificate Upload option My Loan Details It enables existing customers to access all their loan account related information like Loan Accounts summary, customer personal details, Vehicle and registration details, statements of accounts and Repayment Schedule with download option. Payment Options EMI Overdue, Other overdues, Part Foreclosure and Foreclosure details coupled with Net banking, Debit Card, Wallet & UPI enabled payment option, Services Map based Branch Locator and address, FAQ (frequently asked questions) make managing your loans an extremely easy and instant task. Further customers can lodge their request or complaints to specific service types (i.e., NOC request, Address Change, Mobile Number change, Email id update or change, Vehicle Registration Certificate upload) which eliminate their branch visit or calling to our Helpline number efforts.  Product Details and to Apply for loans instantly  My BAFL Mobile app offers a host of information on Bajaj Two-Wheeler & Three-Wheeler products and TW/3W loan offers to apply online instantly. Highlight of Personal offered by bajajfinserv * Finance Amount: ₹30,000 to ₹25 Lakh * Repayment Tenure: 12 to 84 months * Rate of Interest / Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 12% to 34% * Processing Fees: ₹500 to ₹2000 Example of a Personal Loan For ₹1,00,000/- borrowed, at interest rate of 2% p.m. for 12 months (interest rate on reducing balance method), payable amount would be: Processing fee = ₹1000 Other charges = ₹100 Interest = ₹13,472 Total amount repaid after a year = ₹1,14,572 * Interest rate and processing fees vary as per the products. We have tried our best to keep it simple & easy to use. Kindly provide us feedback, & point out issues if any. We are working hard to incorporate all your remarks and suggestions as soon as possible. We are grateful to you. All you need: A smart phone with Android Operating System (or) IOS Internet connectivity through Wi-Fi / Mobile Data For feedback & suggestions, kindly email us at feedback@BFLAF.COM Visit http://www.bajajautofinance.com for more details.

title: My BAFL

extra.descriptionHTML:
Welcome to new way of mobile application My BAFL Mobile App. First time in NBFC history, Bajaj Finance Limited is providing 11 Indian Language Support in its mobile app with content and information access. It’s a one stop shop for all the informational and transactional services related to loans of existing and prospective Two-Wheeler and Three-Wheeler customers.

My BAFL is a quick, easy and convenient to use instant self-service App on the move. The app offers a wide range of Self Services which reduces customers need to visit our branch or to wait and speak to company executive / representative for information.

Just login into the app with your Registered Mobile Number & OTP received and get access to host of Instant features like, important services mentioned below:

* Check your Two Wheeler or Three Wheeler Loan Account Status 
* Pay your dues, Partial Foreclosure, Foreclosure payment and EMI online
 * Raise a Service Request (i.e., Address Change, NOC Request, etc.,) 
* View Latest Offers and get important Loan related notifications
 * Apply for Instant Loans 
* Online Map enabled branch locator and address
* Vehicle Details and Registration Certificate Upload option

My Loan Details
It enables existing customers to access all their loan account related information like Loan Accounts summary, customer personal details, Vehicle and registration details, statements of accounts and Repayment Schedule with download option.

Payment Options
EMI Overdue, Other overdues, Part Foreclosure and Foreclosure details coupled with Net banking, Debit Card, Wallet & UPI enabled payment option,

Services
Map based Branch Locator and address, FAQ (frequently asked questions) make managing your loans an extremely easy and instant task. Further customers can lodge their request or complaints to specific service types (i.e., NOC request, Address Change, Mobile Number change, Email id update or change, Vehicle Registration Certificate upload) which eliminate their branch visit or calling to our Helpline number efforts. 

Product Details and to Apply for loans instantly
 My BAFL Mobile app offers a host of information on Bajaj Two-Wheeler & Three-Wheeler products and TW/3W loan offers to apply online instantly.

Highlight of Personal offered by bajajfinserv


* Finance Amount: ₹30,000 to ₹25 Lakh
* Repayment Tenure: 12 to 84 months
* Rate of Interest / Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 12% to 34%
* Processing Fees: ₹500 to ₹2000

Example of a Personal Loan
For ₹1,00,000/- borrowed, at interest rate of 2% p.m. for 12 months (interest rate on reducing balance method), payable amount would be:
Processing fee = ₹1000
Other charges = ₹100
Interest = ₹13,472
Total amount repaid after a year = ₹1,14,572

* Interest rate and processing fees vary as per the products.


We have tried our best to keep it simple & easy to use. Kindly provide us feedback, & point out issues if any. We are working hard to incorporate all your remarks and suggestions as soon as possible. We are grateful to you.

All you need:
A smart phone with Android Operating System (or) IOS
Internet connectivity through Wi-Fi / Mobile Data

For feedback & suggestions, kindly email us at feedback@BFLAF.COM

Visit http://www.bajajautofinance.com for more details.

description:
The SpeedoLoan mobile application, developed by AGRIM FINCAP PRIVATE LIMITED, provides an efficient platform for obtaining instant loans. Whether your requirements are for a modest sum or a more substantial amount, SpeedoLoan offers adaptable loan solutions tailored to your financial circumstances, with repayment terms extending up to 365 days. Our attractive interest rates and transparent Annual Percentage Rate (APR) calculations guarantee clarity regarding the borrowing costs.

Operational Process:
1. Download the Application:
   * Accessible via the App Store and Google Play Store.
   * Free of charge for download and usage.
2. Registration:
   * Create an account using your mobile number.
   * Fill in your profile with essential personal and financial details.
3. Loan Application:
   * Choose a loan amount ranging from ₹5,000 to ₹1,00,000 and a repayment duration of up to 365 days.
   * Submit the required documents along with your application.
4. Approval Process:
   * Obtain immediate approval and a loan offer.
   * Review and accept the terms of the loan.
5. Fund Disbursement:
   * The loan amount will be transferred to your bank account within minutes.
6. Timely Repayment:
   * Adhere to the repayment schedule outlined in the application.
   * Make payments directly through the app utilizing our secure payment gateway.

Repayment Details:
* Flexible Duration: Select a repayment period of up to 365 days that aligns with your financial needs.
* Automated Notifications: Receive alerts prior to each due date to facilitate timely payments.
* Clarity: Access a comprehensive overview of the principal, interest, and outstanding balance.

APR Calculation Example:
For instance, if you borrow ₹10,000 at a monthly interest rate of 3% with a repayment term of 12 months:
* Loan Amount: ₹10,000
* Monthly Payment (EMI): ₹1004.68
* Total Repayment Amount: ₹12,056.16
* Total Interest Paid: ₹2056.16
* Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 42.576%
* Minimum Repayment Period: 90 Days
* Maximum Repayment Period: 365 Days

This example demonstrates how the monthly interest rate translates into the APR and outlines the total borrowing cost over a year. Adjust the example as necessary to suit your specific loan requirements.

description:
Build your credit score to 750+. Join over 5 Million Indians building their credit score with GoodScore. Check your credit score, get a detailed credit report and expert advice to build your credit score.

Get access to your detailed credit report and a complete account by account analysis of your credit profile from our team. This analysis will be given to you in the form of a detailed video & step-by-step plan – where we will provide important tips and suggestions to help you achieve your ideal credit score.

GoodScore’s credit score is powered by Experian and CRIF High Mark - 2 of the 4 credit bureaus authorized by RBI.

How does GoodScore work?

The information on your credit report summarizes how you manage credit, including payment history, credit accounts, outstanding balances, defaults, credit utilization, credit mix and loan enquiries – all of which are important factors that impact your credit score.

We analyze all your active and closed credit accounts for payment patterns and credit behaviour and offer personalized guidance to help you make the right decisions as you work towards achieving your desired credit score.

GoodScore helps you understand the factors that affect your CRIF and Experian credit scores and gives you a personalized video recording on how to manage your credit.

Our credit score builder service includes the following:
✅Monthly tracking of your credit score and detailed report
✅Identifying areas which are affecting your credit score
✅Tips on how to manage your credit score
✅Monthly review of financial decisions and steps taken

Check your credit score:
You can check your Experian and CRIF High Mark Credit Score any time on the app. Experian and CRIF High Mark are among the four major Credit information companies in India.

We’re also working towards onboarding the other 2 credit bureaus namely CIBIL & Equifax through which you can check your CIBIL score soon. We’ll update you as soon as these credit bureaus are available on the app.

Benefits of using GoodScore:
Your credit health will always be in your control with GoodScore:
✅Check your credit score and credit report on the go
✅Get personalized insights through a detailed video
✅Keep track of all your loan and credit accounts under one tab
✅Set reminders for bill payments & EMIs

When you have a good CIBIL score, you’ll become eligible to get loans & credit cards from India’s top banks like HDFC Bank, SBI, Bank of Baroda, PNB, ICICI Bank, Axis Bank, IDFC First Bank, IndusInd Bank, Bandhan Bank, RBL Bank, Federal Bank, etc.

Are CRIF and Experian credit scores different from CIBIL?

CRIF, Experian and CIBIL are different platforms owned by different credit information companies. However, all 3 companies are approved by the Reserve Bank of India.

The parameters chosen by CIBIL TransUnion, Experian & CRIF High Mark are majorly similar. All 3 companies have a similar mechanism to calculate the credit score. They use repayment history, credit mix, new credit and outstanding debt to make the credit report.

Having a good credit history in CIBIL will have somewhat similar results with CRIF High Mark and Experian as well.

[Important Note: Goodscore DOES NOT provide any credit repair service. The information provided in the app is for educational purposes and is only a personalized guidance based on a customer's credit report]

App permissions and reasons: We need SMS permissions for transactional messages only. This permission is taken to help users keep track of their bills & loan payments and provide timely reminders. None of the information is shared with any third party or institution. We have a highly secured & encrypted system to ensure the safety of information shared by our users.

Contact us
Phone number: 080-69819392
WhatsApp: +91-7619697249
Email: goodscore@rupicard.com
Address: 57/4, Vajram Esteva, 2nd Floor, Marathahalli-Sarjapur Outer Ring Road, ORR, Devarabisanahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560103

description:
Account Book is a powerful money manager for both personal and commercial accounting:
Monitor your personal budget or cash flow of your business.

COMPREHENSIVE ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT

- Create income, expense, bank, credit card, bill, payable, receivable, debit, credit, saving, exchange, budget accounts.
- Create customer, supplier, inventory, personnel or cash accounts for different projects of your business.

FOLLOW THE PAYMENT DATES

- Follow sale, tax, payment, and bill dates.
- Create repeating transactions such as rent, salary, bank credit.
- Be informed about incoming payments and bills. Get notifications and never miss any of them.

ACCESS FROM EVERYWHERE

- Login with your password from [http://defter.net](http://defter.net/) from your computer.

ADVANCED REPORTS

- Analyse accounts with advanced reports
- See your financial statement with summary reports
- Send account reports as Excel files via email

ACCOUNT SHARING

- Share accounts with your business partners, co-workers or accountants
- Create and share customer accounts
- Follow transactions with suppliers or other busines owners
- Create and share separate budgets for family members

OTHER FEATURES

description:
Ram Fincorp Personal Loan offers tension-free, easy, and instant personal loans right at your fingertips. Not only do we provide you with the fastest disbursal ever possible but also low-interest rates. The loan will be credited to your bank account through us, your trusted NBFC in around 30 minutes!

We are a RBI registered NBFC committed to offering personal credits to salaried professionals. We stand for catering to your individual financing needs in an easy way by including innovation to the credit buying handle, in this manner giving you moment get to reserves in a straightforward and straightforward way.

We provide loans that are available at affordable interest rates due to a minimal risk profile. Moreover, at Ram Fincorp Personal Loan we pride ourselves on providing the lowest interest rates to our borrowers. We ensure that our borrowers are not facing any unnecessary financial burden due to hefty interest rates.
Banking is experiencing a wave of digitization across the world. However, often some banking products such as personal loans require physical interactions. At Ram Fincorp Personal Loan, we have developed a full-stack solution to digitize the entire personal loan process. Now you don't have to wait in line to avail of a personal loan!
Our mission is simple: we want to build a one-of-kind, effortless loan buying platform that allows customers to get a loan easily and affordably. We strive hard to make our customer’s life easier by providing them quick access to money in a simple way.

LOAN MODEL

Ram Fincorp Personal Loan provides personal loans ranging from INR 5,000 to INR 2,00,000 based on your
requirement
Loan Amount: - 5,000 to 2,00,000
Interest Rate: - Up to 35% per annum APR: 35% MAX
Age: - 21 to 55 years
Late payment fee - as applicable (Charged only, if repayment is delayed)
Processing Fee: - Up to 5%
Loan tenure: - 90 days to 365 days
Pre-closure charges – As applicable

Sample Loan Calculation

Loan amount: ₹ 30,000 at interest rate of 30% p.a.
Loan Duration: 3 Months
Total personal loan interest = ₹ 2,250
Processing fees (PF) + GST = ₹ 500 + ₹ 90 = ₹ 590
Total Deductibles (PF + GST): ₹ 590
In-Hand Amount: Loan Amount - Total Deductibles = ₹ 30,000 - 590 = ₹ 29,410
Total repayable Amount (Loan Amount + Interest): ₹ 32,250
Monthly EMI Repayable (Loan Amount + Interest / No of EMI's): ₹ 10,750
PF + GST are deducted upfront during the loan disbursal.

Advantages Of Ram Fincorp Personal Loan
● Customised Personal Loan
● Secure Data System
● Instant Approval And Disbursal
● User-Friendly 
● Transparent Process
● Flexible Repayment Options
● Minimum Documentation 
Eligibility/Document Required
● Individuals with a minimum monthly income of Rs. 30,000.
● Indian residents/citizens who are 21 years and above
● To apply for the loan applicants would need pan cards, aadhar cards, salary slips (for the
last 3 months), salary account bank statement (3/6 months) and address proof.

Security And Privacy Policy
To guarantee the security of the information shared by our clients, we have a highly secure
and encrypted system. To read our privacy policy click here:
https://www.ramfincorp.com/privacypolicy

Terms & Conditions
Ram Fincorp Personal Loan is a unit of R.K. Bansal Finance Private Limited (NBFC), which is registered with
the RBI. Visit :- https://www.ramfincorp.com/conditions

Contact Information
● Contact Number:- +919899985495
● Official Mail ID:- info@ramfincorp.com
● Official Website:- https://ramfincorp.com/
● Registered & Corporate Office Address:- 4338, Padam Singh Road, Karol Bagh
New Delhi - 110005

description:
Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com, or download the app, to see what’s available for you.

Make your money work worldwide, for less. 160 countries. 40 currencies.

Move, send and spend your money internationally with Wise. Get paid like a local. Keep as many currencies as you want. All without any hidden fees, and all at the real mid-market exchange rate.

Join 16+ million people and businesses worldwide.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, for every money transfer
• Over 65% of transfers are instant, arriving in under 20 seconds (transaction speed claimed depends on individual circumstances and may not be available for all transactions)
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The Multi-Currency Card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160 countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the mid-market exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world. Wise is a Money Service Business (“”MSB”“) registered with FinCen, not an FDIC-insured bank. It is authorized to operate as a MSB in most states. In other states, the MSB program is sponsored by Community Federal Savings Bank, to which we’re a service provider. The Wise Multi-Currency Card Program is issued by Wise’s sponsor Bank(s)*, member(s) FDIC. pursuant to licensing by Visa® U.S.A. Inc. The Wise Multi-Currency Card is available to eligible consumers and commercial entities. Not available in all countries. Fees vary based on type of transaction. T&C apply. Find more info at https://wise.com/us/
*Lead Bank and Community Federal Savings Bank.

Send to: EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), GBP (British pound), AED (UAE dirham), ARS (Argentine peso), AUD (Australian dollar), BDT (Bangladeshi taka), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CLP (Chilean peso), CNY (Chinese yuan), CRC (Costa Rican colón), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), EGP (Egyptian pound), GHS (Ghanaian cedi), GEL (Georgian lari), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), IDR (Indonesian rupiah), ILS (Israeli shekel), INR (Indian rupee), JPY (Japanese yen), KES (Kenyan shilling), KRW (South Korean won), LKR (Sri Lankan rupee), MAD (Moroccan dirham), MXN (Mexican peso), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NPR (Nepalese rupee), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PEN (Peruvian sol), PHP (Philippine peso), PKR (Pakistan rupee), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar), THB (Thai baht), TRY (Turkish lira), UAH (Ukrainian hryvnia), VND (Vietnamese dong), ZAR (South African rand), ZMW (Zambian kwacha)

description: This is the paid version of "Loan Calculator" App. The only difference from the free version is that the Ads have been removed. This App offers the following calculators for both Android Mobile Phones & Tablets. 1) Loan Calculator (Mortgage Calculator) 2) Advanced Loan Calculator (Advanced Mortgage Calculator) 3) Compound Interest Calculator (Future Value Calculator) 4) Simple Interest Calculator LOAN CALCULATOR - FEATURES: * Reverse Loan calculations (find out one of Loan amount, Interest rate, Loan term or Monthly repayment given the other 3 values) * Make Pre-payments (Extra Repayments) and find out interest savings, loan term reduction * Input Interest rate (%) changes and find out impact on monthly repayment, loan term * Loan Offset Account saves the interest you pay. Helps to pay off loan faster * Repayment Holiday (interest only) period calculations * Track various Loan expenses such as Fees, Insurance, Tax, Maintenance charges, etc * Save loan calculations COMPOUND INTEREST CALCULATOR - FEATURES: * Calculates positive & negative amounts * Calculates simple interest and compound interest for lump sum deposit/withdraw, regular deposit/withdraw & both * Various deposit/withdraw frequencies - Daily, Weekly, Fortnightly, Monthly, Bi-Monthly, Quarterly, Thrice-Yearly, Half-Yearly & Yearly * Ability to increase or decrease the regular Deposit/Withdraw amount every year by a certain amount or percentage * Ability to specify a particular Term (duration) for regular Deposit/Withdraw irrespective of the Total Term * Various Compounding frequencies - Daily, Weekly, Fortnightly, Monthly, Bi-Monthly, Quarterly, Thrice-Yearly, Half-Yearly & Yearly * Positive(+) or negative(-) Interest Rate (%) helps in calculating Profit or Loss scenarios * Displays Maturity Amount, Total Amount Deposited & Total Interest Earned * Yearly and Monthly reports in a tabular format show how your investments are growing * You can E-mail both yearly and monthly reports * You can visualise results through intuitive Graph & Chart * Contains in-built User Guide * Handles very large numbers USER INTERFACE FEATURES: * Elegant Material Design Theme * Easy to use interface with Tabs * App works on Phones & Tablets * Basic & Advanced calculations modes * Calculates in no time * Light weight & loads quickly BENEFITS TO USERS: * App is generic and it is suitable for people of all Countries * No prior finance knowledge required * Helps you to take informed decisions about your finance * Saves you a lot of time, effort & money * Used for investments, financial planning, budgeting, accounting, studies, research & more * Suitable for individuals, financial planners, accountants, brokers, students, research analysts, etc * Heaps of features at very less price * No Ads or In-app purchases DISCLAIMER: Kindly consider this calculator as guidance only. Investors are required to make their own assessment before investing.

summary: Loan Calculator, Mortgage Calculator, Compound Interest Calculator
title: Loan Calculator Pro

extra.descriptionHTML:
This is the paid version of "Loan Calculator" App. The only difference from the free version is that the Ads have been removed.


This App offers the following calculators for both Android Mobile Phones & Tablets.


1) Loan Calculator (Mortgage Calculator)

2) Advanced Loan Calculator (Advanced Mortgage Calculator)

3) Compound Interest Calculator (Future Value Calculator)

4) Simple Interest Calculator



LOAN CALCULATOR - FEATURES:

* Reverse Loan calculations (find out one of Loan amount, Interest rate, Loan term or Monthly repayment given the other 3 values)

* Make Pre-payments (Extra Repayments) and find out interest savings, loan term reduction

* Input Interest rate (%) changes and find out impact on monthly repayment, loan term

* Loan Offset Account saves the interest you pay. Helps to pay off loan faster

* Repayment Holiday (interest only) period calculations

* Track various Loan expenses such as Fees, Insurance, Tax, Maintenance charges, etc

* Save loan calculations


COMPOUND INTEREST CALCULATOR - FEATURES:

* Calculates positive & negative amounts

* Calculates simple interest and compound interest for lump sum deposit/withdraw, regular deposit/withdraw & both

* Various deposit/withdraw frequencies - Daily, Weekly, Fortnightly, Monthly, Bi-Monthly, Quarterly, Thrice-Yearly, Half-Yearly & Yearly

* Ability to increase or decrease the regular Deposit/Withdraw amount every year by a certain amount or percentage

* Ability to specify a particular Term (duration) for regular Deposit/Withdraw irrespective of the Total Term

* Various Compounding frequencies - Daily, Weekly, Fortnightly, Monthly, Bi-Monthly, Quarterly, Thrice-Yearly, Half-Yearly & Yearly

* Positive(+) or negative(-) Interest Rate (%) helps in calculating Profit or Loss scenarios

* Displays Maturity Amount, Total Amount Deposited & Total Interest Earned

* Yearly and Monthly reports in a tabular format show how your investments are growing

* You can E-mail both yearly and monthly reports

* You can visualise results through intuitive Graph & Chart

* Contains in-built User Guide

* Handles very large numbers


USER INTERFACE FEATURES:

* Elegant Material Design Theme

* Easy to use interface with Tabs

* App works on Phones & Tablets

* Basic & Advanced calculations modes

* Calculates in no time

* Light weight & loads quickly


BENEFITS TO USERS:

* App is generic and it is suitable for people of all Countries

* No prior finance knowledge required

* Helps you to take informed decisions about your finance

* Saves you a lot of time, effort & money

* Used for investments, financial planning, budgeting, accounting, studies, research & more

* Suitable for individuals, financial planners, accountants, brokers, students, research analysts, etc

* Heaps of features at very less price

* No Ads or In-app purchases


DISCLAIMER:
Kindly consider this calculator as guidance only. Investors are required to make their own assessment before investing.

description:
HOT Wallet — a multichain wallet seamlessly integrating both EVM and non-EVM blockchains.

Ethereum, BSC, and 60+ Other EVM Chains
Swap across 20+ DEXes, bridge assets with HOT Bridge and LayerZero, and pay gas fees with USDT or $HOT using our private RPCs. Comprehensive support for major mainnets and testnets, including a gas tap on the Monad testnet.

TON Blockchain
HOT has built-in swaps, staking, USDT bridging, transfers, and full compatibility with TON Connect for effortless integration with the TON ecosystem.

NEAR Protocol
HOT supports swaps on Ref Finance and Intents, liquid and native NEAR staking, USDT/USDC earning on Burrow, and seamless connection to 100+ dApps on NEAR.

Solana
HOT supports swaps via Jupiter, private staking RPCs for ultra-fast transactions, 0% fee bridge for stablecoins, and native SOL staking.

Stellar
HOT supports transfers and asset management with built-in swaps, gas-free delegated transactions, and a 0% fee USDC bridge for MPC users.

TRON
HOT supports swaps and USDT transfers—everything you need on TRON.

HOT Wallet — the most secure and user-friendly way to manage your multichain transactions!

description:
Introducing the Ultimate Bitcoin Price Tracker for Wear OS smartwatch

Are you a cryptocurrency enthusiast or investor who needs to stay updated with the latest Bitcoin prices? Our app brings real-time Bitcoin price tracking right to your wrist, ensuring you're always in the know, no matter where you are or what you're doing.

Features:

Real-Time Updates: Our app connects directly to leading cryptocurrency exchanges to provide you with the most accurate and current Bitcoin prices.
Simple & Sleek Interface: Designed with usability in mind, our app features a minimalist interface that shows you exactly what you need – the current price of Bitcoin.
Customisable Alerts: Set price alerts so you never miss significant market movements. Receive notifications directly on your Wear OS device.
Global Currency Support: Whether you think in USD, EUR, GBP, or any other major currency, our app has you covered. Convert Bitcoin prices into your preferred currency with ease.
Efficient & Battery-Friendly: We understand the importance of battery life in wearable devices. Our app is optimised to ensure minimal battery drain without compromising on performance.
Why Choose Our Bitcoin Tracker?

Stay Updated 24/7: With prices updating in real-time, you're always informed.
Convenience: Glance at your wrist for current Bitcoin prices – no need to pull out your phone.
Customisation: Tailor notifications and app settings to fit your needs.
Optimised for Wear OS: Designed specifically for Wear OS smart watch devices, offering seamless integration and intuitive operation.
Whether you're deeply involved in cryptocurrency trading or just like to stay informed, our Bitcoin price tracker for Wear OS is the perfect tool for staying connected to the market. Download now and take the first step towards smarter, more informed investing.

Global Currency Support: Whether you think in USD, EUR, GBP, or any other major currency, our app has you covered. Convert Bitcoin prices into your preferred currency with ease.
Efficient & Battery-Friendly: We understand the importance of battery life in wearable devices. Our app is optimised to ensure minimal battery drain without compromising on performance.
Why Choose Our Bitcoin Tracker?

Stay Updated 24/7: With prices updating in real-time, you're always informed.
Convenience: Glance at your wrist for current Bitcoin prices – no need to pull out your phone.
Customisation: Tailor notifications and app settings to fit your needs.
Optimised for Wear OS: Designed specifically for Wear OS smart watch devices, offering seamless integration and intuitive operation.
Whether you're deeply involved in cryptocurrency trading or just like to stay informed, our Bitcoin price tracker for Wear OS is the perfect tool for staying connected to the market. Download now and take the first step towards smarter, more informed investing.

description:
Thangamayil Digigold is the digital home of Thangamayil Jewellery.
The ideal place to join a savings scheme and save up to buy your dream jewellery conveniently in the palm of your hand. You can join and pay into any of the Schemes of Thangamayil Jewellery. Start Saving in Gold today.
Traditionally everyone saves and invests in Gold Jewellery, both as an ornament and as an asset. But with rising price of Gold, lakhs of customers of Thangamayil have used various micro savings schemes to help them accrue savings to buy their dream gold jewellery. Grow your wealth by investing in Gold – the historic store of value - the best instrument for savings, giving you assured appreciation of value.
Currently offering 4 savings schemes to save up to buy any Gold Coin, Gold Jewellery from Thangamayil Jewellery.

DigiGold
Digigold gives you the Freedom to save daily, weekly, or monthly – even multiple times a day. It is Flexible to save as much as you can starting from just Rs.100, varying your savings each time. It is Easy – just a few clicks and you have saved Gold at prevailing market rates. It is Convenient, as it is fully integrated with various payment gateways, enabling you to save from wherever you are.
SuperGold
SuperGold is a monthly savings scheme with a tenure of 330 days (11 installments) with benefit of getting up to 75% Discount on VA (Wastage + Making Charges) on Gold Jewellery and 60% Discount on VA for Diamond Studded Gold Jewellery and JewelOne Jewellery. Subject to full payment of all installments on time and redemption after 330 days. User gets credited as Gold weight as per prevailing rates on dates of payment in your Account and can be redeemed after maturity for weight saved with above benefits.
Thangamagal
Thangamal is a fixed monthly savings scheme with a tenure of 330 days (11 installments) with benefit of getting up to 75% Discount on VA (Wastage + Making Charges) on Gold Jewellery and 60% Discount on VA for Diamond Studded Gold Jewellery and JewelOne Jewellery. Subject to full payment of all installments on time and redemption after 330 days. User gets credited as Amount in your Account and can be redeemed after maturity for amount saved.
FuturePlus
SuperGold is a one-time savings scheme with a tenure of 330 days with benefit of getting 75% Discount on VA (Wastage + Making Charges) on Gold Jewellery on Gold Jewellery and 60% Discount on VA for Diamond Studded Gold Jewellery and JewelOne Jewellery – subject to redemption after 330 days. 
Just download the app, register, and start saving.
Redeem conveniently at a Thangamayil Showroom near you (58 showrooms in Tamil Nadu – and growing) or buy Gold Jewellery or Gold Coins from www.thangamayil.com
While there are many apps to buy and sell gold online, Thangamayil Digigold is the only app that gives you all the flexibility while also giving you up to 5% benefits for your savings and other benefits enumerated. Save whenever possible and grow your wealth.
Save using the Thangamayil DigiGold app and buy Gold Jewellery from Thangamayil – a brand trusted for over 75 years. Thangamayil Jewellery Limited, with its Registered Office in Madurai, Tamilnadu, is the Leading Gold Jewellery Retailer in Tamilnadu with 58 Showrooms and trusted by over 25lakh customers.
Contact:  1800 889 7080 (10 AM - 7 PM IST)
digigoldsupport@thangamayil.com | https://www.thangamayil.com

description:
● Theme Function to Create Your Own Cute MoneyBook
· You can customize the colors, backgrounds, and emojis to your liking.
· Use various icons to create a cute MoneyBook.
· You can also register your own icons by using the gallery or taking photos.


● A feed screen where you can reminisce about your MoneyBook entries
· Customize your income, expenses, and savings entries in your personal feed.
· Record who you were with and follow them to see everything at a glance.
· You can register up to three photos per MoneyBook entry.
· View only the entries with registered photos in a separate collection.
· If you add notes or hashtags, you can also view them in the feed.


● A Clean but Powerful Calendar Screen
· View a clear summary of your entries for the entire month or just for a selected date.
· Select a range to see the entries and totals for that period.
· Use the filter function to view only the entries you want.
· Quickly search using tags or places of use.


● Easy-to-Use Entry Screen
· Quickly enter income, expenses, and savings with auto-focus.
· Easily input previous entries with the autocomplete feature.
· Register entries not only in the default currency but also in foreign currencies.
· Leave complex calculations to the handy calculator


● Analysis Screen to Check Your Status from All Angles
· Analyze your data easily and enjoyably with various charts.
· View detailed analyses of your income, expenses, and savings entries.
· Compare income/expenses, income/savings, and expenses/savings side by side.
· Choose to view weekly, monthly, or yearly analyses.
· We also provide analysis for foreign currency entries.
· Set target amounts to increase your income/savings and reduce your expenses.


● Menu Screen for Managing Your Data
· Manage categories, payment methods, and the people you were with.
· Change the app to various languages, with more languages to be supported in the future.
· Change the app's default currency; any other currency will be recognized as foreign.
· Easily back up and restore your data via email or file.
· Reset your data to its original state.


● And Many More Features
· You can navigate to the detailed screen from anywhere to edit your entries. Changes are reflected in real time.
· Landscape mode is supported, and we are continuously improving to support various form factors.
· The app is designed to work smoothly even when the screen is zoomed in for users with low vision.
· You can use the app without a network connection. Network usage is only for Firebase analytics and displaying ads in the free version.
  * Developer's Tip: If ads are bothersome, try using the app without a network connection. If that's still inconvenient, consider upgrading to the paid version.


● Additional Information
· There is no server for the Feed MoneyBook. All data is stored solely in the app, and it will be deleted if you uninstall the app.
· To optimize storage space, photos imported from the gallery are not stored in the app. If you delete them from the gallery, they will no longer be visible in the app.
· Feed MoneyBook does not require any personal information.


● Paid Version
· The paid version is ad-free.
· Exclusive features will be added to the paid version in the future.


● Permissions
[Required Permissions]
· None

[Optional Permissions]
· Camera: Needed to take and register photos or icons.
· Notification: Needs to receive reminders for moneybook writing time or credit card payment due date.

A Personal Loan with Freo stands out with fast & smooth experience, great loan offers and from trusted partners.

Best Features
● Borrow small or big (any amount from ₹3,000 to ₹5 lakhs)
● Pay interest only on the amount you use
● Instant loans with no collateral risk
● Fast, digital & paperless process
● Flexible EMIs
● Top-up loans

Loan Terms:
● Amount: ₹3,000 to ₹5 lakhs
● Interest: 12% to 36% per annum
● APR: 10% to 70%
● Tenures: 3 to 36 months
● Low processing & setup fees

For ₹1,00,000 personal loan, for 1 year, @13% per annum*, a user would pay:
- Processing fee (at 2%) = ₹2,000 + GST = ₹2,360
- Setup fee of ₹999+GST = ₹1181/- to be paid upfront
- Interest = ₹7,181
- EMI = ₹8,932
Total amount to pay = ₹1,10,725/-

*Interest Rate varies based on your risk profile. Only a fraction of our customers get an interest rate higher than 30% p.a.

description: Simplify business payment transactions (credit/debit) with Khatabook. 📕 100% Free, Safe, and Secure for all types of businesses. Khatabook app is trusted by crores of Indians to grow their vyapar in simple and smart ways. How can you use Khatabook to facilitate & track payment transactions with your customers? • Khatabook QR: Khatabook QR can be used in your shop to collect payments from customers. You can view the report of all payment transactions on the app. •Khatabook Payment Links: Send payment links seamlessly to your customers and remind them to pay-back their dues. With every new khata transaction, customers automatically receive an SMS from the merchant’s phone number. Note: We use Send SMS permission to send these automated transaction messages directly from the merchant's phone number. •Multiple Payment options for payment recollection: Customers can use any of our easy payment mode options- UPI, Debit cards, Credit cards, and digital wallets- to pay the amount back to the merchants. •Automatic Khata updation: The Khata book ledger is automatically updated once the customer makes a payment back to the merchants. •Khatabook Coins: Merchants can also purchase Khatabook Coins on the app via multiple payment modes. Khatabook Coins can be used to unlock automated IVR calls and bulk messages as instant payment reminders. Unlimited accounting features to help grow your business faster than before: • Save time in accounting with easy-to-make bills and GST reports for GST Filing • Use this as a billing software for retail shops, kirana, garment vyapar, and more • Manage your inventory better and track your stock in/out and profit reports, low stock alert Business Loans and Other Services With due diligence, Khatabook collects the consent of the user who wishes to apply for a loan. Khatabook provides business loans through a completely digital process at low interest rates without any security or guarantee through our NBFC partners. Loan amount ranges from INR 10,000 to INR 5,00,000 excluding PF. The loans can be repaid in daily installments (EDI) with loan tenure ranging from 3 months (minimum) to 24 months (maximum). The simple interest range of the loans is from 15% - 24% depending on the credit quality of the borrower. Processing fees can range from 0%-5%. Example: For Loan amount = INR 10,000, 💵 Tenure = 3 months and Interest rate = 24% per year, the interest portion will be INR 600 (10,000*3/12*24%). 💵The repayment amount including interest will be INR 10,600 which translates into EDI of INR 118 💵Processing fees is 1% (inclusive of GST). The processing charges will be INR 100. 💵 Disbursed Amount = INR 10,000 - INR 100 = INR 9,900 Khatabook’s Partners for Loans: - Western Capital Advisors Private Limited - Liquiloans - Lendbox - Niyogin - GetVantage - Kinara Capital - Vivriti Capital Limited Your data's security is our top priority! Khatabook employs best-in-class encryption, secure servers, strict access controls, and adheres to compliance standards. Trusted by over 5 Crore+ small, medium, and large business owners in India to manage their business transactions efficiently. Need more information? Call us at- +91-9606800800

Simplify business payment transactions (credit/debit) with Khatabook. 📕
100% Free, Safe, and Secure for all types of businesses.

Khatabook app is trusted by crores of Indians to grow their vyapar in simple and smart ways.

How can you use Khatabook to facilitate & track payment transactions with your customers?
• Khatabook QR: Khatabook QR can be used in your shop to collect payments from customers. You can view the report of all payment transactions on the app.
•Khatabook Payment Links: Send payment links seamlessly to your customers and remind them to pay-back their dues. With every new khata transaction, customers automatically receive an SMS from the merchant’s phone number. Note: We use Send SMS permission to send these automated transaction messages directly from the merchant's phone number.
•Multiple Payment options for payment recollection: Customers can use any of our easy payment mode options- UPI, Debit cards, Credit cards, and digital wallets- to pay the amount back to the merchants.
•Automatic Khata updation: The Khata book ledger is automatically updated once the customer makes a payment back to the merchants.
•Khatabook Coins: Merchants can also purchase Khatabook Coins on the app via multiple payment modes. Khatabook Coins can be used to unlock automated IVR calls and bulk messages as instant payment reminders.

Unlimited accounting features to help grow your business faster than before:
• Save time in accounting with easy-to-make bills and GST reports for GST Filing
• Use this as a billing software for retail shops, kirana, garment vyapar, and more
• Manage your inventory better and track your stock in/out and profit reports, low stock alert
Business Loans and Other Services
With due diligence, Khatabook collects the consent of the user who wishes to apply for a loan. Khatabook provides business loans through a completely digital process at low interest rates without any security or guarantee through our NBFC partners. Loan amount ranges from INR 10,000 to INR 5,00,000 excluding PF.
The loans can be repaid in daily installments (EDI) with loan tenure ranging from 3 months (minimum) to 24 months (maximum). The simple interest range of the loans is from 15% - 24% depending on the credit quality of the borrower. Processing fees can range from 0%-5%.

Example: For Loan amount = INR 10,000, 💵 Tenure = 3 months and Interest rate = 24% per year, the interest portion will be INR 600 (10,000*3/12*24%). 💵The repayment amount including interest will be INR 10,600 which translates into EDI of INR 118 💵Processing fees is 1% (inclusive of GST). The processing charges will be INR 100. 💵 Disbursed Amount = INR 10,000 - INR 100 = INR 9,900

Khatabook’s Partners for Loans:
- Western Capital Advisors Private Limited
- Liquiloans
- Lendbox
- Niyogin
- GetVantage
- Kinara Capital
- Vivriti Capital Limited
Your data's security is our top priority! Khatabook employs best-in-class encryption, secure servers, strict access controls, and adheres to compliance standards.

Trusted by over 5 Crore+ small, medium, and large business owners in India to manage their business transactions efficiently.

description:
Splitwise is the easiest way to share expenses with friends and family and stop stressing about “who owes who.” Millions of people around the world use Splitwise to organize group bills for households, trips, and more. Our mission is to reduce the stress and awkwardness that money places on our most important relationships.
 
Splitwise is great for:
- Roommates splitting rent and apartment bills
- Group trips around the world
- Splitting a vacation house for skiing or at the beach
- Weddings and bachelor/bachelorette parties
- Couples sharing relationship costs
- Friends and co-workers who go out to lunch or dinner together frequently
- Loans and IOUs between friends 
- And so much more

Splitwise is simple to use:
- Create groups or private friendships for any splitting situation
- Add expenses, IOUs, or informal debts in any currency, with support for offline entry
- Expenses are backed up online so any everyone can log in, view their balances, and add expenses
- Keep track of who should pay next, or settle up by recording cash payments or using our integrations
 
Endorsements:
“Makes it easy to split everything from your dinner bill to rent.” - NY Times
"Fundamental for tracking finances. As good as WhatsApp for containing awkwardness." – The Financial Times
“I never fight with roommates over bills because of this genius expense-splitting app”- Business Insider
“The Single Best App You Can Download for Group Trips of Any Kind” - Thrillist
 
Here are some of our industry-leading features:
- Multi-platform support for Android, iOS, and web
- Simplify debts into the easiest repayment plan
- Expense categorization
- Calculate group totals
- Export to CSV
- Comment directly on expenses
- Split expenses equally or unequally by percentages, shares, or exact amounts
- Add informal debts and IOUs
- Create bills that recur monthly, weekly, yearly, fortnightly
- Add multiple payers on a single expense
- See total balances with a person across multiple groups and private expenses
- Custom user avatars
- Cover photos for groups 
- Activity feed and push notifications help you stay on top of changes
- View your edit history for changes to an expense
- Any deleted group or bill can be restored easily
- World-class customer support
- Pay back using our integrated payments: Venmo and PayPal (US only), Paytm (India only)
- 100+ currencies and growing
- 7+ supported languages

Get Splitwise Pro for even more amazing features!
- Convert expenses to different currencies using our Open Exchange Rates integration
- Access to “spending by category” budgeting tools and other charts
- OCR integration for scanning and itemizing receipts
- Store high-resolution receipts in the cloud (10GB cloud storage)
- Backups to JSON, downloadable from our website
- Search full expense history
- Save default splits

Our app is available in 12 languages of India along with English- Hindi, Bengali, Marathi, Telugu, Tamil, Urdu, Gujarati, Malayalam, Kannada, Oriya, Punjabi and Assamese.

Read more 

Open a Digital Savings Account with IPPB App

	Provide your basic details and submit
	Convert to Regular Savings Account within a year for additional benefits

         Payments services mentioned below will be available with a cumulative monthly transaction limit of Rs. 10,000:
        i. Bill Payments

description:
The US Debt Clock .org App gives you a Real-Time glimpse of the most relevant economic data showing the financial condition of the US Federal Government, the 50 States and the World with over 3000, up to the Second Data Fields.

• Go Back in Time to the Year 1900 to see the performance of each President, all the   
   way forward into Future elections.

• Compare the Debt, GDP, Debt Per Citizen and Unfunded Liabilities of all 50 US States.

• See the World Debt Clock represented in US Dollars, and how each Country's Debt
   Level and GDP place them in the Global Economic System.

• Look into the Future to see the US Debt Clock in 4 and 8 Years at Current Rates.

• See the Top 50 US City Debt and Unfunded Liabilities.

• Look into the Classified Budgets and Programs of the various US agencies.

• See all NASA's Current and Past Space programs represented in Today's Dollars.

• See the Cost of every US War in Today's dollars

• See the Cost of America's Military Hardware through History and in Inflation Adjusted Dollars Today.

• See a complete list of the Average Pay and 20 year Increase for the Top 200 Occupations in the U.S.

• See the Fortunes in Today's Dollars of some off America's top pioneers

• A special feature which lists America's most Expensive Natural Disasters in Today's Dollars.  

• Take a Glimpse back in time 100 years and see the increase in prices for a List of Common Consumer items, Including Cars.

• Keep up to date with World Energy Usage, Precious Metals Production and Demand, Year to Date Auto Sales and Home Prices and Sales Rates.

• Go Back by decade to see where US Debt Levels were in 1980, 1990, 2000 and 2010.

• Travel Back in Time to the year 1100 for a complete History of Money and Banking.

• Federal Budget Showdown matches the CBO, OMB, HCB and USDC against each      
   other, 4 years into the future

description:
What is True Balance?
True Balance is a secure platform for lending, payments, and financial services dedicated to the mission of "Finance for All." True Balance is a Prepaid Payment Instrument issuing entity, authorised by RBI, which issues Digital Wallet and Gift Wallet, which can be further utilised for recharges, bill payments, fund transfers and payments through wallet interoperability on UPI. It also provides unsecured Personal Loans through RBI-registered NBFCs, which have been trusted by over 75 million users across the country. Here, you may avail of digital personal loans ranging from ₹1,000 to ₹2,00,000 (Disbursal Amount) for a tenure of a minimum of 6 months to a maximum of 12 months at a low processing fee. The APR ranges from 28.8% to 99.7%

What We Offer:
*1- Quick Personal Loan: Cash Loan and Level Up Loan*
Cash Loan Features:
●Cash Loan: Apply today for a seamless borrowing experience.
●Safety: 100% safe and secure platform
●100% Digital and 24*7 access to loans
●Personal Loan Range: Borrow from ₹1,000 to ₹2,00,000 (Disbursal Amount)
●Flexible Tenure: Choose a repayment period of 6 to 12 months
●Low Processing Fees: Affordable costs
●Direct loan disbursal to your bank account

Example Online Loan Calculation:
-Loan Type: Unsecured Personal Loan
-Loan Amount INR 10,000
-Loan tenure: 6 Months
-Interest Rate 2.4% Per Month
-Processing Fee (6%): ₹600 + GST (18%): ₹708
-Interest: ₹844
-EMI: ₹1807
-Total Repayment: ₹11,550 (includes processing fee + GST)
*Interest rates may vary based on the borrower's risk profile.

*2. UPI*
Simplify money transfers with UPI-enabled True Balance Wallet (NPCI Approved).
●UPI Features
●Quickly transfers money to anyone, anytime
●Pay bills and recharge online
●24x7 access to digital payments to merchants
●Pan-India Service
●Interoperable personal loan app - Send money using your mobile number via UPI-enabled True Balance Wallet, including to those who are not on True Balance

How to Apply for a Personal Loan?
●Install the True Balance app.
●Register with your contact number to log in.
●Complete basic details to check loan eligibility.
●Submit KYC documents and apply for a quick loan.
●Receive the approved loan amount directly in your bank account.

Lending Partner Details (Loans facilitated by RBI-licensed NBFCs)
●True Credits Pvt. Ltd.
●InCred Financial Services Limited
●Grow Money Capital Pvt. Ltd.
●Vivriti Capital Limited
●Northern Arc Capital Limited
●Lendbox (Transactree Technologies Pvt. Ltd.)
●Oxyzo Financial Services Limited

App Permissions and Reasons
●Location: For suitable online loan offers & Video KYC.
●SMS: For phone number verification & SIM binding for PPI interoperability.
●Camera: For KYC documentation & Video KYC.
●Phone Info: To prevent fraud.
●Microphone: For video KYC.

Contact Information
Address: The Circle Work, 5th Floor, Huda City Centre Metro Station, Sector 29, Gurugram, Haryana 122001, India. Email:  cs@balancehero.com

Additional Information
-A fully online and secure process with a 4.4-star rating.
-Highly secured and encrypted system for customer data.
-Privacy Policy: [True Balance Privacy Policy]
-Note: Terms and Conditions Apply!
