description:
NFC EMV Card Reader reads and stores data and information from contactless payment cards (credit, debit, prepaid, etc...) on your Android based device.
Using this application you can read data from your existing plastic or digital payment card.

Features (or what you are able to do):
• Read, store & manage multiple payment cards
• View accessible application data & records
• Extract sensitive payment cards information
• View "Track 2" data (which is most actively used in payment card processing)
• Take a look at the last made transactions

Additional information:
• POS/POP terminals all around the world use the EMV standard to process contactless transactions.
Using this application you will be able to see an example communication between a POS/POP device and the payment card you want to read.
• Important - No fees are charged for using this application.
It also means that the payment cards you read will NOT be charged at all.
• The application can be mainly used for references or analysis.
• If you are going to read digital payment card data from another Android device (for example from Google Pay, Android Pay or other digital wallet app), you have to disable Android Beam on both devices before you get started.

Before you start reading:
• Make sure payment card(s) you want to read is/are contactless (RFID logo printed on it).
• Make sure payment card(s) is/are currently supported by this application.
• Enable NFC (Near-field communication) from Settings (if it is not enabled).

Security notes:
• Application uses only "NFC"  and "VIBRATE" permissions. There is no "INTERNET" permission. It means that no data is being sent & stored by the developer.
• Payment cards data is stored privately into a database on the device used as reader.

Technical information:
• Operating device must have NFC hardware which is required for this application.

Legal disclaimer:
• This software must only be used to read your own payment cards where legally appropriate. It must not be used for illegal purposes.
• This software is provided without any warranty and shall be used at your own risk. The risk is small but your payment cards may become unusable.

Subsidiaries or/and trademarks:
• All payment cards names are subsidiaries or/and registered trademarks of companies, which are not bound by this software.

Other information:
• No ads
• No in-app purchases
• Contact me on email if you have any issues or feature requests (n37sn4k3@gmail.com)

Privacy policy (available at) URL: https://sites.google.com/view/nfc-emv-card-reader

developer.name: Viliyan Vasilev
developer.legalAddress: Sofia, Bulgaria

description: Open by Axis Bank is a safe, secure and user friendly mobile banking application with 250+ cutting edge features and services satisfying more than just your regular banking queries. Online Digital Savings Account Now open a savings account online at your convenience! The latest version of open by Axis Bank allows you to get your digital savings account up and running from anywhere, with services such as video based KYC that can be set up at your convenience. You will also be instantly issued a Virtual Debit Card linked to your Digital Savings Account! What’s more, you can enjoy various offers on your Digital Savings Account with Grab Deals, Axis Bank’s shopping portal. Banking Transactions Simplified Banking needs are often subjective to individuals, some prefer to get a comprehensive update of all their financial activities while others simply wish to check their savings account balance; so why shouldn’t your app be the same? Get a customisable dashboard on open by Axis Bank with the explore tab that grants you a one-stop access to your account balances as well as regularly used features like mutual fund investments, dues and more! Apart from an interactive dashboard you also set-up a 6 digit MPIN when using open by Axis Bank. This is a cross platform security code that can help you validate fund transfers from your savings account and transactions on your App, as well as log in to internet banking and authenticate Debit/Credit Card payments. The Bhim Unified Payment Interface (UPI) is also enabled on Axis Bank, letting you make UPI payments, Add Payees, Scan & Pay instantly as well as Make Your Own UPI QR Code. UPI ID is a unique ID that is used to make UPI payments in place of bank account details. UPI PIN is a 4- or 6-digit number which needs to be set by you while creating your UPI ID. Please don’t share your UPI PIN. Additionally, you can also find a record of transactions made for your ready reference via: • UPI Transaction history • Savings Account summary • Card Statements • Utility Bill Payments made to over 200 registered billers Avail Services at One Touch Whether it’s a Mutual Fund you seek to start or open FDs & RDs, open by Axis Bank lets you do that and more! Experience a newly re-vamped Mutual Fund journey along with instant opening of Digital Savings Accounts, access to Insurance services & Credit Card application. Alternatively, if you’re seeking to avail funds instead of investing them, get instantly sanctioned pre-approved 24x7 loans! One can easily avail 100% digital Personal Loan as well in few simple steps. Apart from new ones, you can also easily access and control existing services such as your Savings Account /Loan statements, Forex, Demat and Mutual Fund details, Credit and Debit Cards statements or converting your Credit Card dues into EMI. Go beyond everyday banking Now that banking services are covered, what next? Glad you asked! Enjoy deals on various brands across lifestyle, travel and more with grab deals on the Axis Mobile App, open. Not only can Axis Bank customers be eligible for these offers but on having specific products such as the Full Power Digital Savings Account you can avail for exclusive cashback! You can also browse through the Open Access blog for timely and thematic reads on all things related to personal finance. If you have queries that need to be resolved at a branch, use the app’s branch locator feature to know where the nearest Axis Bank branch is! And while there may be more features for you to unpack, we welcome you to join open by Axis Bank and explore them as per your preferences. For any feedback, queries or issues pertaining to Axis Mobile application please write to customer.service@axisbank.com or call us @ 1860-419-5555 For any other details please visit https://www.axisbank.com/bank-smart/open-by-axis-bank

description:
⭐ Manage Your Finances Effortlessly with Money Manager ⭐

Money Manager - Expense Tracker App is your ultimate solution for simple money management, helping you track daily spending and expenses with ease. Our comprehensive Expense Tracker App ensures you know exactly where your money goes, assisting you in controlling spending and saving more. This free app offers not only a user-friendly spending tracker but also numerous features to simplify all aspects of financial management. With Money Manager - Expense Tracker App, managing your finances becomes as easy as pie! Separate your work, family, and personal finances with different accounts, and customize categories to suit your needs. Don't like the old categories? Delete them and create new ones to personalize your experience.

⭐ Key Features of Money Manager - Expense Tracker App: ⭐

✅ Total Balance: Automatically calculate the total balance of all your wallets from the day you start using this Budget Planner, so you never have to manually check each wallet's amount again. ✅ View Transaction and Balance by Date: Track your earnings and expenses daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, or even between two specific dates, saving you the hassle of manual calculations. ✅ Multiple Accounts: Manage work, personal, and family finances separately with as many accounts as you like. ✅ Multiple Wallets: Track cash flow from different banks, cards, e-wallets, and cash effortlessly. ✅ Flexible Categories: Adapt categories based on your needs. Color-code your account book (Money Manager) to make it visually appealing. ✅ Statistics: Gain insights into your financial situation, understanding your spending patterns through intuitive categories. ✅ Budget Planning App: Set budgets to control your spending and receive alerts when you reach your threshold with this Budget Planner. ✅ Savings Goals: Challenge yourself to achieve financial goals by setting targets and tracking your progress. ✅ Debt Management: Record and remind yourself of every transaction you owe to someone. ✅ Password Protection: Secure your financial records with a 4-digit password. ✅ Search Feature: Easily find specific expense or income records with the search functionality. ✅ Export to CSV/Excel: Backup or print records by exporting them into CSV or Excel files for ease of use. Whether you're in the accounting field or just want to excel in financial management, this app will benefit you in many ways. Be your own accountant without needing a physical account book. Start tracking your daily expenses by downloading the best Spending Manager and Budget Planning app now!

My Budget Book helps you manage your money more effectively through easy recording of your income and expenses.

Using the individual or recurring transaction features, you’re able to track and forecast your balances. You can also visualize your records with dynamic charts and graphs.

Budget mode allows you to set limits or goals, over custom periods of time. Buying too much clothing? Set a monthly cap. Spending too much on coffee-to-go? Set a weekly limit. Saving for a dream vacation? Set a savings target for every two weeks. Define limits for credit card accounts or other payment types. You can even toggle “rollover” for your budgets – account for every bit owed or saved!

Highlights:
• Offline: no Internet permission, to protect your privacy. (But you can easily share backups to the cloud.*)
• No advertising or hidden in-app costs (only voluntary donations).
• Personalize your Material Design layout including configurable dark mode.
• Comprehensive views, with convenient tabs and a wide variety of sorting options.
• Easily visualize your data as tables or graphs, understanding your income and expenses in a new way.
• Manage multiple accounts and make transfers between them.
• Customize your categories and subcategories to accurately reflect your unique situation.
• Enable sorting that distinguishes specific categories, payment types, people, or groups.
• Add photos or receipts to your transactions, to remember transaction details or reduce paper clutter.
• Use reminders to help you make pending payments on time.
• Set the beginning of the month based on your regular salary (e.g. the 1st or the 15th).
• Reconcile your expenses with your bank statement.
• Create your own templates to make transaction entry even easier.
• Protect your sensitive data with a password or fingerprint (optional).
• Import existing data or bank statements using the CSV import (other formats may be made available on request).
• Export your data as an HTML, Excel, or CSV file, so you may view or print them with your computer.
• Automatic local backups so you never lose your data. (Create your own any time as well.)
• 4 widgets bring convenience to your home screen.

An integrated and comprehensive manual helps you make the most of the features – if you can’t find it there, support is only an e-mail away.

*Again, for security reasons, there is no Internet permission. To use the app on multiple devices, or to add automatic backups to your cloud, please read the chapter Synchronization in the integrated manual.

My Budget Book is under active development, and improving your experience is a priority. Please feel free to test the app for a month. If it doesn’t fit your needs, just send an e-mail and you will get your money back.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please send a message via the integrated Support function.

Am Frache 19
44229 Dortmund

description:
BANKING FOR PROFESSIONALS

With Banking4 (formerly Banking 4A) you have all your accounts under control across all banks - simply, reliably and securely.

Perfectly categorized and accessible for many years: split bookings, freely definable categories and dynamic rules simplify the detailed evaluation of sales - simply and almost fully automatically.

Your sensitive financial data is safe in the highly encrypted data vault - and with Dropbox or WebDAV it can even be used across platforms.

No other app can do so much: For example, access real electronic account statements as PDFs.

Security is very important: Banking4 stands for particularly secure online banking: Of course, the new chip TAN, smart TAN and mobile TAN procedures are supported as well as the classic TAN procedures.

CHARACTERISTICS

• Current account, daily money, savings book, securities account, credit card, fixed-term deposit, currency account, offline account, cash balance
• Balance, sales, transfer, forward orders, standing orders, international transfer
• Photo transfer
• Split bookings and freely definable categories
• Retrieval of electronic account statements
• Convenient search and filtering of account transactions
• Creating PDF printouts
• Bank connection via FinTS
• Take a photo of the transfer from the QR code

PERMISSIONS

• Storage: For access to documents and downloads for storage, import and export
• Camera: For photo transfers and QR code transfers
• Bluetooth: For Bluetooth ChipTAN readers
• Location: For pairing with Bluetooth ChipTAN readers from Android 6.0

description: Tilla is your new app to keep track of all your subscriptions without any limitations. Manage your subscriptions and get notified when a bill is due. Easily add your subscription Tracking your subscriptions has never been easier, just choose any from the bundled subscriptions or add your own, fill in the simple details and you are ready to go, Tilla will do the rest for you! Your subscriptions are in your hands Tilla provides a clear overview of all your subscriptions and upcoming payments. You will always know the amount of money spent every month on the subscriptions and never miss a payment date. Get notified Tilla also notifies you when a bill date is due, so you will never have to deal with late payment fees you didn't know about. Reminders are also are highly customizable for your comfort. Even more features with "Premium" • Unlimited count of subscriptions; • Track and optimize your spendings with "Analytics"; • Cloud synchronization between devices; • Local backups on a device; • And more features coming in the future! FAQ and localization Looking for answers to frequently asked questions (FAQ)? Visit this page: https://pavlorekun.dev/tilla/faq/ Want to help in Tilla localization? description:
"OKX Wallet is a secure multichain self-custodial wallet, designed for everything crypto and preferred by both crypto enthusiasts and newcomers alike. It’s a new alternative to personal asset management and asset security. You can use OKX Wallet to access 100,000+ tokens across major blockchains like Ethereum and Solana, as well as various DeFi positions and other Web3 opportunities. We’ve fully integrated with thousands of DApps and Web3 ecosystems. If it’s onchain, it’s on OKX Wallet.

Security through transparency: 

● Equipped with robust security measures to protect our users’ assets and privacy with cutting-edge blockchain technology.
● Risk interception systems that can warn users against purchases of fake tokens and high-risk transactions, while we proactively detect and alert users of phishing sites.
● Additional safety features to reinforce private key security. 
● OKX Wallet undergoes rigorous audits by multiple top-tier third-party agencies, such as Slowmist, ensuring unparalleled protection for our users. The core code for our wallet and DEX is available on GitHub for anyone to review.

Monitor multichain assets in just one app:

● OKX Wallet’s asset management gives you a comprehensive view of all your onchain holdings, including various tokens and DeFi assets on 120+ supported networks.
● PnL analysis to help you track your asset growth, whether it’s from trading tokens, DeFi staking, or airdrops and giveaways.
● Advanced features such as meme coin support, testnet faucets, multisender, cloud backup, custom network, hardware wallet, and inscription tools are here to offer our users an all-encompassing Web3 experience.

Feel the pulse of the token market: 

● OKX Wallet’s Tokens feature is a comprehensive multi-platform tool that helps you monitor onchain token trends and discover market opportunities.
● Streamlined market research with real-time token discovery, trading pattern analysis, and powerful trading tools.
● Optimized Meme Pump section for meme coin traders that don’t want to miss any potential opportunities.

Trade safe, trade easy, trade fast:

● In-app DEX aggregator connects you to 500+ decentralized exchanges across 40+ blockchains. 
● Supports market orders, meme trades, and non-custodial limit orders and strategy orders. You can trade with great speed and flexibility without compromising self-custody.
● Diverse set of trading modes, including Meme Mode, Easy Mode, and Advanced Mode, made accessible across our app, web, Telegram, and browser extension. Additionally, OKX Wallet provides state-of-the-art token bridging services, supporting 27 bridges across 25 blockchains.

Discover your favorite DApps while learning and earning:

● OKX Discover is a prime exploration hub for trending DApps with cross-platform support. Through the Cryptoverse feature, you can also find out about all the latest onchain projects and events, and win rewards by completing interactive tasks.

Don’t want to be a HODLer? Try DeFi:

● OKX DeFi Earn is a one-stop DeFi aggregator that supports 30+ networks and 170+ protocols. It’s packed with DeFi staking opportunities for popular assets such as USDT, USDC, ETH, and SOL. You can complete subscriptions and redemptions on a single platform. In addition, users on OKX DeFi Earn can enjoy exclusive bonus APYs from third-party protocols.

To learn more, please visit web3.okx.com and refer to the OKX Web3 Ecosystem Terms of Service.
If you have any questions or concerns, please don’t hesitate to contact us at wallet@okx.com."
summary: Easily Buy, Sell & Trade Bitcoin, Ethereum & other Crypto - Web3 Wallet

description: Find the free version of Smart Budget here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.SmartBudget.GoldFlyApps Smart Budget Plus: Ultimate Expense Tracking & Money Management Without Ads Discover the premium experience of Smart Budget Plus, the ad-free version of the highly acclaimed Smart Budget app. With Smart Budget Plus, enjoy all the robust features of the free version, enhanced by an uninterrupted, ad-free environment. This version is designed for users who seek to optimize their financial management without distractions, providing a more streamlined and focused approach to personal finance. Smart Budget Plus mirrors the functionality of its free counterpart, offering the same intuitive expense tracking system, comprehensive financial overview, and detailed insights into your spending habits. Elevate your money management with advanced features and enjoy the simplicity of managing your finances without ads. Smart Budget Plus is available in multiple languages, including English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Italian, Russian, Bahasa Indonesia, Chinese, and more. Experience the full potential of Smart Budget Plus and take your financial management to the next level: 👉 Ad-Free Environment: Focus on your finances without interruptions, ensuring a seamless user experience. 👉 All the Features You Love: Access all the powerful tools and features of the free version without any compromises. 👉 Enhanced User Experience: Enjoy a cleaner interface and faster performance, optimized for efficient money management. Plus all the great features from Smart Budget: 📌 Real-time Balance Insight 📌 Advanced Expense Tracking 📌 Transaction Histories 📌 Multiple Account Types 📌 Diverse Funding Sources 📌 Customizable Expense Categories 📌 In-depth Financial Insights 📌 Budget Notifications 📌 Savings Goals 📌 Debt Management 📌 Enhanced Security 📌 Quick Lookup 📌 Backup Export Options Smart Budget Plus is your gateway to achieving financial clarity and mastering your money management, now in an ad-free format. Upgrade to the Plus version for an even more powerful and distraction-free financial planning tool. Important Note: Before installing or uninstalling Smart Budget or Smart Budget Plus, it is crucial to export a backup of your data. Whether you're upgrading to Smart Budget Plus or need to reinstall the app, exporting your data will allow you to easily restore your financial records without losing any vital information.

description:
You can recharge gift certificates through your account, and within the recharged balance, you can freely make payments at Onnuri Gift Certificate online/offline affiliated stores nationwide using the app or registered payment card, and check the payment details.
Enjoy advanced discounts as well as additional discounts from affiliated stores.

■ Charging
You can recharge through your account.
You can recharge by registering up to 10 recharge accounts in advance.
Recharged gift certificates can be canceled or refunded according to policy.
■ Payment
You can pay with QR at offline Onnuri gift certificate stores nationwide.
You can make payments without the app using a pre-registered payment card.
Online payments can be made at affiliated malls accessible within the app.
You can also check payment details online and offline.
Make a secure payment after authenticating using the registered authentication method (simple password, fingerprint, pattern, etc.).
■ gift
You can give an Onnuri gift certificate as a gift as long as you know your name and mobile phone number within the recharged gift certificate balance.
Gift certificates received from friends and companies can be used immediately.
■ Affiliate store mode 
Merchant owners can apply for Onnuri gift certificates through the app.
Once your franchise application is approved, you can switch between individual and franchise modes through franchise mode.
In franchise mode, you can manage employees, sales/settlement details, and franchise details.

※ Please use with confidence.
Obtained the Financial Security Institute Information Security Personal Information Management System (ISMS-P) certification.
We applied the Abnormal Transaction Detection System (FDS).

※ I will only check the necessary permissions.
 - (Required) Phone: Used to verify mobile phone identity, make calls, and verify authentication authority. 
 - (Required) Camera: You can attach it after scanning the QR code and taking a photo.
 - (Optional) Files and Media: When running the app, you can access security solutions and attach photos or files.
 - (Optional) Contact information: You can gift it to your mobile phone contact information.
 - (Optional) Location: You can find affiliated stores near your location.
 - (Optional) Notifications: You can receive payment notifications, important notices, and promotion notifications.

 * The consented permissions can be revoked (denied) for each access permission by selecting [Settings > Digital Onnuri Gift Certificate App] on the mobile phone.

developer.name: KOMSCO
developer.legalAddress: 대전광역시 유성구 과학로 80-67

description:
Implements all functionalities of RPN Financial Calculator.

Financial calculator includes more than 120 built-in functions and allows 20 different cash flows for internal rate of return and net present values. Calculate loan and mortgage payments, convert interest rates, and figure bond prices and yields. RPN keystrokes optimize data entry and calculation performance. Program up to 99 keystrokes into memory and then execute with the push of a single button. Other functions include depreciation, percent change, cumulative statistical analysis, standard deviation, mean, weighted mean, linear regression, forecasting, correlation coefficient, date arithmetic, undo and backspace keys.

Number of Display Lines: 1
Number of Display Digits: 10
Number of Functions: 120
Operations/Functionality:
- Accounting

- Real Estate

description: Wallet is the all-in-one personal finance manager built to help you save money and plan for the future. Connect your bank accounts to track expenses automatically and know where every dollar is going. Dive into in-depth reports on your spending and cash flow to help you effectively manage your money. Wallet allows you to see your finances your way: anywhere, any time. Key Features 🔗 Connect accounts and manage all things finance in one comprehensive dashboard 💰 Take control of your money with custom budgets 👀 Keep track of your monthly bills and subscriptions 📊 Monitor your cash flow and balance trend 📈 Track stocks alongside your other accounts 💸 Manage savings to plan for your future 🔮 Get Insightful reports and financial tips 🕹 Customize your dashboard to see what matters most to you 📣 Avoid overspending with predictive alerts 🤝 Share accounts and track together with family and friends Your Finances in One Place Wallet is the money manager and bill tracker designed to help you from day one. Unlike other simple budget planners and expense trackers, Wallet provides continuous financial insights. Utilize in depth reports and statistics on all your spending, accounts and investments to gain full control of your finances and always know where you stand. Time to toss your notebooks and spreadsheets, and get empowered to budget for clear, tangible goals that are easy to track in real-time. Whether you need to save money until payday or budget for the long-term, Wallet is flexible for your changing needs. Track your stock portfolio in Wallet and combine your stock holdings with other assets and grow your wealth by building a diversified portfolio of stocks, ETFs and other funds. You can easily control your spending, budget, and save more money using this finance tracker and bill organizer. Switching from another finance app? Export your data from your previous app and easily import it to Wallet to keep your financial history. Take control of your finances with Wallet 🔗Automatic Bank Updates - Track where every dollar is going by seamlessly connecting your accounts. Transactions are automatically and securely synced, then smartly categorized, and factored into your budget. With 3,500 participating banks worldwide, you’ll save loads of time not having to track every penny by tracking all your finances in one place. 💰Flexible Budgets - Whatever it is you need to accomplish, from paying off debt to buying a car or saving for retirement, this budgeting app offers the flexibility to meet your goals and cleverly react to any changing financial circumstances. With Wallet, budgeting expenses has never been easier. ⏰Planned Payments - Never miss a due date with this bill tracker. Organize bills and subscriptions and keep track of due dates. See upcoming payments and how the payments will impact your cash flow. 🤝Sharing selected accounts - Selected accounts can be shared with your spouse, family, friends or colleagues who need to cooperate on a budget. Whether you’re buying your first home with your partner or managing household costs with roommates, everyone can contribute from any platform. Track your spending together! 📊Insightful reports - Wallet's financial overviews give you actionable insights about the state of your finances, across accounts, cards, debts and cash. Gain insights on where you should be budgeting more or could save more money. 🗂Imports or Manual Updates - You can now import all your transaction data from sources of your choice so you will get a full report for simple expense tracking. Be it from your bank or your own spreadsheets. 💱Multicurrency - Multicurrency accounts and worldwide bank coverage makes Wallet the perfect partner for expats, international students and travelers. How to start using Wallet: 1. Download the app 2. Sign In Via Facebook or Google 3. Get going: budget and track expenses like a pro!
summary: All-in-one personal finance app: Budget, track bills, spend smarter & save money
title: Wallet: Budget Expense Tracker

extra.descriptionHTML:
Wallet is the all-in-one personal finance manager built to help you save money and plan for the future. Connect your bank accounts to track expenses automatically and know where every dollar is going. Dive into in-depth reports on your spending and cash flow to help you effectively manage your money.

Your Finances in One Place

Wallet is the money manager and bill tracker designed to help you from day one. Unlike other simple budget planners and expense trackers, Wallet provides continuous financial insights. Utilize in depth reports and statistics on all your spending, accounts and investments to gain full control of your finances and always know where you stand. Time to toss your notebooks and spreadsheets, and get empowered to budget for clear, tangible goals that are easy to track in real-time.

Whether you need to save money until payday or budget for the long-term, Wallet is flexible for your changing needs. Track your stock portfolio in Wallet and combine your stock holdings with other assets and grow your wealth by building a diversified portfolio of stocks, ETFs and other funds.

You can easily control your spending, budget, and save more money using this finance tracker and bill organizer.

Switching from another finance app? Export your data from your previous app and easily import it to Wallet to keep your financial history.

Take control of your finances with Wallet

🔗Automatic Bank Updates - Track where every dollar is going by seamlessly connecting your accounts. Transactions are automatically and securely synced, then smartly categorized, and factored into your budget. With 3,500 participating banks worldwide, you’ll save loads of time not having to track every penny by tracking all your finances in one place.

💰Flexible Budgets - Whatever it is you need to accomplish, from paying off debt to buying a car or saving for retirement, this budgeting app offers the flexibility to meet your goals and cleverly react to any changing financial circumstances. With Wallet, budgeting expenses has never been easier.

⏰Planned Payments - Never miss a due date with this bill tracker. Organize bills and subscriptions and keep track of due dates. See upcoming payments and how the payments will impact your cash flow.

🤝Sharing selected accounts - Selected accounts can be shared with your spouse, family, friends or colleagues who need to cooperate on a budget. Whether you’re buying your first home with your partner or managing household costs with roommates, everyone can contribute from any platform. Track your spending together!

📊Insightful reports - Wallet's financial overviews give you actionable insights about the state of your finances, across accounts, cards, debts and cash. Gain insights on where you should be budgeting more or could save more money.

🗂Imports or Manual Updates - You can now import all your transaction data from sources of your choice so you will get a full report for simple expense tracking. Be it from your bank or your own spreadsheets.

💱Multicurrency - Multicurrency accounts and worldwide bank coverage makes Wallet the perfect partner for expats, international students and travelers.

How to start using Wallet:

1. Download the app
2. Sign In Via Facebook or Google
3. Get going: budget and track expenses like a pro!

description:
This is the Pro version of Karl's Mortgage Calculator. The only change from the free version is that the adverts have been removed.

Calculate mortgage payments given principal, interest and term. Reverse calculate any one variable given the other three.

Enter a down payment amount or percentage and let the calculator show how large a mortgage you require.

See how the monthly payment changes when you factor in additional monthly or annual loan costs such as PMI, HOA, taxes and insurance.

The calculator supports Fixed and Adjustable Rate Mortgages (ARM) loans with up to five changes in interest rates. Interest-only mortgages loans are also supported.

You can pay off your mortgage early with extra payments. Add one-off, monthly and annual extra payments. Choose up to six additional extra payment amounts and payment periods and the calculator will show how much money you can save on the loan.

Choose from weekly to annual loan payments and adjust the compounding period from daily through annual periods. The calculator supports Canadian mortgages along with UK annual rest mortgages.

Multiple rounding options on loan calculations are also available. Choose between no rounding, round half up, half down, to even, to ceiling and to floor.

The calculator also supports the input and display of multiple currencies.

developer.name: Dr Karl Jeacle
developer.legalAddress: 29 Glenbourne Road, Leopardstown Valley, Dublin 18, Ireland

description:
CrediTrack is an innovative Internet financial application. Through advanced data analysis technology, CrediTrack can assess users' credit status, provide personalized credit scores and suggestions, and help users better understand their credit history.
CrediTrack allows users to easily control their personal finances and make wise financial decisions. Whether it is an individual who wants to improve their credit score or a family who wants to better manage their finances, CrediTrack is an ideal partner dedicated to promoting users to achieve financial freedom and security.

Main functions of CrediTrack:
Credit assessment: Real-time analysis of users' credit history, providing personalized credit scores and improvement suggestions.
Financial information: Recommend financial information to users to help users grasp financial trends.
Data security: Ensure the security and privacy of user information, and use advanced encryption technology to protect personal data.

Advantages of CrediTrack:
Personalized experience: Provide customized financial advice based on the user's financial status and goals.
Intelligent credit assessment: Provide accurate credit scores and improvement suggestions through automated analysis.
Online Customer Service: Answer your questions at any time and provide professional consulting services.

CrediTrack reminds you:
As an intelligent assistant, the information and suggestions I provide are for reference only. We are not affiliated with any bank or official lending institution. We only provide advice and do not participate in any disputes you may have with other financial institutions. Please always act with caution and make decisions based on your own judgment and circumstances.

Contact CrediTrack:
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us!
Contact email: user@ekjoyintlco.com
Working hours: Monday to Saturday 9:00-18:00
Contact address: 50/7 Moo 2 BANG LAMUNG, CHON BURI, 20150 Thailand

description: SBI Quick – MISSED CALL BANKING is an app from SBI which provides Banking services by giving a Missed Call or sending an SMS with pre-defined keywords to pre-defined mobile numbers. This service can only be activated for the mobile number that is registered for a particular account with the Bank. SBI Quick Services include: Account Services: 1. Balance Enquiry 2. Mini Statement 3. Cheque book request 4. 6 month's e-Statement of A/c 5. Education Loan Interest e-Certificate 6. Home Loan Interest e-Certificate ATM Card Management 1. Blocking of ATM Card 2. ATM Card Usage (International / Domestic) ON/OFF 3. ATM Card Channel (ATM/POS/eCommerce) ON/OFF 4. Generate Green PIN for ATM -cum-Debit card Mobile Top-up / Recharge - Mobile topup/recharge can be done for your mobile number registered with Bank (MOBRC ) - Send the activation code received on mobile handset immediately to successfully complete the process Prime Minister Social Security Schemes - Subscription to PM’s Social Security Schemes (PMJJBY & PMSBY) SBI Holiday Calendar ATM-Branch Locator (SBI Finder - Now find address and location of SBI Branches, ATMs, Cash Deposit Machines and CSP (Customer service point)) Rate Us – Rate us in PlayStore FAQs What If I have two account numbers with the Bank with the same mobile number mentioned on both? You can register 1 mobile number for any one of the accounts. If you want to change the mapped account number, you first need to de-register SBI Quick from the first account and then register for the second one. Is it mandatory that the mobile number to be used for SBI Quick has to be registered with the Bank for that particular account? Yes. If not done, visit Home Branch and update mobile number. Is it available for all types of Accounts? SBI Quick is currently available for SB/CA/OD/CC accounts. How is this facility different from Yono Lite or Yono? There are 2 distinct differences: 1. You don’t need a Login ID, Password to use this facility. Just one time registration from the mobile number recorded with Bank for that particular Account. 2. SBI Quick only provides Enquiry and ATM Block services. Unlike State Bank Anywhere or State Bank Freedom there are no transaction services available. Is there any limit of the number of enquiries that can be made in a day/month? As of now there is no such restriction. Unlimited. What are the Charges for this service? 1. The service is currently free of charge from the Bank. 2. A call for balance inquiry or mini statement will include an IVR message of 4 seconds which will be heard after 3-4 rings. a. If you disconnect the call while ringing, no charge will be recovered from you by the service provider. b. If you keep the call active till the IVR is played, you will be charged for these 3-4 seconds as per their mobile tariff plan. 3. Any SMS sent to 567676 e.g. for Blocking ATM Card will be charged at premium rates by your service provider. 4. Similarly, for availing the benefits of this functionality by sending an SMS (as BAL, MSTMT, REG, DREG, CAR, HOME, HELP), you will be charged for SMS as per their mobile tariff plan. FAQs of ATM-Branch Locator (SBI Finder) Now find address and location of SBI Branches, ATMs, Cash Deposit Machines and CSP (Customer service point) through SBI Quick. User can navigate based on the set location, selected Category and radius. A user can set either his/her current location as captured through GPS or He/She can set location manually. User can also find the directions to reach SBI Branches, ATM, Cash Deposit Machine and CSP (Customer service point) through this app. Categories: 1. ATM 2. CDM (Cash Deposit Machine) 3. Recyclers (Both Cash Deposit and dispensing point) 4. Branch 5. Cash@CSP Result of any search is available in two views: 1. Map View 2. List View
summary: Missed Call Banking & SMS Banking with SBI Finder, Holiday Calendar & Samadhaan.
title: SBI Quick

extra.descriptionHTML:
SBI Quick – MISSED CALL BANKING is an app from SBI which provides Banking services by giving a Missed Call or sending an SMS with pre-defined keywords to pre-defined mobile numbers.
This service can only be activated for the mobile number that is registered for a particular account with the Bank.

SBI Quick Services include:
Account Services:
1. Balance Enquiry
2. Mini Statement
3. Cheque book request
4. 6 month's e-Statement of A/c
5. Education Loan Interest e-Certificate
6. Home Loan Interest e-Certificate
ATM Card Management
1. Blocking of ATM Card
2. ATM Card Usage (International / Domestic) ON/OFF
3. ATM Card Channel (ATM/POS/eCommerce) ON/OFF
4. Generate Green PIN for ATM -cum-Debit card
Mobile Top-up / Recharge
- Mobile topup/recharge can be done for your mobile number registered with Bank (MOBRC )
- Send the activation code received on mobile handset immediately to successfully complete the process

Prime Minister Social Security Schemes
- Subscription to PM’s Social Security Schemes (PMJJBY & PMSBY)
SBI Holiday Calendar
ATM-Branch Locator (SBI Finder - Now find address and location of SBI Branches, ATMs, Cash Deposit Machines and CSP (Customer service point))
Rate Us – Rate us in PlayStore

FAQs
What If I have two account numbers with the Bank with the same mobile number mentioned on both?
You can register 1 mobile number for any one of the accounts. If you want to change the mapped account number, you first need to de-register SBI Quick from the first account and then register for the second one.

Is it mandatory that the mobile number to be used for SBI Quick has to be registered with the Bank for that particular account?
Yes. If not done, visit Home Branch and update mobile number.

Is it available for all types of Accounts?
SBI Quick is currently available for SB/CA/OD/CC accounts.

How is this facility different from Yono Lite or Yono?
There are 2 distinct differences:
1. You don’t need a Login ID, Password to use this facility. Just one time registration from the mobile number recorded with Bank for that particular Account.
2. SBI Quick only provides Enquiry and ATM Block services. Unlike State Bank Anywhere or State Bank Freedom there are no transaction services available.

Is there any limit of the number of enquiries that can be made in a day/month?
As of now there is no such restriction. Unlimited.

What are the Charges for this service?
1. The service is currently free of charge from the Bank.
2. A call for balance inquiry or mini statement will include an IVR message of 4 seconds which will be heard after 3-4 rings.
a. If you disconnect the call while ringing, no charge will be recovered from you by the service provider.
b. If you keep the call active till the IVR is played, you will be charged for these 3-4 seconds as per their mobile tariff plan.
3. Any SMS sent to 567676 e.g. for Blocking ATM Card will be charged at premium rates by your service provider.
4. Similarly, for availing the benefits of this functionality by sending an SMS (as BAL, MSTMT, REG, DREG, CAR, HOME, HELP), you will be charged for SMS as per their mobile tariff plan.

FAQs of ATM-Branch Locator (SBI Finder)
Now find address and location of SBI Branches, ATMs, Cash Deposit Machines and CSP (Customer service point) through SBI Quick.
User can navigate based on the set location, selected Category and radius.
A user can set either his/her current location as captured through GPS or He/She can set location manually.
User can also find the directions to reach SBI Branches, ATM, Cash Deposit Machine and CSP (Customer service point) through this app.

Categories:
1. ATM
2. CDM (Cash Deposit Machine)
3. Recyclers (Both Cash Deposit and dispensing point)
4. Branch
5. Cash@CSP

Result of any search is available in two views:
1. Map View
2. List View

Disclaimer: 
This application (Smart-All In One Calculator) is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or representative of any government entity including Life Insurance Corporation of India(LIC). It is important to note that this application does not represent the Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC).

This app is intended to be used as training material for agents and development officers of LIC to get a general idea of the premiums and benefits of the insurance plans.

The source of the premium details of the insurance policies of LIC of India is the website of LIC of India(www.licindia.in) and the specific link for the premium chart is accessible to the public without any restriction at LIC's Web site(www.licindia.in) under the head /PREMIUM CALCULATOR/ in the /HOME/ of the site.

The source of the benefit details of the insurance policies of LIC of India is the website of LIC of India(www.licindia.in) and the specific link for benefits of all plans is accessible to the public without any restriction at LIC's Web site(www.licindia.in) under the head /PRODUCTS/ in the /HOME/ of the site. The specific source of the information of each plan is from the Brochure available to download in this section.

Users are advised that the information contained within this application should be regarded as general guidance only. This app does not guarantee the completeness, reliability, or accuracy of the information. As such, users should always refer to the LIC's website, official brochures, documents, and announcements released by the Life Insurance Corporation of India for the most accurate and up-to-date information.

The developers of this application have made every effort to ensure compliance with the Misleading Claims policy of Google. We do not make any warranties about the completeness, reliability, or accuracy of this information. Any action you take upon the information you find in this application is strictly at your own risk, and we will not be liable for any losses and/or damages in connection with the use of our app.

You can refer to the detailed disclaimer on the /ABOUT/ page of the app.

The privacy policy is available on the /ABOUT/ Page of the app and at the website www.insurancefunda.in (www.insurancefunda.in/smart-all-in-one-calculator-privacy-policy/)

This application (Smart-All In One Calculator) is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or representative of any government entity including Life Insurance Corporation of India(LIC). It is important to note that this application does not represent the Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC).

This app is intended to be used as training material for agents and development officers of LIC to get a general idea of the premiums and benefits of the insurance plans.

The source of the premium details of the insurance policies of LIC of India is the website of LIC of India(www.licindia.in) and the specific link for the premium chart is accessible to the public without any restriction at LIC's Web site(www.licindia.in) under the head /PREMIUM CALCULATOR/ in the /HOME/ of the site.

The source of the benefit details of the insurance policies of LIC of India is the website of LIC of India(www.licindia.in) and the specific link for benefits of all plans is accessible to the public without any restriction at LIC's Web site(www.licindia.in) under the head /PRODUCTS/ in the /HOME/ of the site. The specific source of the information of each plan is from the Brochure available to download in this section.

Users are advised that the information contained within this application should be regarded as general guidance only. This app does not guarantee the completeness, reliability, or accuracy of the information. As such, users should always refer to the LIC's website, official brochures, documents, and announcements released by the Life Insurance Corporation of India for the most accurate and up-to-date information.

The developers of this application have made every effort to ensure compliance with the Misleading Claims policy of Google. We do not make any warranties about the completeness, reliability, or accuracy of this information. Any action you take upon the information you find in this application is strictly at your own risk, and we will not be liable for any losses and/or damages in connection with the use of our app.

You can refer to the detailed disclaimer on the /ABOUT/ page of the app.

The privacy policy is available on the /ABOUT/ Page of the app and at the website www.insurancefunda.in (www.insurancefunda.in/smart-all-in-one-calculator-privacy-policy/)

🚀🔥 OPTION SIGNALS APP 🔥🚀

Unlock Your Trading Potential with Real-Time Alerts!

📈 DAILY TRADE ALERTS:

	•	📲 OPTIONS ALERTS REAL TIME: Receive real-time buy/sell signals with targets and stop-losses. Our alerts include scalps, swings, and leaps, tailored for day traders, swing traders, and long-term investors. Signals are based on technical analysis, chart patterns, volume surges, market action, economic indicators, and stock news. Alerts cover Swing Signals, Lotto, Meme stocks, hedging, and more.
	•	💡 Use with any trading app like Robinhood, TD Ameritrade, Thinkorswim, Webull, E*TRADE, or a stock market simulator.
	•	🔄 Signals include calls and puts based on market trends, with 1-5 signals sent daily based on trade setups.

🔍 TECHNICAL ANALYSIS:

	•	📊 Stock Analyst Ratings: Get price targets, support and resistance levels. Use our target price and stop-loss calculator alongside support and resistance indicators.
	•	🛑 Stop Loss and Take Profit: Guidance provided with every alert.

📉 INTERACTIVE CHARTS:

	•	🕹️ Easy Stock Analysis: Line and candlestick charts available. Identify patterns with technical indicators like RSI, SMA, EMA, and VWAP.

🔍 SEARCH TOOL:

	•	🔎 Find Any Stock Ticker: Search NYSE, NASDAQ, OTC stocks, and futures for live quotes.

⭐ STOCKS WATCHLIST:

	•	🛠️ Trade Ideas Scanner: Find daily trade opportunities.
	•	📊 Stock and Options Alerts: Build your long-term portfolio with our signals.

⚠️ DISCLAIMER:

	•	📜 Trading Involves Risk: Swing trading, day trading, options trading, or buying stocks involves risk. Please review our terms and disclaimer in the app.

Download now and start making informed trading decisions with the Option Signals App!

description:
This is Ad-free edition of Expense Manager by Bishinews. You can review the free version before buying it. One click to transfer data from free version to pro version (Settings/Backup/Import Data from Free Edition).

Expense Tracking • Tracking expenses and incomes • Split Transaction - Record all items in a single transaction with different category and amount • Recurring expense and income • Multiple accounts • Taking a picture of receipt • Tracking tax • Tracking mileage • Tracking debts • Credit Card • Credit Card and bank SMS message parsing • Write, Print, and Email Checks Budget and Bill Organizing • Organizing bills by week, month and year as well as by categories • Schedule the payments and recurring payments • Payment alerts • Daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly budget with progress bar • Daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly summary • Calendar view for expense and income • Savings Goal • Fixed Income • Organizing Loan Search and Report • Search by category, subcategory, payee/payer, payment method, status, description, tag, etc. • Reports in HTML, CSV, Excel and PDF • Import and export account activities • Charts by category, subcategory, payee/payer, payment method, status, description, tag, date etc. • Email report for print Backup and Sync • Auto backup on Dropbox, Google Drive and SD Card • Automatic sync between devices via Dropbox Convenient tools • Currency converter • Regular calculator • Tip calculator • Loan calculator • Credit card payoff calculator • Interest calculator • Note • Shopping list Customization • User can easily customize background color, action bar color and button color. • Customizing date format • Customizing category and subcategory • Payment method, payee/payer, Tags, income category and status can be entered or updated by user • Multiple currencies support Connect to PC browser via WiFi • Export and Import data between phone and PC • Add Multiple records in one screen • View summary from multiple accounts • View charts in the big screen of PC browser Languages • English • German • French • Spanish • Portuguese • Russian • Italian • Turkish • Indonesian • Chinese (Simplified) • Chinese (Traditional) Others • Widgets: overview, summary, budget, calculator, quick add etc. • PIN protection • Active developer support • No registration and internet access are required. No other app can beat us on features. PERMISSIONS EXPLANATION • Storage: backup data in sdcard and external storage. Save purchase receipt in sdcard and external storage. • GET_ACCOUNTS: back up data on Google Drive • SMS: Parse SMS message from your credit card and bank and save it automatically in the app. If you don't use this feature, go to phone Settings/Apps/Expense Manager/Permissions to switch off SMS permission on phones with Android 6 and up. • ACCESS_WiFi_STATE: This permission allows PC connection via WiFi. If you don't need to use this app on a PC browser, you can disable this permission. Privacy Policy https://sites.google.com/site/expensemgr/privacy All data save inside your phone or your personal cloud account such as Google Drive and Dropbox when you connect to. Nobody but you can access your data. Please email question and feature request directly to developer at pfinanceapp@gmail.com.

PERMISSIONS EXPLANATION
• Storage: backup data in sdcard and external storage. Save purchase receipt in sdcard and external storage.
• GET_ACCOUNTS: back up data on Google Drive
• SMS: Parse SMS message from your credit card and bank and save it automatically in the app. If you don't use this feature, go to phone Settings/Apps/Expense Manager/Permissions to switch off SMS permission on phones with Android 6 and up.
• ACCESS_WiFi_STATE: This permission allows PC connection via WiFi. If you don't need to use this app on a PC browser, you can disable this permission.

Privacy Policy

https://sites.google.com/site/expensemgr/privacy

All data save inside your phone or your personal cloud account such as Google Drive and Dropbox when you connect to. Nobody but you can access your data.

description:
Welcome to Cent eeZ, the Omni-Channel app by the Central Bank of India.

Banking - Investments - Shopping - Insurance

B – Banking
Effortless banking at your fingertips:
     • Account Management
            Check account balances, view transaction history, and download detailed statements.
            Update personal details, profile photos, and email preferences.
     • Fund Transfers
            Transfer funds instantly via NEFT, RTGS, and IMPS.
            Add and manage beneficiaries with secure OTP-based verification.
     • Deposits & Loans
            Open Fixed and Recurring Deposits with attractive rates.
            Apply for, manage, and repay loans including personal, housing, vehicle, and education loans.
     • Debit Card Services
            Block/unblock your card, reset PINs, and set transaction limits—all securely.
     • Bill Payments & Utility Services
            Pay utility bills, manage billers, and set reminders for payments.
     • Cheque Management
            Request cheque books, stop payments, and perform positive pay checks.
     • Enhanced Security
            OTP-based authentication for transactions and real-time alerts.

I – Investments
Grow and manage your wealth with smart tools:
     • Wealth Management
          Access Mutual Funds, NPS, PMS, and Govt. schemes.
          Simplified SIPs starting at just ₹100 and paperless approvals.
          Analyze your portfolio: Total value, gains, and performance over time.
     • Intelligent Tools
          Smart calculators, fund fact sheets, and asset allocation models for smarter decision-making.
          Portfolio analysis with overall P&L, realized/unrealized gains, and % returns.
          Fund performance comparison with market indices and customizable timeframes.
     • Comprehensive Insights
          Access detailed investment insights with real-time market data and performance graphs.
     • SIP & Investment Flexibility
          Order multiple SIPs/lumpsum investments in a single go.
          Instant paperless mandate approval for SIPs.

S – Shopping & Rewards
Enjoy exclusive deals and rewards:
     • Reward Points
          Earn points on every transaction and redeem them for exclusive offers, gifts, and discounts.
          Track your rewards balance and usage with an intuitive dashboard.
     • Shopping
          Access special discounts and deals with partner merchants.
          Enjoy hassle-free payments and instant cashback offers.
     • Exclusive Offers
          Special seasonal deals and offers tailored to your shopping preferences.

I – Insurance
Secure your future with digital insurance solutions:
     • Instant Policies
          Buy life, health, motor, travel, cyber, and property insurance directly through the app.
     • 24/7 Access
          Manage policies, track claims, and update coverage anytime, anywhere.
     • Simplified Processes
          Instant policy issuance with simplified risk assessments.
          Hassle-free claims process and paperless management.
     • Personalized Coverage
          Customize coverage options to fit your unique needs and budget.

200+ Features for Smarter Finance Management

Cent eeZ combines over 200 features that enhance your banking, investment, shopping, and insurance experience, all from a single app. Key features include:
• Digital Onboarding for quick registration.
• Portfolio and asset management tools.
• Intelligent finance calculators and insights.
• Loan management, bill payment, and cheque book requests.
• Instant fund transfers, direct payments, and flexible bill reminders.
• Comprehensive customer support with instant chat via Cent Bot.
• Wealth management services with SIPs, mutual funds, NPS, and more.

Download Cent eeZ Today
Experience the future of banking with enhanced security, smarter investments, effortless shopping, and complete insurance coverage—all in one app. Available for Android (Version 9+).

RUPEE FINANCE, operated by KREDIT FINANCIAL CONSULTANTS PRIVATE LIMITED. And has partnered with authorized banks and VAISHALI SECURITIES LIMITED to offer efficient and compliant loan products and services. 

Requirements for applying for a loan
Indian citizens aged 18 or above
The maximum loan amount of our products: ₹100,000- ₹600,000
Loan term: 92 days-210 days
Annualized interest rate: 20%-24%

Why Choose RUPEE FINANCE?
Whether you're planning a trip, upgrading your home with new furniture or appliances, facing unexpected personal emergencies, paying bills, covering wedding expenses, handling home repairs, or dealing with medical costs and security deposits—RUPEE FINANCE is here to help.

As a reliable financial partner for every Indian, RUPEE FINANCE offers swift loans of up to ₹600,000. With adaptable repayment plans, we are the expert choice for shopping, renovations, bill payments, and cash flow management. Our goal is to provide straightforward and secure loan solutions, ensuring your life remains comfortable and stress-free.

Product Introduction
When you choose a loan of 120 days for ₹50,000, the fees are calculated at an annual interest rate of 21%, as follows:
Monthly interest rate 21% / 12 = 1.75%Monthly interest ₹50,000 * 1.75% = ₹875
Monthly repayment amount: ₹50,000 / 4 + ₹875 = ₹13,375
Total interest ₹50,000 * 120 * (21% / 360) = ₹3500
Total repayment amount: ₹50,000+ ₹3,500=₹53500

Loan Provider: VAISHALI SECURITIES LIMITED
Corporate Identification Number:
U65923GJ1995PLC026569
Phone Number：+91 9845339809
Website: https://www.vaishalisecuritiesltd.com/

Steps to get a loan:
1. Download RUPEE FINANCE on Googleplay
2. Register the APP with your mobile phone
3. Fill in the relevant loan information
4. After the review is passed, the loan amount will be directly deposited into your bank account

Contact Us
You can contact us at any time if you encounter any problems
Customer Service Email: contact@kreditfinancials.com
Company Address: 603 Shubham Apts12 B G Kher Road Worli 400018 Mumbai
Download the APP now to start your wealth journey!

Total interest ₹50,000 * 120 * (21% / 360) = ₹3500
Total repayment amount: ₹50,000+ ₹3,500=₹53500

description:
Yahoo Finance app is the premier app used by millions to track the markets and the economy. With Yahoo Finance you can keep close tabs on the daily movers so that you are informed around the clock about Finance news so you are well equipped to make the best possible trade. 

Whether you trade stocks, crypto, or bonds, you can execute with confidence that Yahoo Finance will keep you updated with personalized news and alerts. Access real-time stock, crypto, or bond market information and investment updates to stay on top of the market. 


Yahoo Finance features:
“Home” 
• Track the performance of your personal portfolio
• Link your portfolio to Yahoo Finance and keep tabs of your holdings on the go. See your holding’s daily performance at a glance in the “Home” tab
• Follow stocks to get real-time quotes and personalized news. Get push notifications from markets like NASDAQ, Dow Jones, BTC, CMC Crypto 200, Oil prices, Bond market, Gold and more. Never miss a beat in the economy
• Discover detailed financial information such as historical financials, ESG ratings, and top holders, invest with confidence with Yahoo Finance at your fingertips
• Go beyond stocks and track currencies, bonds, commodities, equities, world indices, and futures
• Compare and evaluate stocks with interactive full screen charts

“News” 
• Read detailed breaking finance news about individual stock, equity, or general economy in relation to what is happening throughout the day by our premier editorial team who will break down individual stories so you get the best detail of the subject
• Make articles font sizes larger or smaller depending on your device’s screen size or preference
• Share out interesting articles you came across with your network easily with the “share” button or “copy to clipboard” UI icons

“Discover” 
• See the winners and losers, trending equities, or which equities has the most activities throughout the trading day
• Keep tabs on investment strategies, signals and upcoming financial events.  
• Dig through the equity, crypto, ETF, mutual fund, or options tabs to see what is trending in each category of your choosing. Invest with the latest information available by Yahoo Finance

“Market”  
• Keep tabs on the US, Europe, and Asia market with Yahoo Finance. You will quickly find top gainers and losers for each region 

“Account”
• Sign in to view and edit your web portfolio on the go
• Customize your alerts for news, and stock pricing so you can keep tabs on your stocks

Helpful tips:
• Follow all the stocks you care about by searching for the ticker and tapping the star icon
• Create multiple watchlists to organize the stocks you follow
• Enable notifications for price alerts, breaking news, earnings reports, and more
• Sync your portfolios across devices

Never invest without the Yahoo Finance App again. We will equip you with the best financial information and analysis available so that you can confidently invest knowing that you are up to date with everything that is going on in the market in relation to news, stocks, crypto, bonds, ETF, mutual funds, or options.   

Privacy Policy: https://legal.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/privacy/index.html
Terms of Service: https://legal.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/terms/otos/index.html

description:
NFC mobile payment app

Save you card track data and pay in shops with contactless card readers using your mobile phone.

Add the cards using a mini magnetic stripe reader in your phone, or paste the track data into the app.

Store up to 20 cards on your phone and choose which card to use.

App has no internet access and does not share info with other apps.

You need to get the track2 magnetic stripe data from your card using a USB reader. 
Now you can also use an audio jack card reader in your phone.
Both available on Ebay or Amazon for 5-15$.

Android 4.4 or higher and NFC required. Device must be unlocked when using mobile payment.

description:
The Kotak Mobile Banking App, a best in class App, provides banking on the go, which is a must in today’s digital era.
If you are not an existing Kotak customer, you can open a Kotak Savings account or an 811 digital bank account by visiting your nearest branch.

If you are an existing Kotak customer, you can use the 250+ features of the app to Bank, Pay bills, Invest, Shop and access services.
One of our recent additions to the 250+ features is our new Pay Your Contact feature, where you can now send money to anyone using just their mobile Number

• Bank on the go:
Manage all your financial transactions, send and receive money through NEFT, IMPS and RTGS & UPI, request for a cheque book and much more
• Pay your bills:
Pay your Mobile Recharge, DTH payments and other bills with the online BillPay feature. Also, use the AutoPay feature to remember your monthly bills and pay them automatically from your account. Never miss a deadline again
• Services:
Instant completion on requesting for services such as updation of profile details, switching on/off of your Debit/Credit Card online

There's a lot more you can do with our Mobile Banking App:
• Transfer money instantly using BHIM UPI without the need for any bank information
• Transfer funds easily on the go without registering a beneficiary
• Send money with Pay Your Contact, by just knowing your beneficiary’s mobile number 
• Book train tickets (IRCTC Authorized Partner), Flight tickets, Bus tickets, Hotels. Shop on Amazon, Flipkart, BigBasket, and more in KayMall
• Recharge your mobile & DTH subscriptions with ease
• Purchase and redeem Mutual Funds and keep track of your investments
• Apply for a Kotak Credit Card
• Regenerate your Debit and Credit card PINs
• In case of loss, temporarily switch off your Kotak Debit Card for security purpose
• Pay Credit Card bill online
• Check your Bank Account statement
• Check your account balance
• Pay your bills, open a Term Deposit
• Post opening Account, go to Manage Profile and Click a selfie or upload your photo to set as profile picture

And that’s not all!
Mid-month cash crunch or an emergency? Get your salary in advance!
Kotak Payday Loan is available with just a few taps. Repay the loan when your salary gets credited next month..
Features of Payday Loan:
• Get a loan within seconds starting at Rs.3,000
• Pay interest as low as Re.1 per day
• Avail loan with no documentation
Eligible users can apply from the ‘Apply Now’ section.


Get started:
To get started, you just need your Customer Relationship Number (CRN), your Debit / Credit Card PIN or your Net Banking password to get started. The app will take you through a one-time activation process when you login for the first time.


Kotak Bank App requires following permissions:
- Contacts: This is required to allow you fetching mobile number while mobile / DTH recharge or sharing IFSC/MMID
- Location: This is required for Branch / ATM locator
- Photos / Media / Files / Camera: This is required to let you access gallery / click an image to set profile picture.
- Phone: This is required to let you dial customer contact center
- SMS: This is required to auto activate the device during activation process.
- Read SMS : This will be applicable for select customers and basis customers' specific consent, KMB App will access device level alternate data for credit risk assessment and decisioning towards better product offering.

Please note that your data is safe with Kotak Mahindra bank. We do not share any information with third party without your initiation.

description:
KreditBee is an online personal loan app trusted by over 70 million Indians. Get a quick personal loan at attractive interest rates for a hassle-free experience. Apply for a quick online loan and get the amount directly in your bank account. Whether salaried or self-employed, get easy funds - anytime, anywhere.

● Online personal loans from ₹6,000 to ₹10,00,000 
● Interest rates - 12% to 28.5% p.a. 
● Tenures - 6 to 60 months
● APR range - 17% to 50% 
● Low transaction fees
● Quick loans & easy EMI

What makes KreditBee ideal for every customer?
● Quick online loan
● Low interest rates
● Easy application process
● Fast loan approval
● Digital processing & quick loan disbursal
● Easy repayment with manageable EMI

✨Features of KreditBee personal loan app
✔ Quick Approval – Get a personal loan approved in minutes on our loan app
✔ Flexible Repayment Options – Choose to pay online loan within 6 to 60 months depending on your eligibility
✔ Digital process– Enjoy hassle-free documentation with our online personal loan app. Submit required documents online
✔ Full Transparency - No hidden costs
✔ Convenient – Get a quick personal loan anytime, anywhere
✔ Languages – English & Hindi

Why KreditBee?
Loan for All Purposes: From financing big purchases, short or long domestic/international trips, education, shopping,  wedding expenses, and debt consolidation, to emergency home repairs or medical bills.
Flexible Interest Rates: We offer loans with flexible interest rates of 12% to 28.5% per annum.
Security: We only work with RBI-certified NBFCs/Banks.

🤝Our RBI-registered Lending Partners
Krazybee Services Pvt. Ltd.
Incred Financial Services Ltd.
Vivriti Capital Pvt. Ltd.
Northern Arc Capital Ltd.
MAS Financial Services Ltd.
Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company Ltd.
PayU Finance India Pvt. Ltd.
Poonawalla Fincorp Ltd.
Piramal Capital & Housing Finance Ltd.
Kisetsu Saison Finance (India) Pvt Ltd.
Mirae Asset Financial Services (India) Pvt. Ltd.
Tata Capital Ltd.
* KreditBee is a loan facilitator platform connecting users with our RBI-approved NBFCs partners & Banks.

Types of Loans

👉 Personal Loan: Easy personal loans for salaried and self-employed individuals with flexible repayment terms of 6 to 60 months for a loan amount of  ₹6,000 to ₹10,00,000.  

👉 Business Loan: Business loans from ₹6,000 to ₹5,00,000 with flexible tenures of 6 to 48 months. 

👉 Two-wheeler Loan: Get loan up to ₹5,00,000 with flexible tenures of 6 to 60 months. 

👉 Loan Against Property: Use your plot or property as collateral for a loan amount of up to  ₹1 Crore. Repay over a long period of up to 20 years with lower interest rates starting from 12%. Available to residents of all major cities across South India.  

📋Personal Loan (Example)
Loan Amount: ₹50,000
Tenure: 12-months
Rate of Interest: 20% per annum
Processing Fee: ₹1,250 (2.5%)
Onboarding Fee for New Customers: ₹200
GST on Onboarding & Processing Fee: ₹261
Total Interest: ₹5,580
EMI: ₹4,632
APR: 26.92%
Amount Disbursed: ₹48,289
Total Repayment Amount: ₹55,580

📄Eligibility
a) Indian national
b) Over the age of 21
c) Steady monthly income

Steps to avail a loan
1. Install the KreditBee app
2. Signup using mobile number
3. Provide PAN number & check eligibility
4. Upload KYC documents, including address proof & get your profile verified
5. Choose amount and tenure
6. Provide bank account details
7. Request money transfer in your bank account

Queries?
📧Mail: help@kreditbee.in
📱Call: 080-44292200/080-68534522
🏢Address: 4th Floor, Mereside Heights, 1st Main Road, Sakshi Nagar, Pai Layout, Mahadevapura, Bangalore, 560016

With KreditBee, you get a loan app as well as a financial companion that understands your needs. Our customer support team is available to assist you throughout your loan journey. Unlock a world of possibilities and take control of your finances today with KreditBee.

● Easy repayment with manageable EMI

✨Features of KreditBee personal loan app
✔ Quick Approval – Get a personal loan approved in minutes on our loan app
✔ Flexible Repayment Options – Choose to pay online loan within 6 to 60 months depending on your eligibility
✔ Digital process– Enjoy hassle-free documentation with our online personal loan app. Submit required documents online
✔ Full Transparency - No hidden costs
✔ Convenient – Get a quick personal loan anytime, anywhere
✔ Languages – English & Hindi

Why KreditBee?
Loan for All Purposes: From financing big purchases, short or long domestic/international trips, education, shopping, wedding expenses, and debt consolidation, to emergency home repairs or medical bills.
Flexible Interest Rates: We offer loans with flexible interest rates of 12% to 28.5% per annum.
Security: We only work with RBI-certified NBFCs/Banks.

🤝Our RBI-registered Lending Partners
Krazybee Services Pvt. Ltd.
Incred Financial Services Ltd.
Vivriti Capital Pvt. Ltd.
Northern Arc Capital Ltd.
MAS Financial Services Ltd.
Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company Ltd.
PayU Finance India Pvt. Ltd.
Poonawalla Fincorp Ltd.
Piramal Capital & Housing Finance Ltd.
Kisetsu Saison Finance (India) Pvt Ltd.
Mirae Asset Financial Services (India) Pvt. Ltd.
Tata Capital Ltd.
* KreditBee is a loan facilitator platform connecting users with our RBI-approved NBFCs partners & Banks.

Types of Loans

👉 Personal Loan: Easy personal loans for salaried and self-employed individuals with flexible repayment terms of 6 to 60 months for a loan amount of ₹6,000 to ₹10,00,000.

👉 Business Loan: Business loans from ₹6,000 to ₹5,00,000 with flexible tenures of 6 to 48 months.

👉 Two-wheeler Loan: Get loan up to ₹5,00,000 with flexible tenures of 6 to 60 months.

👉 Loan Against Property: Use your plot or property as collateral for a loan amount of up to ₹1 Crore. Repay over a long period of up to 20 years with lower interest rates starting from 12%. Available to residents of all major cities across South India.

📋Personal Loan (Example)
Loan Amount: ₹50,000
Tenure: 12-months
Rate of Interest: 20% per annum
Processing Fee: ₹1,250 (2.5%)
Onboarding Fee for New Customers: ₹200
GST on Onboarding & Processing Fee: ₹261
Total Interest: ₹5,580
EMI: ₹4,632
APR: 26.92%
Amount Disbursed: ₹48,289
Total Repayment Amount: ₹55,580

📄Eligibility
a) Indian national
b) Over the age of 21
c) Steady monthly income

Steps to avail a loan
1. Install the KreditBee app
2. Signup using mobile number
3. Provide PAN number & check eligibility
4. Upload KYC documents, including address proof & get your profile verified
5. Choose amount and tenure
6. Provide bank account details
7. Request money transfer in your bank account

Queries?
📧Mail: help@kreditbee.in
📱Call: 080-44292200/080-68534522
🏢Address: 4th Floor, Mereside Heights, 1st Main Road, Sakshi Nagar, Pai Layout, Mahadevapura, Bangalore, 560016

With KreditBee, you get a loan app as well as a financial companion that understands your needs. Our customer support team is available to assist you throughout your loan journey. Unlock a world of possibilities and take control of your finances today with KreditBee.

Home Credit is one of India's fastest-growing personal loan apps, trusted by over 1.8 Crore+ happy customers. With instant approval, quick disbursal & 100% online application process, we offer hassle-free personal loans of up to ₹4,80,000 to existing Home Credit customers for all their needs.

✨Explore the features & benefits of our personal loan app:
✅Instant Loan Approval - Get your personal loan approved within just 5 minutes on our user-friendly loan app.
✅Quick Disbursal - Once approved, your loan gets disbursed directly to your bank account, ensuring swift access to funds.
✅Trusted Loan App - Home Credit is a trusted RBI-registered NBFC, serving millions of happy customers.
✅Minimal Documentation - Apply for a cash loan with just 2 documents, i.e., your PAN card & an address proof.
✅100% Safe & Secure - Enjoy complete transparency & security with no hidden charges, ensuring a worry-free borrowing experience.
✅Flexible Repayment Options - Repay your loan EMIs conveniently with our multiple repayment methods, tailored to suit your financial needs.
✅Personalized Loan Solutions - Instant loan to cater to all your financial needs such as medical emergencies, home renovation, higher studies, travel, or wedding expenses.

✨Why Choose Home Credit Personal Loan App?
✔User -Friendly
✔Trusted by Over 1.8 Crore+ happy customers
✔4.5 star rating on Google Play Store
 
📋How to Apply for an Instant Personal Loan?
👉Download the Home Credit personal loan app.
👉Submit your details and complete registration process.
👉Upload your KYC documents.
👉Enjoy instant approval & get funds disbursed directly to your bank account.
 
📋Eligibility Criteria for Home Credit Personal Loan:
✔Should be an Indian citizen.
✔Age requirements: 18 - 60 years
✔Should be a salaried, pensioner, or self-employed individual.
✔Should be an existing customer of Home Credit (should have availed Ujjwal EMI Card/ Consumer Durable Loans/ Personal Loan/ Flexible Personal Loan in the past).

📋Documents Required to Apply for Instant Personal Loan:
✅PAN Card & address proof.
 
✨Personal Loan Features:
✔Loan Amount: Up to ₹4,80,000
✔Minimum Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 19.5%
✔Minimum repayment period: 6 months
✔Maximum repayment period: 48 months
✔If you opt for a Value-Added Service, the fee for the same shall be levied additionally
✔ If you opt for Safe Pay Services, you get benefits like Payment Holiday, Free Early Repayment, Life Insurance & Health Services with your loan.

Representative Example:
Loan Amount: ₹70,000
Tenure: 24 months
Interest Rate: 32%*
EMI: ₹3986/month
Processing Fees: ₹2,730*
Total Amount Payable: ₹95,672
*The annual interest rates will vary as per the risk profile of the customer.
Maximum APR can go up to 44%. These numbers are indicative & subject to change.

✨In addition to our personal loan offerings, Home Credit India introduces the Ujjwal EMI Card, a unique financial tool designed to enhance your shopping experience, both online & offline.

✨Ujjwal EMI Card Features:
☑️Enjoy online & offline shopping on easy EMIs
☑️Instant Pre-approved limit of up to ₹75,000
☑️No-Cost EMI options on the Home Credit Personal Loan App.
☑️Payment modes include auto debit, UPI, net banking, & debit cards.
☑️Experience a 100% digital loan process with our app.

At Home Credit, we ensure absolute safety of our customers using world class security & privacy standards to protect their data, ensuring a safe borrowing experience. All information requested from Home Credit is only used to generate the best offers for you.

Contact Us:

📱Call: +91-1246628888 (Between 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM, All Days)
🌐Website: https://www.homecredit.co.in/contact-us
🏢Address: Home Credit India Finance Private Limited, DLF Infinity Towers, Tower C, 3rd Floor, DLF Cyber City Phase II, Gurugram-122002, India
