✔️ Find nearby banks, ATMs and financial places around your location.
✔️Currency Converter feature offers more than 168 currencies, live exchange rates and offline mode.
✔️Live exchange rates offered
✔️Easy option to change the language of the Mortgage Calculator app from the settings.


Additional features of the Mortgage Calculator app:
● Loan calculator
● GST Calculator
● SIP calculator
● Currency conversion
● Compare loans
● Mortgage statistics
● Financial calculator and statistics
● Nearby bank and ATM locator
● Financial news


COMMENTS:
● This mortgage calculator app is only a financial tool and not a lender or connection to any NBFC or any financial service.
● This app works as a financial calculator app and does not provide loan services.

description:
Trendlyne brings you powerful stock market tools, Nifty Sensex, IPO, MF and F&O analysis

Skip bad investing advice with the Trendlyne mobile app. With 20+ 'only on Trendlyne' features, we are India's most powerful stock market app. The Trendlyne mobile app brings you NSE and BSE market feeds, realtime screeners, analyst estimates and share price targets, and Trendlyne's trademark DVM Stock Scores. It also brings you F&O (with options screeners) unlimited realtime alerts, charts, research reports, SWOT, portfolio and watchlist tools, and a newsfeed, in one powerful app.

Trendlyne also tells you what's happening with actionable stock insights, so that you can stay on top of the market.

What's New

  • US Markets - Nasdaq, S&P and NYSE stocks - Check Apple, Google, Facebook etc
  • IPO
  • MFs with MF checklist
  • Create Screener, now on the app!
  • Forecaster - Consensus estimates and share price targets
  • Portfolio import and portfolio report
  • Alphaalerts, Superstar, deals email alerts
  • DVM Stock Scores: Choose the Best, Avoid the Worst
  • SWOT (Strength, Weakness, Opportunity, Threats) for Every Stock
  • Stock Recommendations from Analysts: Buy/Sell/Hold Calls, Price Targets, Upgrades, Downgrades
  • Portfolio Tools: First in India NAV, Decision Analyzer, Valuation and Earnings Tracker
  • Stock Screeners with 1600+ Parameters, from Expert Strategies to Red Flags
  • Customizable Watchlists
  • Real-time Newsfeeds

Forecaster

Detailed consensus estimates for share price targets, revenue, net profits, EPS, dividend, cash flows, capital expenditure, interest expenses, depreciation and more

Realtime Alpha Alerts

Stock/portfolio/index alerts for Price, SMAs, Crossovers, Volumes, Research Reports

Market Data with Insights

Keep track of price feeds, technicals, SMA/EMA, delivery and volume, insider trades, bulk block deals and more.

DVM Stock Scores

Our trademarked, powerful DVM Stock Score is our diamond finder. It helps you find the strongest and avoid the weakest stocks in the market.

SWOT for every Stock

Trendlyne’s SWOT Engine gives you Strengths, Weakness, Opportunities and Threats for every stock, across financials, technicals, and management quality.

Stock Screeners: from Expert Strategies to Red Flags

Our expert, financial and technical screeners help you find the stocks that are in the best performing investing strategies, and stocks that have red flags like auditor resignations, broker downgrades, and weakening financials.

Stock Recommendations from Analysts: Buy/Sell/Hold Calls, Price Targets, Upgrades, Downgrades

Trendlyne tracks 40+ brokerages to bring you buy/sell/hold calls, target prices, upgrades and downgrades.

Portfolio Tools: First in India NAV, Decision Analyzer, Valuation and Earnings Tracker

Our powerful portfolio product comes with a Portfolio NAV, which calculates point to point returns on your portfolio for the first time in India.It keeps track of your transactions at individual and lot level.

Stocks Easily Tracked With Customizable Watchlists

Real-time Newsfeeds

Our newsfeeds track news of your stocks throughout the day. It keeps a tab on your portfolio and watchlist stocks and updates in real-time.
summary: Never miss an opportunity: stock market analysis for investors and traders

description:
AI Pro Trading Signal App Designed to Make You More Profitable: Artificial Intelligence Driven Signals for Forex, Crypto, Stocks!
Welcome to the world of AI Pro Trading Signal! In this article, we will explore the features and benefits of the AI Pro Trading Signal app, which is specifically designed to make you more profitable in the financial markets, including Forex, Crypto, and Stocks. Our AI-powered platform leverages cutting-edge technology to provide you with accurate trading signals, allowing you to capitalize on lucrative opportunities in the market.

AI Pro Trading Signal: What Sets Us Apart
At AI Pro Trading Signal, we differentiate ourselves from the competition through our commitment to constant learning and improvement. Our AI algorithms are continuously scanning the crypto, forex, and stock markets, 24/7, to identify potential opportunities. This constant vigilance ensures that you never miss out on profitable trades, even while you rest.

AI Pro Trading Signal App: Making You More Profitable
In today's fast-paced financial markets, staying ahead of the curve is crucial to maximize your profitability. The AI Pro Trading Signal app is specifically designed to provide you with a competitive edge. By leveraging artificial intelligence and advanced algorithms, our app delivers accurate and timely trading signals, allowing you to make informed investment decisions. With AI Pro Trading Signal, you can increase your chances of success and boost your overall profitability.

How AI Driven Signals Revolutionize Trading
AI-driven signals have revolutionized the trading landscape, enabling traders to make smarter decisions based on data-driven insights. Unlike traditional methods that rely on human analysis and subjective judgment, AI algorithms can process vast amounts of market data in real-time. By analyzing historical patterns, market trends, and other relevant factors, AI algorithms identify potential trading opportunities with greater accuracy. This technological advancement empowers traders with timely signals, helping them navigate the complex financial markets more effectively.

The Power of Artificial Intelligence in Finance
Artificial intelligence has emerged as a game-changer in the finance industry. Its ability to process and analyze vast amounts of data within seconds allows for more accurate predictions and informed decision-making. With the AI Pro Trading Signal app, you can harness this power to your advantage. Our AI algorithms constantly learn and adapt to changing market conditions, ensuring that you receive the most reliable and up-to-date signals. This enables you to make profitable trades and stay ahead in the competitive financial landscape.

Conclusion
The AI Pro Trading Signal app is a powerful tool designed to make you more profitable in the financial markets. By harnessing the power of artificial intelligence, our app provides accurate and timely trading signals, allowing you to capitalize on lucrative opportunities in Forex, Crypto, and Stocks. With its user-friendly interface, customization options, and educational resources, the AI Pro Trading Signal app caters to traders of all levels of experience. Get started today and let our AI algorithms do the hard work for you, while you rest and enjoy the benefits of profitable trading
summary: Ai Designed to make you more profitable!

description: Navi, your all-in-one financial superapp designed for diverse financial needs, offers a range of services for your convenience. From lightning-fast UPI payments to smart investments in mutual funds and gold, quick cash loans, reliable health insurance coverage, and effortless home loans, Navi has you covered. Download the Navi app and unlock a world of possibilities for your financial well-being. 1. Navi UPI Simplify money transfers with Navi UPI (NPCI Approved). Navi UPI Features ✅ Instantly transfer money to anyone, anytime ✅ Pay bills and recharge online ✅ Conveniently scan and pay at any store ✅ Seamlessly make online payments on various apps ✅ Enjoy hassle-free payments with Navi UPI Lite, no PIN required 2. Investments Discover diverse investment opportunities with mutual funds and digital gold. Navi Mutual Fund Features ✅ Diversify with Direct Index Funds for better growth ✅ Flexible SIP options: daily, weekly, or monthly ✅ Zero commission & one of lowest expense ratios for cost-effective investing ✅ Fastest redemption order payout in the industry ✅ Invest till 3 PM and get the same-day NAV for better returns Remember, mutual fund investments are subject to market risks; read all scheme related documents carefully. Navi Gold Features ✅ 24K Digital Gold ✅ 99.9% purity ✅ Investment starts with just ₹10 3. Navi Health Insurance Safeguard yourself and your family's financial future with Navi Health Insurance. Navi Health Insurance Features ✅ Coverage up to ₹3 crore ✅ Health insurance premiums starting at just ₹413* per month ✅ Experience quality healthcare at over 12,000+ network hospitals* ✅ Cashless claim settlement within 20 minutes* ✅ Benefit from 100% coverage* of hospital bills through a paperless process 4. Navi Cash Loan Access instant cash loans of up to ₹20 lakh Navi Cash Loan features ✅ Enjoy competitive interest rates up to 26% per annum ✅ Choose from flexible loan tenures ranging from 3 to 84 months ✅ Experience a fully digital loan process with instant fund transfer to your bank account ✅ Qualify with a minimum household income of ₹3 Lakh per annum Example of How Navi Cash Loan works: Loan Amount = ₹30,000 APR* (ROI) = 12% EMI = ₹2,800 Total Interest Payable = ₹2,800 x 12 months - ₹30,000 = ₹3,600 Total Amount Payable = ₹2,800 x 12 months = ₹33,600 *Note: These numbers are for representation purposes only. Final APR will depend on the customer's credit assessment. *APR (Annual Percentage Rate) is the total cost you'll pay for borrowing money over a year. It includes the interest rate plus any fees charged by the lender. APR gives you a clear picture of how much a loan will really cost you. For Navi, APR is equal to ROI (Rate of Interest) as we don't charge any additional fees. 5. Navi Home Loan Book that dream home with home loans up to ₹5 crore with flexible EMI options and a sanction offer letter within 5 minutes Navi Home Loan Features ✅ Loan Amount up to ₹5 Crore ✅ Interest Rate up to 13% ✅ Loan Tenure up to 30 Years ✅ Zero Processing Fees ✅ Up to 90% LTV ✅ Navi Home Loan is available in Bengaluru, Chennai & Hyderabad 6. Referral Program Discover endless rewards with Navi's referral program! Share the Navi app with friends and family, and unlock exclusive rewards for every successful referral. About Navi - Navi app is developed & owned by Navi Technologies Limited, founded by Sachin Bansal and Ankit Agarwal, in December 2018. - Cash Loans and Home Loans are provided by Navi Finserv Limited, a Non-Deposit taking systemically important NBFC registered & regulated by the RBI. - Health Insurance is offered by Navi General Insurance Limited, registered with the IRDAI as a general insurer. - Navi Mutual Fund, registered with the SEBI, offers multiple mutual fund schemes to investors. - Navi UPI is NPCI approved.

extra.descriptionHTML:
Navi, your all-in-one financial superapp designed for diverse financial needs, offers a range of services for your convenience. From lightning-fast UPI payments to smart investments in mutual funds and gold, quick cash loans, reliable health insurance coverage, and effortless home loans, Navi has you covered. Download the Navi app and unlock a world of possibilities for your financial well-being.

1. Navi UPI
Simplify money transfers with Navi UPI (NPCI Approved).
Navi UPI Features
✅ Instantly transfer money to anyone, anytime
✅ Pay bills and recharge online
✅ Conveniently scan and pay at any store
✅ Seamlessly make online payments on various apps
✅ Enjoy hassle-free payments with Navi UPI Lite, no PIN required

2. Investments
Discover diverse investment opportunities with mutual funds and digital gold.
Navi Mutual Fund Features
✅ Diversify with Direct Index Funds for better growth
✅ Flexible SIP options: daily, weekly, or monthly
✅ Zero commission & one of lowest expense ratios for cost-effective investing
✅ Fastest redemption order payout in the industry
✅ Invest till 3 PM and get the same-day NAV for better returns

Remember, mutual fund investments are subject to market risks; read all scheme related documents carefully.

Navi Gold Features
✅ 24K Digital Gold
✅ 99.9% purity
✅ Investment starts with just ₹10

3. Navi Health Insurance
Safeguard yourself and your family's financial future with Navi Health Insurance.
Navi Health Insurance Features
✅ Coverage up to ₹3 crore
✅ Health insurance premiums starting at just ₹413* per month
✅ Experience quality healthcare at over 12,000+ network hospitals*
✅ Cashless claim settlement within 20 minutes*
✅ Benefit from 100% coverage* of hospital bills through a paperless process

4. Navi Cash Loan
Access instant cash loans of up to ₹20 lakh
Navi Cash Loan features
✅ Enjoy competitive interest rates up to 26% per annum
✅ Choose from flexible loan tenures ranging from 3 to 84 months
✅ Experience a fully digital loan process with instant fund transfer to your bank account
✅ Qualify with a minimum household income of ₹3 Lakh per annum

Example of How Navi Cash Loan works:
Loan Amount = ₹30,000
APR* (ROI) = 12%
EMI = ₹2,800
Total Interest Payable = ₹2,800 x 12 months - ₹30,000 = ₹3,600
Total Amount Payable = ₹2,800 x 12 months = ₹33,600
*Note: These numbers are for representation purposes only. Final APR will depend on the customer's credit assessment.
*APR (Annual Percentage Rate) is the total cost you'll pay for borrowing money over a year. It includes the interest rate plus any fees charged by the lender. APR gives you a clear picture of how much a loan will really cost you. For Navi, APR is equal to ROI (Rate of Interest) as we don't charge any additional fees.

5. Navi Home Loan
Book that dream home with home loans up to ₹5 crore with flexible EMI options and a sanction offer letter within 5 minutes
Navi Home Loan Features
✅ Loan Amount up to ₹5 Crore
✅ Interest Rate up to 13%
✅ Loan Tenure up to 30 Years
✅ Zero Processing Fees
✅ Up to 90% LTV
✅ Navi Home Loan is available in Bengaluru, Chennai & Hyderabad

6. Referral Program
Discover endless rewards with Navi's referral program! Share the Navi app with friends and family, and unlock exclusive rewards for every successful referral.

About Navi
- Navi app is developed & owned by Navi Technologies Limited, founded by Sachin Bansal and Ankit Agarwal, in December 2018.
- Cash Loans and Home Loans are provided by Navi Finserv Limited, a Non-Deposit taking systemically important NBFC registered & regulated by the RBI.
- Health Insurance is offered by Navi General Insurance Limited, registered with the IRDAI as a general insurer.
- Navi Mutual Fund, registered with the SEBI, offers multiple mutual fund schemes to investors.
- Navi UPI is NPCI approved.

description:
What is BHIM?

BHIM (Bharat Interface for Money) —a UPI payment app developed by the NBSL, a wholly owned subsidiary of National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI). 
Designed for every Indian, BHIM Payments App makes digital transactions easier, safer, and faster with an intuitive interface and cutting-edge features.
With BHIM Payments App, experience seamless and rewarding payments while enjoying the highest level of security. 
Built for trust and simplicity, with 12+ Languages, BHIM App ensures that digital payments are accessible to all.

Get Started in Minutes! 

• Download BHIM App & Register using your mobile number 
• Ensure your SIM is linked to your bank account (for dual SIM, select the correct one. Also UPI Circle users only need a valid SIM which may or may not be linked to a bank account).
• Have your Debit Card or Aadhaar Card handy to generate your UPI PIN (except for UPI Circle users, who only need a valid SIM).
• Visit BHIM UPI Partners to check if your bank is live on BHIM. For more details, visit BHIM Official Website and read the Terms & Conditions before signing up.

🚀 Why Choose BHIM Payments App?

• A Brand-New Experience – A refreshed; intuitive UI designed for effortless navigation for all age groups.
•  Family Mode – Manage payments for your family in a click!
•  Spend Insights – Track and manage your expenses easily with spend analytics.
•  UPI Lite for Small Payments – Make instant, PIN-less payments of upto ₹1000.
•  RuPay Credit Card on UPI – Use your RuPay Credit Card for secure UPI payments.
• Credit Card on EMI – Shop smarter with easy EMI options on UPI payments.
• UPI Circle – Give freedom to your trusted ones, to make payments even without a bank account.
• Pay Bills Seamlessly – Settle electricity, credit card, gas, recharge FASTag and other utility bills effortlessly.
summary: Simple and Secure - UPI, Recharges,  Bill Payments
title: BHIM Bharat's Own Payments App

description:
World App is the simple wallet designed to make the Worldcoin and Ethereum protocols accessible for everyone. 


PROVE YOUR PERSONHOOD WITH WORLD ID
It starts with World ID, your human passport to access the new online world. Verify it privately with an Orb, and then use it to seamlessly sign in to websites, mobile apps and crypto dapps proving you’re a unique and real person without sharing personal data like names or emails.

SAVE AND SEND DIGITAL DOLLARS
Use the wallet to save digital money – starting with USDC by Circle – with shortcuts to deposit and withdraw using bank accounts or local payment methods through licensed partners around the world. You can also instantly send digital dollars to friends or family members around the world using their phone contact or crypto address, without fees.

EXPLORE AND USE CRYPTO
Learn about Ethereum and Bitcoin – with more tokens coming soon – and earn a bit of them in the process. Track your balances, get notified with major changes and easily trade in available markets using decentralized exchanges.

NO FEES AND 24/7 SUPPORT
Enjoy gas-free transactions with your verified World ID, receive notifications for your actions, track their status at a glance, and if you ever need something, dedicated 24/7 chat support in English, Spanish and Portuguese is ready to help.
summary: Worldcoin. World ID. Wallet.
title: World App - Worldcoin Wallet

Forex & Stock brokers offer traders investing in shares and currency trading via MetaTrader 5. Your MT5 features real-time quotes, financial news, FX & stock charts, technical analysis and online trading. Free demo accounts are available.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

* Real-time Forex & Stock market quotes
* Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
* Level II prices with up to 32 quotes
* All types of trade execution
* Detailed online trading history

ADVANCED TRADING

* Fast switching between financial instruments on charts
* Sound notifications assisting trading
* Customizable Forex & Stock chart color schemes
* Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending orders, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
* Free financial news — dozens of materials daily
* Chat with any registered MQL5.community trader
* Support of push notifications from the desktop MetaTrader 5 (MT5) platform and MQL5.community services
* Connection with hundreds of Forex & Stock Brokers

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

* Interactive real-time Forex & Stock charts with zoom and scroll options
* 30 of the most popular technical indicators among traders
* 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
* 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
* 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line for efficient trading

Download MetaTrader 5 (MT5) for Android on your smartphone or tablet and trade Forex, Stocks, CFD and Futures instruments anytime and anywhere in the world!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

description:
SIP Planner Calculator & Tools is an easy mobile financial planning application designed to make quick investment decisions. Whether you're looking to calculate SIP returns, estimate lumpsum investments, plan for Fixed Deposits, or compute loan EMIs, this tool offers accurate and immediate results.

The SIP Planner Calculator & Tools helps track various financial goals, making it the best SIP planner and financial planner business solution. Whether planning for retirement, children's education, or managing car loans, our application provides all the economic analysis with accurate results.

Why Choose SIP Planner Calculator & Tools?
Comprehensive Financial Planning: Manage SIPs, FDs, EMIs, retirement plans, and more.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple, fast, and intuitive design for easy navigation.
Smart Investment Decisions: Compare different financial scenarios and optimize your savings.
Multiple Financial Calculators: Covers everything from mutual funds to insurance and taxes.

Provides the 30 Demanding Calculators for Both Mobile Phones and Tablets:
1. Bank Calculators:
EMI Calculator
Fixed Deposit (FD) Calculator
Recurring Deposit (RD) Calculator
Flat vs Reducing Interest Calculator

2. Mutual Fund Calculators:
SIP Calculator
Lumpsum Calculator
Step-Up SIP Calculator
SIP Delay Cost Calculator
SWP (Systematic Withdrawal Plan) Calculator
SIP/LS Balancer Calculator
Future Value of Lumpsum + SIP
Future Value of STP + SIP
Future Value of Insurance + SIP

3. Retirement Calculators:
Retirement Planning Calculator
Retirement Need Calculator
NPS (National Pension System) Calculator

4. Tax Calculators:
ELSS Calculator

5. Insurance Calculators:
LIC Calculator
Life Insurance Calculator

6. General Purpose Calculators:
Car Loan EMI Calculator
Home Loan EMI Calculator
Home Planning Calculator
Car Planning Calculator
Child Expenses Calculator
Education Planning Calculator
Marriage Planning Calculator
Inflation Calculator
Portfolio Projection Calculator
Recover EMIs Through SIP Calculator
Vacation Planning Calculator

Maximize Your Investment Growth with Smart Tools!
The SIP Planner Calculator & Tools tool includes advanced features like the StepUp SIP Calculator and SIP/LS Balancer Calculator, which ensure that you adjust your SIP amounts over time for maximum returns. The tool also helps you compare the future value of your SIP combined with lumpsum investments or systematic transfer plans (STPs).

Whether you're a mutual fund investor or just beginning to plan for financial goals, our SIP Planner Calculator helps you assess how much you need to invest monthly to achieve your desired returns at the end of the investment period.

Key Benefits:
Our application is for investors and mutual fund distributors to perform quick calculations.
Simple application for beginners and experienced investors.
Tracks and predicts future financial growth.
Helps plan for retirement, education, marriage, vacations, and more.

Whether you're managing your finances for the first time or looking to refine your strategy, this tool ensures you make data-driven decisions.

Who Can Benefit?

Beginners: Understand SIP investments & make informed decisions.
Investors: Optimize SIP, Lumpsum & Portfolio Strategies.
Professionals: Use advanced calculators for financial planning.

Plan your investments with confidence. Download the SIP Planner Calculator & Tools today!

description:
Introducing BharatPe for Business
BharatPe for Business is a comprehensive payment app allowing you to accept UPI and card payments from any app. A single QR code enables merchants to seamlessly accept payments from Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm, BHIM, Amazon UPI, and over 150 other banking apps. BharatSwipe supports both debit and credit card payments. Over 7 million merchants rely on BharatPe for Business for their payment solutions. Invest your earnings to earn up to 12% annual interest and obtain loans to grow your business at competitive low interest rates.
 
Accept all Types of Payment
BharatPe for Business enables you to accept payments from all major UPI apps like Paytm, PhonePe, and Google Pay without any fees. Additionally, customers can pay through multiple modes like Bank Account, RuPay Credit card and Wallet etc.
You can also withdraw money instantly and transfer it directly to your bank account.
Business Loans Made Easy
Expand your business with BharatPe's low-interest loans and a hassle-free, 100% online application process that requires no paperwork, collateral, or guarantees. Repay your loan effortlessly through Easy Daily Installments (EDI).
 
Loan Repayment Terms:
Repay in Easy Daily Installments (EDI).
Loan Tenure: 3 months to 15 months
Minimum Tenure: 3 months
Maximum Tenure: 15 months
 
Interest Rate - Annual Percentage Rate (APR):
APR is communicated on the BharatPe for Business App while taking a loan.
Ranges from 21% - 30%
Minimum APR: 21%
Maximum APR: 30%
Amount: Rs. 10,000 to Rs. 10,00,000
Processing fees: 0% to 2%
 
An example:
Loan Amount: Rs. 1,00,000
Tenure: 6 months
Interest Rate (APR): 24% per year
Repayment Amount: Rs. 1,12,000
Total Interest Payable: Rs. 100,000 x 24%/12*6 (6 months) = Rs. 12,000
Processing Fees (incl. GST): Rs. 2,000
Disbursed Amount: Rs. 100,000 (Loan Amount) - Rs. 2,000 (Processing Fees) = Rs. 98,000
Total Amount Payable: Rs. 1,12,000 (EDI of 722)
Total Cost of the Loan: Interest Amount + Processing Fees = Rs. 12,000 + Rs. 2,000 = Rs. 14,000
 
NBFC partners:
Loans are offered in collaboration with RBI-approved NBFCs, such as LendenClub (Innofin Solutions Private Limited), Liquiloans (NDX P2P Private Limited), Trillions (TRILLIONLOANS FINTECH PRIVATE LIMITED), ABFL (Aditya Birla Finance Limited), and Arthmate (Mamta Financing India Private Limited). The NBFC's sanction letter is displayed in the app and shared as a notification.
 
Earn up to 12%
Enjoy up to 12% interest on your BharatPe account balance, credited daily. Add funds or request withdrawals at your convenience, knowing your money is securely invested with our RBI-approved NBFC partners.
 
Permissions
Permissions such as Location and Contacts, are necessary to create your credit profile and provide loan offers. To review our privacy policy, please visit: Privacy Policy - BharatPe for Business
Please note that BharatPe for Business is the brand name of the application launched by Resillient Innovations Private Limited. BharatPe for Business is our developer name.
Contact Information:
+918882555444
hello@bharatpe.com
Home - BharatPe
Head Office:
Resilient Innovations Private Limited
Address: 7th and 12th Floor, Building No. 8 Block-C, Cyber City DLF City
Phase 2 Road, Gurugram, Haryana, 122008.

description:
Offline Cash Book: Simple Finance Tracking
Take control of your personal finances with Offline Cash Book, the simple yet powerful expense tracker that works completely offline. No internet connection required to manage your money!
Why Choose Offline Cash Book?
• 100% Offline Operation - All your financial data stays on your device. No internet needed, perfect for areas with poor connectivity.
• Simple & Intuitive Interface - Clean, modern design makes tracking expenses and income quick and easy.
• Comprehensive Financial Overview - See your balance, income, and expenses at a glance on the home screen.
• Detailed Transaction Management - Categorize transactions, add descriptions, and filter by date or type.
• Insightful Analytics - Visualize your spending patterns with beautiful charts and graphs to make smarter financial decisions.
• Multiple Categories - Track different types of income and expenses with customizable categories.
• Secure & Private - Your financial data never leaves your device, ensuring complete privacy.
Key Features:
✓ Quick Entry - Add income or expenses in seconds with our streamlined entry form
✓ Categorized Transactions - Organize your finances with predefined categories for both income and expenses
✓ Financial Summary - View your current balance, total income, and expenses on the home screen
✓ Transaction History - Browse through your complete transaction history with powerful filtering options
✓ Visual Analytics - Understand your spending habits with intuitive charts and graphs
✓ Date Filters - View transactions by day, week, month, or custom date ranges
✓ Currency Support - Track your finances in your local currency
✓ Dark Mode - Reduce eye strain with our beautiful dark theme option
✓ Data Backup - Export and import your financial data for safekeeping
✓ No Ads - Enjoy a clean, distraction-free experience with our free version
Perfect For:
• Individuals wanting to track personal expenses
• Small business owners managing cash flow
• Students managing tight budgets
• Anyone looking to improve their financial habits
• People in areas with limited internet connectivity
• Those concerned about financial data privacy
Start your journey to financial clarity today with Offline Cash Book - the simple, secure, and completely offline solution for managing your money.
Download now and take the first step toward better financial management!

description: MyMoney is a personal finance management & budgeting app that helps you track your money use. This powerful spending tracker saves your money as you can see where your money goes. It has daily expense tracker, free budget planner, intuitive analysis and many powerful features－everything is offline, no internet needed. Use it for some days and you will see the differences. How to manage money and track expenses? Just add an expense record when you are spending some. MyMoney will take care of it. MyMoney is your ultimate budget planner that helps you achieve your budget goals. Too much spending on coffee? Set a budget on coffee and surely, you would not cross the budget target. This limits your expenses and helps you control your spending behavior. If you really want to save money and understand your expenses, MyMoney is the perfect app that can help you. Key features ★ Expense Manager Manage income and expenses by categories (Cars, Foods, Clothing etc.). Create categories as many as you need. ★ Budget Planner Plan monthly budget to boost savings. Try not to cross your budget target. ★ Effective Analysis See your monthly income and expense analysis with clean charts. Take a look on the expense book to better understand your spending habits. ★ Simple & Easy Its simple and easy to use interface will surely make you love it. Try it for a few days and you will see the differences. ★ Smart Homescreen Widget MyMoney's customizable homescreen widget will help you keep an eye on your balance and add records on the go. ★ Offline Fully offline, no internet required to use MyMoney. ★ Wallet, Cards Separately Multiple accounts for managing wallet, cards, savings etc. No limitation on account creation. ★ Personal Choose your currency sign, decimal place etc. Select preferred category & account icons, titles. ★ Safe & Secured Keep your record data safe with backups. Restore them if necessary. Export worksheets to print the records. ★ Premium This is the pro version of MyMoney which includes additional features: → More icons → Multiple themes → Passcode protection for privacy → Smart input feature in homescreen widget → 3 months, 6 months & yearly view modes Try the free version here https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.raha.app.mymoney.free Clarification for permissions: - Storage: Needed only when you create or restore a backup file. - Network Communication (Internet Access): Needed for sending crash reports only. - Run at startup: Needed for managing reminders.

MyMoney is a personal finance management & budgeting app that helps you track your money use. This powerful spending tracker saves your money as you can see where your money goes. It has daily expense tracker, free budget planner, intuitive analysis and many powerful features－everything is offline, no internet needed. Use it for some days and you will see the differences.

How to manage money and track expenses? Just add an expense record when you are spending some. MyMoney will take care of it. MyMoney is your ultimate budget planner that helps you achieve your budget goals. Too much spending on coffee? Set a budget on coffee and surely, you would not cross the budget target. This limits your expenses and helps you control your spending behavior. If you really want to save money and understand your expenses, MyMoney is the perfect app that can help you.


Key features

★ Expense Manager
Manage income and expenses by categories (Cars, Foods, Clothing etc.). Create categories as many as you need.

★ Budget Planner
Plan monthly budget to boost savings. Try not to cross your budget target.

★ Effective Analysis
See your monthly income and expense analysis with clean charts. Take a look on the expense book to better understand your spending habits.

Its simple and easy to use interface will surely make you love it. Try it for a few days and you will see the differences.

MyMoney's customizable homescreen widget will help you keep an eye on your balance and add records on the go.

Fully offline, no internet required to use MyMoney.

Multiple accounts for managing wallet, cards, savings etc. No limitation on account creation.

Choose your currency sign, decimal place etc. Select preferred category & account icons, titles.

→ More icons

description:
**Bullseye – Your Ultimate Stock Market Companion**

Welcome to **Bullseye**, the all-in-one platform designed to provide you with comprehensive and real-time information about the stock market. Whether you're an experienced investor or a beginner exploring the world of finance, Bullseye is your go-to app for staying updated, making informed decisions, and gaining a competitive edge.

Our app offers a wide range of features powered by advanced AI technology to give you accurate predictions, live data, and critical market insights—all in one convenient place.

### **Key Features:**

**🔬 AI-Powered Predictions:**
Bullseye leverages advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to deliver precise predictions on stock and commodity prices. Get real-time forecasts for essential commodities like Gold, Silver, Cotton, Crude Oil, Platinum, and many more. Our cutting-edge AI model continuously analyzes market trends and historical data to provide you with the most reliable predictions, helping you stay ahead of the curve.

**📊 Live Market Data:**
Stay up-to-date with the latest stock market movements through our lightning-fast price-fetching technology. Bullseye delivers live price updates for stocks, commodities, cryptocurrencies, and foreign currency exchange rates. Never miss an opportunity to track price changes and make quick, data-driven decisions.

**📈 Cryptocurrency Information:**
In addition to stocks and commodities, Bullseye also provides real-time information on popular cryptocurrencies. Access live prices, market trends, and insights into the most popular digital currencies, ensuring you are always informed about the rapidly evolving crypto market.

**📅 Foreign Currency Exchange:**
Monitor foreign exchange rates in real time with Bullseye. Our app provides accurate and fast updates on major global currencies, allowing you to track fluctuations and make informed decisions when dealing with international transactions.

**📰 Trending Stock News:**
Stay informed with the latest financial and stock market news. Bullseye curates trending headlines and critical market updates from trusted sources, ensuring you never miss out on important developments that could impact your investments.

**🔢 AI Stock Screener:**
Save time and effort with our advanced AI-powered stock screener. Quickly identify potential investment opportunities by filtering stocks based on customized criteria. Whether you’re looking for high-growth stocks, undervalued assets, or market leaders, our intelligent screening tool helps you find the best options in seconds.

**🌐 All NSE & BSE Listed Companies:**
Access detailed information about all companies listed on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) and Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). From market capitalization and share prices to historical performance and sector classification, Bullseye provides comprehensive data to support your investment journey.

**📚 Free Educational Resources:**
Enhance your financial literacy with our free educational content. Bullseye offers easy-to-understand resources on investing, trading strategies, market analysis, and more. Whether you're a novice or a seasoned investor, our learning materials are designed to empower you with the knowledge to succeed.

**⏳ Quick Screener:**
Need to find specific stocks quickly? Our Quick Screener allows you to filter and sort stocks based on your preferences in just a few clicks. It’s the perfect tool for busy traders who want fast and accurate results.

### **Why Choose Bullseye?**

- **Comprehensive Coverage:** Get everything you need to track, analyze, and predict market movements.
- **AI-Driven Insights:** Leverage advanced technology for accurate and timely market forecasts.
- **User-Friendly Interface:** Enjoy an intuitive and seamless user experience designed for both beginners and experts.
- **Real-Time Updates:** Access fast and reliable data across multiple financial sectors.
Download Bullseye App Now.

description:
Paytm Money is your all-in-one wealth-tech platform, offering a diverse range of investment products, including IPOs, equities, futures & options (F&O), bonds, mutual funds, and more. Our user-friendly interface ensures a seamless onboarding experience, allowing you to start your investment journey with ease. As a robust wealth tech platform, we provide:

Seamless Onboarding 
- Experience a hassle-free onboarding process, enabling you to start your investment journey with ease and confidence.

IPO Investing
- Seize early investment opportunities with our seamless IPO application process, including the convenience to pre-apply in upcoming IPOs.

Equity and Stocks
- Invest directly in your preferred companies with real-time data, advanced charts, and personalized watchlists, empowering you to make informed decisions.

Futures & Options (F&O)
- Engage in Futures & Options trading with advanced analytics and an intuitive interface, now including BSE F&O, broadening your trading horizons.

Mutual Funds and SIPs
- Invest in mutual funds and initiate Systematic Investment Plans (SIPs) with ease, benefiting from expert fund management and diversification.

Stock SIP
- Build wealth systematically with the Stock SIP feature! Invest in your favorite stocks regularly and watch your portfolio grow effortlessly over time.

UPI Autopay
- Automate your investments effortlessly with UPI Autopay. Set up once, and enjoy seamless SIP payments without any manual intervention!

Bonds and Fixed Income Products
- Explore a variety of bonds to secure stable returns and diversify your investment portfolio.

Margin Trading Facility (MTF)
- Take advantage of MTFs to increase your purchasing power and take up to 4x positions in the market at a nominal cost.

Margin Pledge
- Enhance your return on investment by pledging your existing securities to secure margins for trading, optimizing your portfolio's potential.
Our platform is designed to provide a seamless and efficient investment experience, supported by advanced technology and a commitment to transparency. Join millions of satisfied investors and take advantage of our comprehensive suite of investment products to achieve your financial aspirations.
Start your investment journey with Paytm Money today and unlock the potential of smart investing.

Image Source: Paytm Money App

Disclaimer
- Investments in the securities market are subject to market risks, read all the related documents carefully before investing. This content is purely for entertainment and engagement purposes only. description: About MobiKwik MobiKwik is a payment app offering bill payments, loans up to ₹2,00,000, and investments in FDs, P2P lending, mutual funds, and digital gold. You can also experience the power of Pocket UPI on MobiKwik, where UPI transactions don’t require a bank account. With Pocket UPI, enjoy enhanced security, higher transaction limits, and unmatched convenience for your digital payments. Pocket UPI - No Bank Account Required: Perform UPI transactions safely without linking a bank account. - Higher Transaction & Wallet Limits: Load up to ₹2 lakhs in your wallet and transact up to ₹1 lakh per day. - Flexible Payments: Pay to any QR code, UPI ID, or mobile number. - Multiple Top-Up Options: Load your wallet through UPI, debit card, or credit card. - No PIN Required: On-device biometric security (Fingerprint/Face ID) for quick, secure payments. - Streamlined Interface: Keep Pocket UPI transactions separate from bank statements for better tracking. - Budget Management: Assign a set amount for spending to manage personal or family budgets. Free Credit Score -Check your credit score for free every month. -Get immediate access to your credit score for detailed insights. -Reliable and accurate credit data sourced from CRIF. UPI Payments - Secure UPI Setup: Create a fast and secure UPI handle in-app. - Universal Compatibility: Send/receive money via BHIM UPI, phone numbers, or direct bank account transfers. - RuPay Credit Card Integration: Link and use your RuPay credit card to pay via UPI. - Scan & Pay: Make payments at supermarkets, restaurants, pharmacies, and petrol pumps using the MobiKwik Wallet UPI handle. - Trusted Brand Payments: Pay securely at Reliance Fresh, Croma, Apollo Pharmacy, and more. EPFO Balance Checker Access your provident fund details and track employer contributions using your registered phone number. Track Bank Balance Safely track multiple bank accounts with LENS. Download statements and analyze spending with smart spend insights. Fixed Deposits - Earn up to 9.5% Returns: Invest with Unity Small Finance Bank, Suryoday Small Finance Bank, Mahindra Finance, and more. - Special Rates: Senior citizens receive an additional 0.5% interest, and females get an extra 0.1%. Xtra P2P investment platform in partnership with RBI-approved NBFC Transactree Technologies Private Limited (“Lendbox”) - Earn upto 10-14% p.a. - Start investing with ₹10000 - Payout to Bank accounts - No account opening or withdrawal fees ZIP EMI - Get funds/loans up to ₹200,000 for online shopping & pay back in monthly installments. - Interest rates from 9%-35.99% p.a. with a tenure of 3-24 months. - Standard processing fees vary from 2 to 4%. Lending partners (NBFC): SMFG India Credit Co. Ltd. (Formerly Fullerton India Credit Co. Ltd.) or SMFG India Credit, Transactree Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (Lendbox), Hero FinCorp Limited Lending partners (Bank): IDFC First Bank Limited Sample EMI Calculation: Loan Amount: ₹50,000 Interest rate (APR): 16% p.a. Tenure: 12 months EMI: ₹4,537 Total interest paid: ₹4,444 Processing Fees (2%): ₹1,000 Disbursed Amount: ₹49,000 (Principal Amount - P.F.) Total Cost of Loan: ₹55,444 Online Recharge & Bill Payment -Mobile Recharge: Quick recharge for Airtel, VI, Jio, BSNL, and more. -DTH Recharge: Recharge Tata Sky, Airtel TV, Dish TV, and more. -Bill Payment: Pay for electricity, water, broadband, LPG, FASTag, property tax, etc., covering 300+ billers. -Credit Card Payments: Settle HDFC, ICICI, SBI, Amex, and other card bills with instant processing and reminders. -Money Transfer: Send money instantly via IMPS, UPI, wallet, or credit card. Contact Us One MobiKwik Systems Limited (www.mobikwik.com/help) Unit No. 102, 1st Floor, Block-B, Pegasus One, Golf Course Road, Sector-53, Gurugram, Haryana 122003, India 080-69808686 (Mon to Sat, 9:00 am to 8:00 pm)

About MobiKwik

MobiKwik is a payment app offering bill payments, loans up to ₹2,00,000, and investments in FDs, P2P lending, mutual funds, and digital gold. You can also experience the power of Pocket UPI on MobiKwik, where UPI transactions don’t require a bank account. With Pocket UPI, enjoy enhanced security, higher transaction limits, and unmatched convenience for your digital payments.

Pocket UPI
- No Bank Account Required: Perform UPI transactions safely without linking a bank account.
- Higher Transaction & Wallet Limits: Load up to ₹2 lakhs in your wallet and transact up to ₹1 lakh per day.
- Flexible Payments: Pay to any QR code, UPI ID, or mobile number.
- Multiple Top-Up Options: Load your wallet through UPI, debit card, or credit card.
- No PIN Required: On-device biometric security (Fingerprint/Face ID) for quick, secure payments.
- Streamlined Interface: Keep Pocket UPI transactions separate from bank statements for better tracking.
- Budget Management: Assign a set amount for spending to manage personal or family budgets.

Free Credit Score
-Check your credit score for free every month.
-Get immediate access to your credit score for detailed insights.
-Reliable and accurate credit data sourced from CRIF.

UPI Payments
- Secure UPI Setup: Create a fast and secure UPI handle in-app.
- Universal Compatibility: Send/receive money via BHIM UPI, phone numbers, or direct bank account transfers.
- RuPay Credit Card Integration: Link and use your RuPay credit card to pay via UPI.
- Scan & Pay: Make payments at supermarkets, restaurants, pharmacies, and petrol pumps using the MobiKwik Wallet UPI handle.
- Trusted Brand Payments: Pay securely at Reliance Fresh, Croma, Apollo Pharmacy, and more.

EPFO Balance Checker
Access your provident fund details and track employer contributions using your registered phone number.

Track Bank Balance
Safely track multiple bank accounts with LENS. Download statements and analyze spending with smart spend insights.

Fixed Deposits
- Earn up to 9.5% Returns: Invest with Unity Small Finance Bank, Suryoday Small Finance Bank, Mahindra Finance, and more.
- Special Rates: Senior citizens receive an additional 0.5% interest, and females get an extra 0.1%.

Xtra
P2P investment platform in partnership with RBI-approved NBFC Transactree Technologies Private Limited (“Lendbox”)
- Earn upto 10-14% p.a.
- Start investing with ₹10000
- Payout to Bank accounts

ZIP EMI

- Standard processing fees vary from 2 to 4%.

description: CRED is a members-only app for all payment experiences. Trusted by over 1.4 crore+ creditworthy members, CRED rewards you for the payments & good financial decisions you make. title: CRED: UPI, Credit Cards, Bills

extra.descriptionHTML:
CRED is a members-only app for all payment experiences.
Trusted by over 1.4 crore+ creditworthy members, CRED rewards you for the payments & good financial decisions you make.

What payments can you make on CRED?

✔️ Pay credit card bills: Check credit information & manage credit cards without downloading multiple credit card apps.
✔️ Online payments: Pay via UPI or credit card when you checkout from brands like Swiggy & Myntra via CRED pay.
✔️ Offline payments: Scan QR codes & pay merchants; activate Tap to Pay for contactless payments.
✔️ Pay anyone: Send money to anyone through CRED, even if the recipient uses BHIM UPI, PhonePe, GPay or any other UPI app other than CRED.
✔️ Transfer money to bank: Send rent or education fees from your credit card.
✔️ UPI Auto Pay: Set up UPI autopay for recurring bills.
✔️ Pay bills: Pay utility bills, credit card bills, DTH bills, mobile recharge, house/office rent, and more. Get automatic bill payment reminders so you never miss a due.

What else can you do with a CRED membership?

→ Manage credit cards: Add and manage multiple credit cards on CRED for better control over your personal finance.
→ Check bank balance & credit score: Track your credit score report
→ View hidden charges: Automatically detect hidden charges on your credit cards & get alerted on duplicate transactions
→ Get smart statements: Keep track of how you use your credit card with smart statements
→ Earn rewards: Unlock exclusive perks & privileges, just for being a CRED member

Upgrade your lifestyle with CRED:

→ Curated shopping experience on CRED store
→ Curated stays & holiday packages on CRED escapes at special prices
→ Manage vehicles’ insurance, FASTag, PUCC, and more on CRED garage
→ Get pre-approved personal loans on CRED cash

Bills you can pay using credit card or UPI:

Rent: Pay your house rent, maintenance, office rental, security deposit, brokerage, etc.
Education: College fees, school fees, tuition fees, etc.
Telecom Bills: Recharge your Airtel, Vodafone, Vi, Jio, Tata Sky, DishTV, prepaid or postpaid connections, broadband, landline, cable TV, etc.
Utility Bills: Electricity bills, LPG cylinder, water bill, municipal tax, piped gas bill payment online, etc.
Other Bills like Fastag recharge, insurance premium, loan repayment, etc. can also be made through the CRED money sending app.

How to be a CRED member?

→ CRED is built to reward creditworthy individuals. To become a CRED member, you need a credit score of 750+.
→ The process is simple → Download CRED → Fill your name, mobile number & email ID → Get a free credit score report
→ If your credit score is 750+, you will get a prompt to verify credit card details

Manage your credit score with CRED:

▪️ Credit score is more than a number, it indicates your financial health
▪️ Keep a tab of your past scores and track your present one
▪️ See the factors affecting your CIBIL score with CRED
▪️ Make predictions based on the foresight & improve your CIBIL
▪️ Every credit information is encrypted, monitored and protected

Credit Cards supported on CRED:

HDFC Bank, SBI, Axis Bank, ICICI Bank, RBL Bank, Kotak Mahindra Bank, IndusInd Bank, IDFC First Bank, YES Bank, Bank of Baroda, AU SMALL FINANCE BANK, Federal Bank, Citi Bank, Standard Chartered Bank, SBM BANK INDIA LIMITED, DBS Bank, South Indian Bank, AMEX, HSBC Bank, all VISA, Mastercard, Rupay, Diners club, AMEX, Discover credit cards.

Lending partners on CRED:

IDFC First Bank Limited, Crédit Saison - Kisetsu Saison Finance (India) Private Limited, Liquiloans - NDX P2P Private Limited, Vivriti Capital Pvt Ltd, DBS Bank India Limited, Newtap Finance Pvt. Ltd.

Contact us

Have things on your mind? Don’t keep it to yourself. Contact us at feedback@cred.club.

Do a UPI money transfer, clear all your bills, improve your credit score & earn rewards with CRED. Download Now.

description:
Breaking news on world finance, business, stock market and investments. Access award-winning journalism to help you understand the economics and financial news that’s shaping tomorrow, today.

Before you change the world. Bloomberg.
Customize the app to monitor the stock market and your investment portfolio. Stay up-to-date on trending topics like the US economy, oil prices, Dow Jones, NASDAQ and more.

Bloomberg delivers critical business news for modern business leaders and financial professionals. Whether you need to monitor your stock portfolio, or understand the latest world news, Bloomberg provides data-driven insights and analysis, whenever and wherever you need it. 

FEATURES:
- News: Browse featured and trending stories in Business, Markets, Industries, Technology, Politics, Foreign Affairs, Personal Finance, Opinion and more from our 120+ global newsrooms.
- Market Data: Get the latest financial data to enable fundamental analysis, including stock prices, equity indexes, futures, bonds, commodities & foreign currencies.
- Alerts: Receive push notification alerts on the latest briefings on the financial economy and the biggest business headlines.
- Watchlist: Easily track your portfolio’s performance by adding stocks, mutual funds, ETFs or currencies to your personal Watchlist, and get the latest news related to your investments.
- Video & Audio: Stream Bloomberg TV and Bloomberg Radio live to get insights from the smartest names in Global Finance, Business, Economics & Investing, plus discover our catalog of podcasts.
- Offline Reading: Download the latest issue of Businessweek to read offline, wherever you are. 
- On the move updates: The Bloomberg App now has Android Auto, so you can get Bloomberg radio, podcasts and audio articles when you’re on the road.

A subscription to the Bloomberg app gets you unlimited access to all Bloomberg content within the app and on the website (after linking your account). 
Start with a special 3 month introductory offer (monthly subscription regularly $34.99/month).

Your payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. You may manage your subscription and auto-renew may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. 

Terms of Use: https://www.bloomberg.com/notices/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.bloomberg.com/notices/privacy

Visit us at:
http://www.bloomberg.com

description:
Sarthak Credit Co-Operative Society Maryadit, Gwalior is an organization owned and operated by a group of individuals for their mutual benefit Cooperative Society Register under Madhya Pradesh Cooperative Society Act 1960. 

Cooperatives are defined by the International Cooperative Alliance's Statement on the Cooperative Identity as autonomous associations of persons united voluntarily to meet their common economic, social, and cultural needs and aspirations through jointly owned and democratically controlled enterprises.

The mission of Sarthak Credit Co-Operative Society Maryadit is to eradicate poverty by building a secure and transparent microfinance institution to provide financial assistance to the underprivileged, especially senior citizens, women, handicapped, and those living below the poverty line.

The government has set up law for the Security of the deposit in the company to which the cradle is legally necessary. 

Sarthak Credit Co-Operative Society Maryadit is fully complied with capital adequacy norms set by the government.

description: BharatPe (previously postpe) is your one-stop financial app designed to meet all your financial needs. From lightning-fast UPI payments to convenient bill payments without any fees, quick cash loans, attractive gift vouchers, and credit card bill payments, BharatPe has you covered. BharatPe UPI - Another UPI but the only UPI Made for Bharat: (Powered by Unity Small Finance Bank and Approved by NPCI) 💸 Instant Transfers: Send money to anyone via contact, UPI ID, or bank account. 📲 Scan & Pay: Conveniently scan and pay without any tap. 🔄 UPI Autopay: Automate your bills, recharges, EMIs, and subscriptions effortlessly. 🔓 Pinless Payments: Enjoy hassle-free UPI payments up to ₹500 with UPI Lite. 🤫 Super Safe: Robust security measures to keep your payments and data secure. 🛡️ BharatPe Shield: Stay protected with FREE FRAUD PROTECTION on all your transactions. (T&C Apply) 💰 Earn Rewards: Make every transaction rewarding with BharatPe UPI! Enjoy guaranteed Zillion Coins on every payment. (T&C Apply) 🧮 Balance Check: Instantly see your account balances without complex passwords. BharatPe Bill Payments: 📲 Recharges: Pay all your bills easily for Mobile, DTH, Fastag. 💡 Utility Bills: Bill payments for electricity, water, LPG, piped gas, and broadband with ease. 💳 Credit Card Bills: Easily pay your credit card bills online. BharatPe Commerce: 🎁 Special Discounts: Get exclusive discounts on gift vouchers from top brands. 🍕Order Food: Order delicious food from nearby restaurants through ONDC. BharatPe Instant Cash Loan: 💰 High Amounts: Access instant cash loans up to ₹15 lakh. 📅 Flexible Repayment: Choose repayment options that suit your convenience. 🔓 Document Free Loans: No collateral or guarantor required. 🤝 Trusted Partners: Loans disbursed via trusted NBFC partners like L&T Finance Limited, Aditya Birla Finance Limited and True Credits Private Limited. Repayment Terms: Bill is generated every month. Users have the option to convert bills to EMIs from 3 months up to 15 months. Users can also repay the bill in full at no interest cost by the due date. Loan repayment tenure ranges from a minimum of 3 months to a maximum of 15 months. Annual Percentage Rate (APR): Ranges from 18%-70%. APR is communicated on the app while converting a bill to EMIs or taking a loan. APR will be different for different tenures of EMIs. Example of postpe cash: Amount chosen by user: ₹1,00,000 Tenure: 12 months Interest Rate: 18% per year (reducing) Processing fees: 2.5% Repayment Amount: ₹1,11,196 Total Interest Payable: ₹11,196 Processing Fees (incl. GST): ₹2,500 Monthly installment (EMI): ₹9,266.32 Total Cost of the Loan: Interest Amount + Processing Fees = ₹2,500 + ₹11,196 = ₹13,695 APR: 24.8% Example of Bill to EMI conversion: Amount converted into EMI: ₹1,00,000 Tenure: 6 months Interest Rate (APR): 18% per year Repayment Amount: ₹1,09,000 Total Interest Payable: ₹9,000 Processing Fees (incl. GST): ₹0 Monthly installment (EMI): ₹18,166.67 Total Cost of the Loan: Interest Amount + Processing Fees = ₹9,000 + ₹0 = ₹9,000 Permissions: As per NPCI regulations, it is mandatory for UPI payment apps to enable SIM binding (send and receive SMS) from the user’s device to auto populate OTP on NPCI common library for authentication and authorization of payments. We also require permissions for Location, Device Information, and SMS to provide additional data points, allowing our partners to better underwrite you. For more details, please check our Privacy Policy. About BharatPe (previously postpe): BharatPe is the brand name of the application launched by Resilient Innovations Private Limited. NBFC Partners: We have partnered with RBI-approved NBFCs such as L&T Finance Limited, Aditya Birla Finance Limited and True Credits Private Limited (Truebalance) as DSA partners to offer loans. Contact Us: Email: customer.support@bharatpe.com
summary: All-in-One Financial app for Bharat - UPI, Bill Payments & Instant Cash Loan
title: BharatPe (previously postpe)

extra.descriptionHTML:
BharatPe (previously postpe) is your one-stop financial app designed to meet all your financial needs. From lightning-fast UPI payments to convenient bill payments without any fees, quick cash loans, attractive gift vouchers, and credit card bill payments, BharatPe has you covered.

BharatPe UPI - Another UPI but the only UPI Made for Bharat:
(Powered by Unity Small Finance Bank and Approved by NPCI)
💸 Instant Transfers: Send money to anyone via contact, UPI ID, or bank account.
📲 Scan & Pay: Conveniently scan and pay without any tap.
🔄 UPI Autopay: Automate your bills, recharges, EMIs, and subscriptions effortlessly.
🔓 Pinless Payments: Enjoy hassle-free UPI payments up to ₹500 with UPI Lite.
🤫 Super Safe: Robust security measures to keep your payments and data secure.
🛡️ BharatPe Shield: Stay protected with FREE FRAUD PROTECTION on all your transactions. (T&C Apply)
💰 Earn Rewards: Make every transaction rewarding with BharatPe UPI! Enjoy guaranteed Zillion Coins on every payment. (T&C Apply)
🧮 Balance Check: Instantly see your account balances without complex passwords.

BharatPe Bill Payments:
📲 Recharges: Pay all your bills easily for Mobile, DTH, Fastag.
💡 Utility Bills: Bill payments for electricity, water, LPG, piped gas, and broadband with ease.
💳 Credit Card Bills: Easily pay your credit card bills online.

BharatPe Commerce:
🎁 Special Discounts: Get exclusive discounts on gift vouchers from top brands.
🍕Order Food: Order delicious food from nearby restaurants through ONDC.

BharatPe Instant Cash Loan:
💰 High Amounts: Access instant cash loans up to ₹15 lakh.
📅 Flexible Repayment: Choose repayment options that suit your convenience.
🔓 Document Free Loans: No collateral or guarantor required.
🤝 Trusted Partners: Loans disbursed via trusted NBFC partners like L&T Finance Limited, Aditya Birla Finance Limited and True Credits Private Limited.

Repayment Terms:
Bill is generated every month. Users have the option to convert bills to EMIs from 3 months up to 15 months. Users can also repay the bill in full at no interest cost by the due date. Loan repayment tenure ranges from a minimum of 3 months to a maximum of 15 months.

Annual Percentage Rate (APR):
Ranges from 18%-70%. APR is communicated on the app while converting a bill to EMIs or taking a loan. APR will be different for different tenures of EMIs.

Example of postpe cash:

Amount chosen by user: ₹1,00,000
Tenure: 12 months
Interest Rate: 18% per year (reducing)
Processing fees: 2.5%
Repayment Amount: ₹1,11,196
Total Interest Payable: ₹11,196
Processing Fees (incl. GST): ₹2,500
Monthly installment (EMI): ₹9,266.32
Total Cost of the Loan: Interest Amount + Processing Fees = ₹2,500 + ₹11,196 = ₹13,695
APR: 24.8%
Example of Bill to EMI conversion:

Amount converted into EMI: ₹1,00,000
Tenure: 6 months
Interest Rate (APR): 18% per year
Repayment Amount: ₹1,09,000
Total Interest Payable: ₹9,000
Processing Fees (incl. GST): ₹0
Monthly installment (EMI): ₹18,166.67
Total Cost of the Loan: Interest Amount + Processing Fees = ₹9,000 + ₹0 = ₹9,000
Permissions:
As per NPCI regulations, it is mandatory for UPI payment apps to enable SIM binding (send and receive SMS) from the user’s device to auto populate OTP on NPCI common library for authentication and authorization of payments. We also require permissions for Location, Device Information, and SMS to provide additional data points, allowing our partners to better underwrite you. For more details, please check our Privacy Policy.

About BharatPe (previously postpe):
BharatPe is the brand name of the application launched by Resilient Innovations Private Limited.

NBFC Partners:
We have partnered with RBI-approved NBFCs such as L&T Finance Limited, Aditya Birla Finance Limited and True Credits Private Limited (Truebalance) as DSA partners to offer loans.

Contact Us:
Email: customer.support@bharatpe.com

description:
Daily Expenses 4: Over a decade of experience in personal finance.
Our most advanced version yet, featuring cloud storage to keep your data safe and synchronized across all your devices.

Designed to help you organize your income and expenses with ease. Track your money movements by date and review daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly reports effortlessly.

We offer support to all our users, whether you have a subscription or not. Reach us at support@encodemx.com.

Customize the app to suit your needs: Choose your preferred currency format, date format, and add the summaries you care about most to the main screen.

KEY FEATURES:

* Unlimited accounts.
* Customizable categories and subcategories.
* Automatic cloud sync.
* Detailed reports and charts.
* Debt and goal management.
* Light and dark themes.
* Easy budget setup.
* Data recovery with your email account.
* Access through the web version.
* Share accounts with other users.
* Export data in XLS and CSV formats.
* Attach photos of your receipts.
* Movement calendar for easy tracking.

description:
Looking for a simple and accurate Loan EMI Calculator? This app helps you calculate loan interest, monthly EMIs, and repayment schedules instantly! Whether it's a personal loan, home loan, car loan, or mortgage, this app makes loan calculations quick and easy.

Loan EMI Calculator is an easy-to-use mobile application designed to help users quickly calculate their Equated Monthly Installments (EMI) for cash loans. Whether you're planning to take out a personal loan, home loan, or any other type of loan, this app simplifies the process of estimating your monthly payments.

Notes:
Disclaimer: This Loan EMI Calculator app is a financial tool and not a loan provider or connected to any financial institution.
Functionality: The app functions purely as a financial calculator and does not provide any lending services.

description: PayRupik is an online instant personal loan platform trusted by over 5 million users, provides you instant credit in minutes. It is a loan product of Sayyam Investments Pvt Ltd which is a registered NBFC under RBI. You can avail loan amount ranging up to ₹20,000, process is fast, easy and safe. If you are looking for a friend who can easily borrow money without making excuses, PayRupik is your best friend. Production: Loan Amount: from ₹1000 to ₹20000  Minimum Loan Tenure: 91 days Maximum Loan Tenure: 365 days Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 35% per annum Processing Fee: from ₹80 to ₹2000 depend on the loan tenure and amount GST: 18% on the processing fee in accordance with the law and policy of India The representative example: For the loan amount is ₹6000 and the interest rate is 25% per annum and the tenure is 120 days, then the interest payable is calculated as follows: Interest = ₹6000 x 25% / 365 x 120 = ₹493 Processing Fee = ₹100 GST = ₹100 x 18% = ₹18  The total repayment amount in 120 days shall be ₹6000 + ₹493 + ₹100 + ₹18 = ₹6611 APR = (₹6611 - ₹6000) / ₹6000 / 120 x 365 = 30.97% Why choose PayRupik? ✔ Transparency: PayRupik is an online loan product from RBI-certified NBFC which is guaranteed to be transparent. ✔ Instant Personal Loan: Loan amounts are disbursed directly into your account within 15 minutes. As the process is 100% online, you can get funds anytime, anywhere. ✔ Efficient: We process your instant loan application instantly in a fast way. No paperwork and no problems as we prioritize your needs. ✔ Security: Your data is safe with us. It is transferred over a secure HTTPS connection to the server, and we do not share it with anyone without your consent except the Lenders. What should you do first? 1. Download and install the PayRupik App. 2. Create an account. 3. Upload your KYC documents, which includes your ID, address proof, and PAN card. Eligibility: You must be an Indian national. You must be over the age of 18. You must have a steady source of income on a monthly basis. Minimal household income eligibility: Annual household income is above Rs. 3,00,000/- (Three lacs) by all sources and means. The term ‘household’ shall mean an individual family unit, i.e. husband, wife and their unmarried children who are above the age of 18 years. Contact us if you have any questions: service@payrupikloan.in or 0224-8930118 Agyathuri, Chamajali, Amingaon Guwahati Kamrup, Assam 781031
summary: PayRupik - Instant Personal Loan & Online Loan & Cash Loan App
title: PayRupik Instant Personal Loan

extra.descriptionHTML:
PayRupik is an online instant personal loan platform trusted by over 5 million users, provides you instant credit in minutes.
It is a loan product of Sayyam Investments Pvt Ltd which is a registered NBFC under RBI. You can avail loan amount ranging up to ₹20,000, process is fast, easy and safe.

If you are looking for a friend who can easily borrow money without making excuses, PayRupik is your best friend.

Production:
Loan Amount: from ₹1000 to ₹20000 
Minimum Loan Tenure: 91 days
Maximum Loan Tenure: 365 days
Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 35% per annum
Processing Fee: from ₹80 to ₹2000 depend on the loan tenure and amount
GST: 18% on the processing fee in accordance with the law and policy of India

The representative example:
For the loan amount is ₹6000 and the interest rate is 25% per annum and the tenure is 120 days, then the interest payable is calculated as follows:
Interest = ₹6000 x 25% / 365 x 120 = ₹493
Processing Fee = ₹100
GST = ₹100 x 18% = ₹18 
The total repayment amount in 120 days shall be ₹6000 + ₹493 + ₹100 + ₹18 = ₹6611
APR = (₹6611 - ₹6000) / ₹6000 / 120 x 365 = 30.97%

Why choose PayRupik?
✔ Transparency: PayRupik is an online loan product from RBI-certified NBFC which is guaranteed to be transparent.
✔ Instant Personal Loan: Loan amounts are disbursed directly into your account within 15 minutes. As the process is 100% online, you can get funds anytime, anywhere.
✔ Efficient: We process your instant loan application instantly in a fast way. No paperwork and no problems as we prioritize your needs.
✔ Security: Your data is safe with us. It is transferred over a secure HTTPS connection to the server, and we do not share it with anyone without your consent except the Lenders.

What should you do first?
1. Download and install the PayRupik App.
2. Create an account.
3. Upload your KYC documents, which includes your ID, address proof, and PAN card.

Eligibility:
You must be an Indian national.
You must be over the age of 18.
You must have a steady source of income on a monthly basis.

Minimal household income eligibility:
Annual household income is above Rs. 3,00,000/- (Three lacs) by all sources and means.
The term ‘household’ shall mean an individual family unit, i.e. husband, wife and their unmarried children who are above the age of 18 years.

Contact us if you have any questions:
service@payrupikloan.in or 0224-8930118
Agyathuri, Chamajali, Amingaon Guwahati Kamrup, Assam 781031

description:
From a single satoshi to a whole bitcoin - embark on your transformative journey with crypto blockchain without technical expertise.

Why invest in pricey hardware or grapple with technical jargon? Begin your Bitcoin mining journey the smart way.

You don't need pricey hardware. Simply pick your desired Bitcoin miner hashrate and start receiving BTC directly into your crypto wallet. Test the waters with our Free Bitcoin mining contract, demonstrating just how simple it is to generate passive income with our app.

Experience the digital gold rush with Crypto Cloud Mining – your ultimate route to seamless cryptocurrency accumulation. Begin with our cloud rigs. They’re a straightforward route to earn, while we manage the complexities like proof of work algorithms, hashrates, blockchains, bitcoin halvenings, mining pools, and ASICs.

Remote mining is an excellent way to dive into BTC mining. With accessible cloud ASICs and cloud GPUs, monitoring is a breeze. Simply watch your crypto portfolio expand. Indeed, crypto mining is the epitome of passive income.

Your integrated Bitcoin wallet securely stores your earnings until you’re ready to transfer. Whether it's to your personal address, a crypto exchange, or any Bitcoin-compatible destination, the process is straightforward.

The technicalities of blockchain, like its public ledger and Proof of Work (POW), might be daunting, and calculating your mining ROI might appear challenging, but that's why our remote miner stands out. Our unified crypto wallet view keeps track of your earnings, providing a consolidated glance at your assets.

For peace of mind, we keep your Bitcoin rewards in cold storage, ensuring your earnings are protected. Get even more out of your experience with our referral program. When your friends join the mining journey, both of you benefit.

Customize your mining operation with over 20 cloud mining options, from free contracts to recurring subscriptions. Our virtual mining setup, utilizing GPUs and ASICs, continually evolves to meet the demands of our expanding user base.

Key Features:

description: Easily follow your stocks, indices, futures from the US, EU, and Asian markets. View stocks quotes and daily performance in customizable portfolios, tap any ticker to see an interactive chart and detailed information. Read the latest investment and business news from top publications around the world. MAJOR STOCKS Stay on top of the changing US and global stocks markets. Get real-time stock quotes and prices: Apple Inc. (AAPL), Alphabet Inc. (GOOGL), Amazon (AMZN), Nike (NKE), Microsoft Corporation (MSFT), Netflix (NFLX), Bank of America Corporation (BAC), Tesla (TSLA), General Electric Company (GE), and many more. TOP INDEXES Track major indexes from around the world: ■ USA Indexes: Dow Jones, NASDAQ, NYSE, S&P 500, RUSSELL 2000, IPC, IPSA, IBOVESPA, etc. ■ Europe Indexes: CAC 40, ATX, BEL 20, OMX COPENHAGEN 20, OMX HELINSKI 25, FTSE MIB, IBEX 35, etc. ■ Asia Indexes: NIKKEI 225, SENSEX, NIFTY, SHANGHAI COMPOSITE, S&P/ASX 200, HANG SENG, KOSPI, KLCI, NZSE 50, etc. COMMODITY PRICES Track commodity prices: Gold, Silver, Crude Oil, Natural Gas, Cotton, Sugar, Wheat, Corn, etc. CURRENCY EXCHANGE RATES Follow currency exchange rates: USD/EURO (EUR), USD/YEN (JPY), USD/CAD, POUND(GBP)/USD, USD/YUAN(CNY), USD/INR, USD/FRANC(CHF), USD/WON(KRW), etc. INTERACTIVE CHARTS ■ Simple Line Chart / Candle Chart ■ Turn your device sideways to interact with full-screen charts ■ Intraday chart, 5 day, 6 month, 1 year, 5 years, 10 years, and 15+ chart PORTFOLIO / WATCHLIST Create your own customized portfolios and follow stock quotes, futures, indices, ETFs and bonds. You can create any number of portfolios for effective work with your stocks. STOCKS WIDGETS Use on-screen widgets to keep track of your stocks without opening the app. Various settings and colors of stock widgets help effectively monitor changes in stock prices in global markets. FINANCIAL NEWS Read the latest financial news from Wall Street Journal (WSJ), CNBC, Reuters, Fox Business, CNBC, Forbes, Bloomberg, Investopedia, MarketWatch, and more. ECONOMIC CALENDAR Check out the economic calendar. See what will impact the market this week. Sort events by importance, country and view historical data and forecasts. PRICE ALERTS React quickly to price changes in your stock portfolio. You can set up unlimited notifications for a specific price, change by %, or volume.

description:
"EvoWallet" Premium Edition is an easy-to-use personal finance application for Android devices designed to help you keep track of the balances of all of your money accounts on the go.


The app's user interface is sleek, intuitive, and easy to use, with a built-in mini calculator and easy calendar picker. Allow you to take a picture for each transaction; you will never forget where/what your money goes.


With the most intuitive UI and a unique two-side transaction list design, you can scroll and view both income and outcome transactions separately and easily. Clean, fast, and super easy input screen without any unnecessary fields. The app allows you to enter an empty (zero amount) transaction, and then you can enter all the details when you have time.


With the multiple accounts feature, you can apply to track a lot of things, such as cash in wallets, bank accounts, credit/debit cards, money ledgers, payments, savings, cash flow, ahorro, etc.


Key features:
- Supports multiple accounts !!!.
- Multiple currencies.
- Unlimited categories with a lot of icons.
- Instant balance calculation.
- Two styles for the transaction viewer (independent debit and credit transactions list and the legacy transactions list).
- Balance forward for every view in the period of transactions.
- Easy input for deposit, withdraw, and transfer transactions.
- Configurable start date of the month for each account or globally.
- Favorite Transactions: Star it and use it for fast and easy creation of new transactions. 
- Instant monthly and yearly reports with graphs.
- Search for income/outcome/transfer transactions in the database.
- Passcode Lock: Keep your personal finances safe.
- Build-in simple calculator on the transaction input screen.
- Data backup and restore; easy backup of export files via memory card.
- Option to send the backup file to email right after successfully backing up.
- Export transactions to a CSV file with the option to send via email.
- Clean UI that is easy to understand and use.
- You can take a picture of the transaction related thing, such as a receipt, goods, etc.
- Optimized for Android mobile phones.
- Color themes. (Perfectly matched to your style.).
- Very small app in size; it's just about 1.5MB.
- Also available in other O/S, so you can transfer the database to your new device and continue using it when you have to change your phone to another platform.
- No ad banners at all.
- Pay once, full features, no In-App purchases (no hidden cost/purchase).

Don't put your personal financial status into the complexity, but always be simplicity.


Want to easily keep track of your cash money, do you? 
Let ' EvoWallet - Premium Edition' always be in your palm.


We strongly recommend you try an "EvoWallet - Lite Version."  Check the "More from Developer" section below.

description:
CryptoTiles provides Tiles that let you view charts and prices of all the cryptocurrencies you are interested in directly on your Wear OS watch.
Tiles are quick to open and not as heavyweight as applications, allowing you to check your favorite cryptocurrencies in a matter of seconds.

The app features two tiles:
The chart tile displaying candlestick- or linecharts. You may toggle your tickers by tapping the display center. Change the displayed time frame by tapping the tile's left side.
The overview tile features a summary of all your coins. If you have input the amount of tokens you own the total sum of your assets will as well be shown here. Tap the screen to cycle through all your assets.

In addition to tiles, the app features so-called complications, which enable you to show a selected asset and/or your total assets' value directly on your watchface.

Choose freely which tickers you'd like to display by adding them in the app's menu. Additionally, you may add the amount of coins you own to have the total worth of your coins shown. You may as well configure which currency your assets are going to be converted to and how your charts are displayed (i.e. line or candlechart, scales etc.)

The app uses the CoinGecko API and thus allows you to add all assets listed there. Please refer to https://coingecko.com/ when looking for ticker names usable for input.

I'll gladly take any feedback, bug reports and feature requests you have. Just send me a mail at tiles@tobias-goerke.de and we'll be in touch.

Also check out the StockTiles app for managing your favorite stock assets.
