CryptoTiles provides Tiles that let you view charts and prices of all the cryptocurrencies you are interested in directly on your Wear OS watch.
Tiles are quick to open and not as heavyweight as applications, allowing you to check your favorite cryptocurrencies in a matter of seconds.

The app features two tiles:
The chart tile displaying candlestick- or linecharts. You may toggle your tickers by tapping the display center. Change the displayed time frame by tapping the tile's left side.
The overview tile features a summary of all your coins. If you have input the amount of tokens you own the total sum of your assets will as well be shown here. Tap the screen to cycle through all your assets.

In addition to tiles, the app features so-called complications, which enable you to show a selected asset and/or your total assets' value directly on your watchface.

Choose freely which tickers you'd like to display by adding them in the app's menu. Additionally, you may add the amount of coins you own to have the total worth of your coins shown. You may as well configure which currency your assets are going to be converted to and how your charts are displayed (i.e. line or candlechart, scales etc.)

The app uses the CoinGecko API and thus allows you to add all assets listed there. Please refer to https://coingecko.com/ when looking for ticker names usable for input.

I'll gladly take any feedback, bug reports and feature requests you have. Just send me a mail at tiles@tobias-goerke.de and we'll be in touch.

Also check out the StockTiles app for managing your favorite stock assets.

description: Expenso is a budget manager and spending tracker android app that’ll help you manage your personal finances with ease. 🎯 💡 Features : 👉 Easily track expenses and incomes. 👉 Organize expenses by category for better tracking. 👉 User-friendly interface for easy use. 👉 Generate reports in CSV format for easy data analysis. 👉 View monthly, yearly, and all-time summaries of your spending and incomes. 👉 Backup and restore your data for peace of mind. 👉 Secure your app with an app lock. 👉 Support for multiple currencies to use worldwide. 👉 Set reminders to add expenses to avoid missing any. 👉 Choose between dark and light themes for personalization. 👉 No app permission required for added privacy and convenience. 🌍 Supported Languages: 👉 English 👉 Hindi 👉 Spanish 👉 Czech 🏆 Expenso is simple, intuitive, stable and feature-rich app that is just designed for you. Everything you need at your fingertips to manage the expenditures, reports and budgets. 🪄 The app has the best interface which is very easy to use and navigate through. 🔐 We respect your privacy and understand the sensitive nature of your data. That’s why your financial data never reaches our servers and always stays on your device under your ownership. 📆 Budgets Creating budgets is an essential thing to managing finances. Create a month-wise budget, and we will help you stay track by predicting if you’re likely to overshoot your set budget. 🔰 Analysis You'll get a detailed analysis of your transactions & category wise breakdowns, to help you make better decisions with your budget. Easy to read graphs will show your expense and income trends throughout a month. 🔖 Categories The app provides you with 10 categories for spending and 7 for income. You can edit these categories or add new ones according to your needs. 📋 Expense Tracking Track your category wise expenses and incomes on history and reports screen. you can track your yearly income and expenses as well. 💹 Overview Monthly budget with progress bar. monthly and yearly summary 📈 Report Income : category wise income report Expense: category wise expense report Yearly income and expense summary ⚙️ Customization 🏦 User can customise monthly budget according to their need 💵 Customizing income and expense category 💰 Multiple currencies support 📲 Download Expenso - Expense manager right now and start managing, tracking, and planning your budget, expenses and personal finances!

developer.name: OneSolutions
developer.legalAddress: 132/71, Namdeo Bapu Nagar, Walwadi, Dhule - 424002

summary: Expenso is a money manager app that’ll help you manage your personal finances
title: Expenso - Money Manager

extra.descriptionHTML:
Expenso is a budget manager and spending tracker android app that’ll help you manage your personal finances with ease. 🎯

💡 Features :
👉 Easily track expenses and incomes.
👉 Organize expenses by category for better tracking.
👉 User-friendly interface for easy use.
👉 Generate reports in CSV format for easy data analysis.
👉 View monthly, yearly, and all-time summaries of your spending and incomes.
👉 Backup and restore your data for peace of mind.
👉 Secure your app with an app lock.
👉 Support for multiple currencies to use worldwide.
👉 Set reminders to add expenses to avoid missing any.
👉 Choose between dark and light themes for personalization.
👉 No app permission required for added privacy and convenience.

🌍 Supported Languages:
👉 English
👉 Hindi
👉 Spanish
👉 Czech

🏆 Expenso is simple, intuitive, stable and feature-rich app that is just designed for you. Everything you need at your fingertips to manage the expenditures, reports and budgets.

🪄 The app has the best interface which is very easy to use and navigate through.

🔐 We respect your privacy and understand the sensitive nature of your data. That’s why your financial data never reaches our servers and always stays on your device under your ownership.

📆 Budgets

Creating budgets is an essential thing to managing finances. Create a month-wise budget, and we will help you stay track by predicting if you’re likely to overshoot your set budget.

🔰 Analysis

You'll get a detailed analysis of your transactions & category wise breakdowns, to help you make better decisions with your budget. Easy to read graphs will show your expense and income trends throughout a month.

🔖 Categories

The app provides you with 10 categories for spending and 7 for income. You can edit these categories or add new ones according to your needs.

📋 Expense Tracking

Track your category wise expenses and incomes on history and reports screen. you can track your yearly income and expenses as well.

💹 Overview

Monthly budget with progress bar. monthly and yearly summary

📈 Report

Income : category wise income report
Expense: category wise expense report
Yearly income and expense summary

⚙️ Customization

🏦 User can customise monthly budget according to their need
💵 Customizing income and expense category
💰 Multiple currencies support

📲 Download Expenso - Expense manager right now and start managing, tracking, and planning your budget, expenses and personal finances!

description:
Simple currency converter and exchange rates calculator for up to 15 currencies at once!
We've seen it all - various currency converters, exchange rates lists with charts and historic data. But who need all that fancy stuff, when you simply need to find out on holiday how much does that thing cost, right?
This app will do exactly what you'd expect of it during the vacation in some country. It's main advantage is that you can choose up to 15 currencies that are visible on mainscreen.
Conversion will take place right away - just as you start to type the numbers. 

Do you wish to do some math with the numbers? No problem - use built-in calculator. Result will be automaticaly converted to all currencies. Can't find your currency? Just add it as a new currency code and simply run update. App will download it's name and fresh exchange rate. From now on it will always auto-update.

Main features of this currency converter are:
- nice graphics, also suited for tablets and android wear.
- ease of use - convert up to 15 currencies at once!
- offline usage - roaming prices are no longer a problem now - all the exchange rates are cached!
- filter of currencies - just press search in list
- various preferences that allows you to change all the small things
- online update is provided via European central bank, Additional sources, RSS feeds or you can manually add any custom currency

description:
Convert Play points to Cash in Just 3-10 Working Days! Fast and Easy Payouts with Reward Converter PRO.

Are you tired of waiting weeks to cash out your rewards? With Reward Converter PRO, you can convert your points, gift cards, or rewards into cash in as little as 3-10 working days! Get instant access to your earnings and deposit them directly into your bank account without any hassle.

Please Note: Reward Converter PRO does not convert rewards earned from ads.

KEY FEATURES:
- Payout in Just 3-10 Working Days: Get your cash faster than ever! No more long waits.
- Smooth UI Experience: Enjoy a seamless, intuitive app experience with effortless navigation.
- Instant Conversion: Convert your rewards to cash in just a few taps—no delays!
- Secure Direct Transfer: Securely deposit your money into your bank account.
- Transparent Fees: No hidden costs—what you see is exactly what you get.
- User-Friendly Interface: Designed for everyone, from beginners to experienced users.

Maximize the value of your rewards with Reward Converter PRO and get your money quickly, efficiently, and securely!

description:
GoMining: Empowering Your Digital Mining Journey.

Welcome to GoMining - Mining App, a pioneering platform that transforms the landscape of digital mining. At GoMining, we leverage the power of miners and our unique ecosystem to offer a seamless and efficient mining experience.

Explore the World of Digital Miners.

Dive into the future of mining with GoMining's digital miners. Our digital miners are not cloud mining, they are your gateway to participating in the mining process without the complexities of managing physical hardware. Each digital miner represents real computing power, enabling you to collect daily rewards directly to your wallet. With options ranging from 1 to 5000 TH/s, scaling your mining operations has never been easier or more accessible.

The GoMining coin Ecosystem: Enhancing Your Experience.

At the core of GoMining - Mining App is our ecosystem, designed to maximize your mining efficiency and rewards. Our coins not only facilitate transactions within the platform but also offer numerous benefits: Purchase and Upgrade: Use coins to acquire new miners or enhance the power and efficiency of your existing miners. Energy Efficiency: Enjoy additional discounts on electricity fees, reducing overhead and increasing net rewards. veGOMINING Rewards: Get votes (veGOMINING) to enjoy weekly rewards and participate in governance, influencing the future direction of GoMining.

Why Choose GoMining?

Ease of Access: Start mining with minimal effort and no need for technical expertise or significant upfront costs. Instant Rewards: Receive daily mining rewards directly to your chosen wallet, providing a steady flow of value. Scalability: Effortlessly increase your mining capacity through power and energy efficiency upgrades, with no physical limitations. Sustainability: Participate in a platform committed to energy efficiency and reducing the environmental impact of mining operations. Join GoMining - Mining App today and embark on a mining adventure that's accessible, efficient, and rewarding. With our innovative use of digital miners and a supportive ecosystem, we're not cloud mining – we're building the future of digital asset generation.

description:
Where does all your money go? Exactly where you tell it to!


“We started YNAB January 1st with $37 saved and ended the year with $42,000. Plus we paid $14,000 cash for a new roof.”
-Kyle, YNAB user since 2020


If you’re like the average YNABer (just AVERAGE), you’ll save $600 in the first two months. And $6,000 in the first year. But you might experience something much more powerful than a growing bank account balance or paid off credit cards: 92% of YNABers report feeling less stressed since starting YNAB.


“YNAB has removed the stress of money from my life and in doing so has helped make me a better husband. It's like I got to remove a personal flaw I had never been able to fix."
-Kyle, again. We didn’t even pay him to say this, but maybe we should.


Every dollar represents you—it’s the product of your energy. You work too hard for all that to go to waste. We’ll show you how to give every dollar a job, so your paychecks are working toward your priorities and values, your wants and needs, your work and your play. Your money is your life. Spend it well with YNAB.

Start your one-month free trial today!

Features:
BUILT FOR PARTNERS & FAMILIES
-Up to six people can share budgets on one YNAB subscription
-Simplifies sharing finances with a partner
-Cheaper than couples counseling


PAY OFF YOUR DEBT
-Loan planner tool
-Calculate time and interest saved 
-A debt-paying community to cheer you on


IMPORT TRANSACTIONS AUTOMATICALLY
-Securely link financial accounts to bring in transactions
-Option to add transactions manually
-Experience the oddly satisfying routine of categorizing transactions


NO ADS
-Privacy protection
-No in-app ads
-No third-party product pitching. Ew.


VIEW YOUR FINANCIAL PICTURE ALL IN ONE PLACE
-Net worth report
-Spending breakdown
-Income vs expense report


SET & REACH GOALS FASTER
-Track expenses
-Set spending targets
-Visualize progress as you go


REAL HELP FROM REAL HUMANS
-Award-winning support team
-Free live workshops
-Real people (who aren’t perfect either)


“My wife and I can attest to the fact that the average budgeter saves around $600 in 2 months. We did! We love everything about YNAB except that WE DIDN’T START SOONER!!!!!!!!!”
-Gideon, YNAB user since 2019

"I never, ever thought I'd see this, and yet here it is: CREDIT CARD BEAST DEFEATED!”
-@taber

“I’m sleeping better now. Our arguments about money have magically evaporated.”
-Jonathan, YNABer (former Mint user)


"My fiance and I will be paying for our wedding without any loans because of YNAB."
-@Thai_Jonny

“A year of YNAB costs less than a massage and is a heck of a lot better for reducing stress.”
-Kat, YNAB user since 2016


Your money is your life. Spend it well with YNAB. 

Free for 30 Days, then Monthly/Annual Subscriptions Available

Subscription Details
-YNAB is a one-year auto-renewable subscription, billed monthly or annually.
-Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
-Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
-Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
-Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
-Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a
subscription to that publication, where applicable.

You Need A Budget UK Limited is acting as an agent of TrueLayer, who is providing the regulated Account Information Service, and is authorized by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (Firm Reference Number: 901096)

Terms of Use:
https://www.ynab.com/terms/?isolated

Privacy Policy:
https://www.ynab.com/privacy-policy/?isolated

California Privacy Policy:
https://www.ynab.com/privacy-policy/california-privacy-disclosure?isolated

description:
Paper: Learn to Trade Without the Risk

India's Free NSE NIFTY and BANKNIFTY Futures & Options Virtual Trading app or Paper Trading app.

Description:
Welcome to "Paper" the ultimate virtual trading app or paper trading app for aspiring traders to practice their trading skills without risking any real money! Whether you're a beginner looking to learn the basics of trading or an experienced trader looking to fine-tune your trading strategies, Paper is the perfect platform to hone your skills in a safe and realistic environment.

Features:

MyCreditCard-CashSaver: Master Your Credit, Simplify Your Finances  

Take control of your credit life with MyCreditCard-CashSaver — the ultimate Android app for smart credit card management in India. Designed for users juggling multiple cards, our tool helps you track bills, avoid late fees, and optimize spending, all while keeping your data 100% secure.  

Key Features:
- Card Management: Add, edit, delete, and manage all your credit cards in one place.
- Cash Tracking: Keep a detailed record of all transactions.
- Secure Storage: All data is stored locally on your device, ensuring privacy and security.


Why Choose MyCreditcard-CashSaver?
- Efficiency: Streamline your card management with intuitive navigation and powerful tools.
- Security: Your financial information is protected as we adhere to strict data privacy standards.



Get Started in 3 Steps!  
1. Download Now on Google Play.
2. Register and add your credit cards securely!  
3. Start tracking, saving, and mastering your finances today.  

  

Questions? We’re Here to Help!  
Contact Us: richescreater@gmail.com.

description:
Kredit Rupee is a loan aggregator platform and marketplace (personal loan app) that connects students, self-employed, salaried, and business owners with RBI-registered NBFCs to apply for flexible personal and business loans. The Kredit Rupee personal loan app makes it easier for every credit seeker to secure the best financial services through verified lenders with a 100% seamless online application, minimal documentation, no hidden charges, low interest rates, and quick approval.

➤ Use the Kredit Rupee Personal Loan App for:

• Medical Loan: Cover medical bills with a hassle-free personal loan
• Pre-owned Vehicle Loan: Own a vehicle with a flexible personal loan
• Education Loan: Boost your career with digital personal loan offers
• Home Renovation Loan: Give your home a makeover with our personal loan app
• Travel Loan: Travel worldwide with the Kredit Rupee personal loan app
• Wedding Loan: Plan your dream wedding with a personal loan
• Shopping Loan: Fund your purchases with a quick personal loan

➤ Reasons to Download the Kredit Rupee Personal Loan App:

• 100% Digital Process: A seamless online application with the best financial services
• User-friendly: An easy-to-use personal loan app interface
• Personal Loan App Matchmaker: A personal loan app that connects you with verified lenders as per your needs
• Quick Application: 3-step process to get the best personal loan offer
• Trusted Platform: Get the best personal loan offers from RBI-registered NBFCs
• Pre-qualified Loan Offers: Browse the best pre-qualified personal loan offers
• Quick Approval: Fast loan approval for instant needs
• Low Interest Rates: Secure a low-interest rate loan from verified lenders
• Loan Tenure: 3-60 months
• Flexible EMI: Access to easy EMI options 
• Instant Disbursal: Say goodbye to loan delays
• Collateral-free loan: No pledging of assets required

➤ Repayment Timelines, APR and Transparent Processing Fees & GST:

• Interest rates start from 1% to 3% per month, corresponding to a maximum APR of 12% to 36%*
• The repayment tenure ranges from 3-60 months
• Processing fees will be charged separately as applicable by the lending partner

➤ Key Documents for a Business or Personal Loan:

• Identify Proof: Aadhar card, PAN card, Driver’s license, Passport, or Voter ID 
• Address Proof: Aadhar card, Utility bills, Voter ID card, or Passport
• Income Proof: Bank statements or Salary slips (for salaried)

➤ Loan Eligibility:

• Age limit: 18-55 years
• Eligible: Salaried, self-employed & students
• Loan Applicants: Indian Nationality

➤ How to Apply for a Personal Loan:

• Download the Kredit Rupee Personal Loan app
• Enter your personal details
• Verify your phone number
• Provide your financial information
• Enter your PAN Card number
• Submit your personal loan request

➤ Personal Loan Example:

Loan amount: ₹2,00,000
Interest rate: 12% minimum
Repayment tenure: 1 year
Processing fee of 2%: ₹4,000 + GST = ₹4,720
Loan EMI: ₹17,853.28 
The total interest: ₹14,239.36 
Loan repayment amount after 1 year: ₹2,14,239.36
The maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR) can go up to 36%*

*Note: These figures are for explanatory purposes only. The final interest rate and APR are subject to the customer’s credit evaluation, as determined by Kredit Rupee’s lending partner(s).

➤ Our RBI-registered NBFC Partners:

• Arham Finance & Investment Services Limited - https://arhamfinance.com/sourcingPartner - (CIN - U74899DL1992PLC050484)

• Yashik Finlease Private Limited - https://yashikfinlease.com/ - (CIN - U65910HR1993PTC032032)

Contact Us:
For any queries, reach out to us at contact@kreditrupee.com

description:
Struggling to keep track of your EMIs? Oolka makes it easy to manage, pay, and track your loans—all in one place! Plus, with timely payments, you can maintain a healthy credit score and even earn cashback. 🚀 With a healthy credit score you can apply for personal loans from trusted partners on Oolka. 

🔹 Oolka -  Smart Loan Management
✅ One-stop loan management – View all your loans & EMIs in one place.
✅ Seamless EMI payments – No need to visit multiple apps to pay your EMIs.
✅ Cashback on EMI payments – Pay on time & earn real rewards! 💰
✅ Boost your credit score – On-time EMI payments keep your credit score strong.
✅ Safe & secure transactions – Powered by NPCI / BBPS for 100% secure payments.
✅ Trusted Partners: On Oolka you can apply for personal loans from top trusted lending partners at low interest rates

💳 How Oolka Helps You Stay on Top of Your Finances
1️⃣ Track all your loans – See EMI details, due dates & payment history at a glance.
2️⃣ Get timely reminders – Avoid late fees & credit score dips with smart alerts.
3️⃣ Pay EMIs instantly – Securely pay all EMIs from one place—no more app-hopping.
4️⃣ Earn cashback – Get rewarded for responsible financial habits!
5️⃣ Build a strong credit profile – Regular, on-time payments help you maintain & grow your credit score.

🔐 100% Safe & Secure EMI Payments
Oolka is built on NPCI / BBPS-backed infrastructure, ensuring fast, secure, and reliable transactions. 

Data Privacy & Security

We follow the highest security standards to protect your data, ensuring your personal and financial information stays safe.

🔒 Robust Security: We use industry-leading protocols to safeguard your data from unauthorized access and cyber threats.
📊 Data Encryption: All data transmitted through Oolka is encrypted, keeping your information confidential and secure.
☁️ Secure Storage: Your data is stored on secure servers with strict access controls, ensuring only authorized personnel can access it.
🤝 Trusted Protocols: Our payment systems are integrated with Bharat Bill Pay (BBPS)—an RBI-NPCI initiative.


📈 Better Loan Management = A Healthier Credit Score!

Download Oolka today & take control of your EMIs, credit score & rewards!


→ Our partner NBFCs
L&T Finance Limited (formerly known as L&T Finance Holdings Limited)
Volt Money (Salter Technologies Private Limited)
RNVP Technology Private Limited
InCred Financial Services Limited (Formerly ""KKR India Financial Services Limited"")

→ Our partner Credit Card Issuer Banks
IDFC First Bank 
Yes Bank
AU Small Finance Bank

→ What we offer for Loans
Min & Max Repayment Period  - 3 months to 36 months
 APR - 14% to 36%

→ What we offer for Credit Cards
Apply for Secured Cards issued by partners
Apply for Unsecured Cards  issued by partners

→ Privacy Policy
 https://oolka.in/privacy-policy

→ Sample Personal Loan Calculation
Let's say you borrow ₹6,30,000 for 36 months, then your:
Processing fee (2% of loan amount + 18 % GST) cost to: ₹ 14,868
Interest rate: 14.5% p.a. (on reducing principal balance interest calculation)
Your EMI will be: ₹ 21,685
Total amount to be paid: ₹ 21,685 x 36 = ₹ 7,80,668
Total interest paid: ₹ 1,50,668
Total cost of loan: ₹ 1,50,668 + ₹ 14,868 = ₹ 1,65,536
APR (Annual Percentage Rate): 17.45%

→ Eligibility for Personal Loan
Age: 21-55 years
Minimum in-hand monthly salary requirement: ₹25000 and above
Should be a resident of India


→ Eligibility for Credit Cards
Age - 21 to 65 years
Should be a resident of India
Minimum in-hand monthly salary requirement: ₹25000 and above


→ Oolka supports these loan EMI payments
We support loans disbursed by Krazybee Services Private Limited, Bajaj Finance Limited, Snapmint Financial Services Pvt Ltd, Navi Finserv Limited, Muthoot Finance Limited, Speel Finance Company Pvt Ltd, DMI Finance Private Limited, Shriram Finance Limited, Tata Capital Ltd, etc.
We support all loans payable via the Bharat Connect ecosystem.



Reach out to us:
✉️ help@oolka.in | ☎️ 011-40846061

description:
Welcome to IDFC FIRST Bank’s Mobile Banking App. Enjoy a fast and seamless online banking experience, with integrated banking services and exciting features.

Experience the joy of:
* One-Swipe Banking: Swipe to view your account balances and manage credit card/debit card details, deposits, investments, etc
* Instant Payments & Transfers: Make secure payments, UPI transfers, and bill payments
* Zero Fee Banking: Enjoy free Savings Account services, such as money transfers, cheque re-issuance, debit card issuance, and ATM withdrawals
* Tracking Expenses: Monitor cash flow with over 20 automatically categorized transaction types. Link FIRST WOW! & Digital Rupay Credit Card with UPI, earn cashback & rewards on every payment.
* Auto-Sweep Current Accounts: BRAVO Current Accounts with Auto-Sweep to FD for higher interest rates
* Building Wealth: One screen view of your investment portfolio. Get curated investment recommendations based on your risk profile

* Personalized Offers: Get exciting offers across dining, lifestyle, travel & more
* Instant Personal Loans: Avail pre-approved loan offers at attractive interest rates & flexible tenures
*Fixed Deposit: Open an FD in 3 quick steps. Invest online & get guaranteed returns.  
Smart App Features and Services
1. Secure Fund Transfers & Payments
⭐ Free fund transfers to any bank account without adding beneficiary
⭐ Easy bill payment and recharge – mobile recharge, DTH & utility bills
⭐ Earn up to 10X rewards on travel/shopping spends via credit cards, redeem anytime for exclusive discounts 
⭐ 3-click digital bill payments
⭐ Zero fee money transfer (मनी ट्रांसफर) to bank accounts through IMPS, NEFT, or RTGS
⭐Send money, pay utility & credit card bills, loan EMIs, buy/recharge FASTag, using UPI
⭐ Link bank (बैंक) accounts & view your savings account (बचत खाता) balances with UPI

2. Investment, Mutual Funds & IPOs App:
Explore online investment services:
✓ Invest in Mutual Funds online with Instant SIP
✓ Invest in equity, debt, large-cap and multi-cap
✓ Save tax with ELSS mutual funds
✓ Invest in Unit Linked Insurance Plans (ULIP) and Online Sovereign Gold Bonds
3. Insurance App:
Buy health, bike & car insurance through our app

4. Tripstacc Benefits
☛ Convenient in-app flight & hotel booking experience on the IDFC FIRST Bank mobile app, powered by Tripstacc
☛ ZERO convenience fees on flight booking & earn 20 bonus points for every ₹100 spent on hotel bookings

5. Other Banking Services:
⭐ Apply for debit card & cheque book via app with nil charges.
⭐ View filtered transactions & download Smart Statement + Digest 
⭐ Manage credit card payments, download statements, & redeem credit card (क्रेडिट कार्ड) rewards
⭐ Quick purchase & recharge of FASTag
⭐ Zero fee on DD & Pay order issuance & 3rd party withdrawals
⭐ No ECS return fee & decline fee at ATMs for low funds
⭐ Get personalised offers across loans
⭐ One app login for retail, MSME, Customer Service, & Relationship Management

Steps to Download App & Open a Digital Banking Account (बैंक खाता):
☛ Download the banking app & click on open savings account (सेविंग्स अकाउंट)
☛ Register your details & get user ID & password
☛ Log in via user ID & password or mobile number & MPIN
☛ Set up Face ID or finger scanner (biometric) for easy log-in
☛ SIM Binding feature for secure banking (बैंकिंग)

Personal Loan Features:
Loan amount: ₹20,000 to ₹40 lakhs
Personal Loan Tenure: 6 to 60 months
Annual Percentage Rate: 11% to 28%
Representative Example:
Loan amount: ₹1,00,000
Loan Tenure: 12 months
Interest Rate (reducing): 20%
EMI Amount: ₹9,264
Total Interest Payable: ₹11,168
Processing Fee (incl GST): ₹3,499
Disbursed Loan Amount: ₹96,501
Total Amount Payable: ₹1,11,168
Total cost of Loan (Interest + Processing Fee): ₹14,667

Disclosure:
By downloading the IDFC FIRST Bank Mobile App, you agree to our Terms & Conditions, as well as IDFC FIRST Bank’s privacy policy. To go through the T&Cs, please visit https://www.idfcfirstbank.com/terms-and-conditions

description:
Imagine you had $100k to invest in stocks, forex, gold, oil and other assets. Could you double it, or would you lose it all in 3 days?

Don't guess. Test your trading skills and boost pattern recognition dexterity with the real-time trading simulator. Use our cutting-edge trading school to uncover the secrets and trading strategies of pro traders.

STOCK SIMULATOR
All beginner traders make mistakes. Our real-time investing game lets you test your intuition without jeopardizing real money. Try out your trading ideas and invest in your virtual portfolio using the $100,000 of game money.

→ Master the price action and technical analysis by buying or selling more than 200 different assets including indices, oil, gold, gas, etc.
→ Increase your motivation by competing against other traders in the weekly fantasy invest leaderboard of the stocks game.
→ Most other stock sim apps have asset prices that update only once per day or once per minute. That is far from real-life experience. Unlike others, we have real-time market prices that update multiple times per second. Thus you get the real deal. For free.
→ Discover the latest stock trends with the daily top-gainers and top-losers.

TRADING SCHOOL - LEARN TO INVEST AND TRADE STOCKS, FOREX, GOLD, OIL
Learn trading and investing with bite-sized interactive lessons and trading simulator. We have gone through hundreds of top trading books, webinars, and paid seminars and compressed them all into an interactive trading course. We hate fluff, so we have boiled it down to the most effective things. Thus you don't have to waste a minute or a dollar on education materials that are not useful.

→ Uncover how much the pro traders earn and how much money you can make with day trading.
→ Learn the basics and strategies of technical analysis with real examples.
→ Enjoy the bite-sized tips and insights from experienced traders and investors.
→ Discover how to find the best brokers for beginners and beyond.
→ Learn forex trading and stock investing 3X faster thanks to scientifically proven interactive education methods.

TRADING SIMULATOR
Use our free paper trading simulator to practice buying and selling all your favorite stocks and currency pairs. 

→ Find the best moments to sell or buy shares of companies.
→ Practice risk management and develop trading discipline with the stop-loss and take-profit functionality.
→ Learn how to use multiple time-frame analysis by choosing different time frames inside the trading sim.

FOREX GAME FOR BEGINNERS
Have you ever wondered how Soros made $1 billion in a day selling the British pound? Try trading various forex pairs in our forex trading game with live currency prices. You will quickly uncover the specifics of forex trading and how currencies compare to other asset classes.

→ Learn the risks and opportunities of using margin by trying different leverage levels for your trades.
→ Switch from line charts to candlestick charts to get deeper insights into price action.

Download the app now and build the knowledge of a winner — at your own pace, in your free time, and 100% risk-free.

description:
Take Control of Your Finances : EasyLoan - EMI Loan Calculator Application

Loan EMI Calculator is your go-to app for a variety of financial calculations, making complex calculations simple and accessible. Whether you’re planning a loan, estimating savings, or tracking investments, EasyLoan provides an intuitive interface and comprehensive tools to help you manage your finances.

Transform your financial planning with the EasyLoan - EMI Loan Calculator. This intuitive and user-friendly app simplifies the calculation of monthly installments for various loans, such as car loans, home loans, and more. Empower yourself with quick estimates of your monthly payments, loan amounts, interest rates, and loan tenure, enabling informed financial decisions.

Calculate your EMIs instantly and plan your finances smartly with our easy-to-use EMI Loan Calculator

Empower your financial journey: Calculate your EMI effortlessly, plan repayments smartly, and unlock clarity on every payment with our intuitive EMI Loan Calculator

Disclaimer NOTE:
- This application is designed solely for the purpose of providing users with estimations and calculations related only to loan information not provide any types of loan or financing services you can take advice from here and go through this app.
- All calculations provided by this app are for information only and NOT to be considered as financial advice. Investors are required to make their own assessment before investing.
- This app is not working with any loan provider and is not related to any Financing/Lending Company.

description:
YONO SBI lets you Bank, Shop, Travel, Pay Bills, Recharge, Invest, avail IRCTC ticket booking, use UPI to transfer money, book movie tickets. With YONO SBI, convenience has a new name. 

Download YONO SBI, our mobile banking and lifestyle application from Google Play Store Only and experience its best-in-class features. Do not use any other websites. 
 
Registration process: 

YONO is supported on Android 12 and above from 01-03-2025.
Please read the OS version as "12 and above" in What's new content as well as under details in "Required OS" field at "More Info" and "Compatibility for your active devices". 
The OS version under these sections will be updated 12 and above shortly.
 
•Install/update new version of App from Play Store and open. 
•Allow all required permission (location, make/ manage phone calls). 
•Select SIM of CBS Registered Mobile Number (RMN) and allow for SMS permission and submit NEXT 
•An encrypted SMS with a unique code will be sent from the device to Bank’s VMN (Virtual Mobile Number) to verify the customer. Kindly note that for sending the SMS standard SMS charges are applicable as per your telecom plan. The SIM should have active outgoing SMS facility. In some devices, the user may have to allow sending the SMS from the outbox.  
•If there are multiple CIF's attached with same mobile number, system will prompt for the account number and DOB for finding out a unique customer by the mobile number. 
•If the customer is already having online banking facility of SBI, App will automatically prompt to proceed to register on YONO SBI app with existing user credentials (Online Banking User ID and Password). After entering User ID and Password, customer will receive an OTP on Registered Mobile Number. User has to enter the OTP in the app to complete registration with an optional setting of MPIN. 
•If the existing SBI customer is not having Online banking credentials, App will prompt to proceed to create INB credential using "Account Details" and "ATM Card" based registration process.  
•If Non RMN SIM is selected, user will land on account opening screen. If customer claims that selected SIM is already registered with bank, user needs to visit nearest branch with KYC for validating the mobile number in bank account. 
 
What YONO SBI offers you 
 
YONO SBI, SBI's latest mobile banking offering is an extension of our trusted banking legacy which gave India secure digital products such as YONO Lite and SBI Net Banking. YONO SBI puts India's largest range of products and services at your fingertips. 
 
•India's largest shopping marketplace -Exclusive discounts and offers for SBI customers across merchants who offer shopping, vacation bookings, flight and bus ticket bookings, train ticket bookings through IRCTC, food delivery and much more 
 
•Quick Transfer-Immediate fund transfer to new beneficiary up to Rs.50,000/- per day 
 
•One view- Link and view your relationships with all State Bank entities (Credit Cards, Life Insurance, General Insurance, Travel Insurance, Accident Insurance, SIP, Mutual Funds or investments) in one app 
 
•Your friend in need-Get Pre-approved personal loans on the go within 2 minutes, with no documentation at branches. 
 
•Liquidity on the go-Use this one click facility to avail overdraft against Fixed Deposit 

•Experience convenience: Request Cheque Books, ATM Cards/Debit Cards or use the emergency services to change ATM PIN, block ATM cards/Debit cards or stop cheques, through YONO SBI

Other pre log in features: 
• ATM/Branch Locator 
• Forgot MPIN? - To reset Login MPIN 
• View Balance - View account balance & recent transactions 
• Quick Pay - Make quick & simple payments.  
• YONO Cash- Cardless Cash Withdrawal 
•Loans - Apply for Home, Car, Education & Personal Loans 
•Investments - Open Investment account and make investments 
•Best Offers - Best Online Shopping offers 
•Lock App - To lock app access  
•T&C-Terms & Conditions 
•Privacy Policy 
•Helpline - Call on Helpline No.
summary: YONO SBI:Bank,Invest,Shop,Travel,Pay Bills,Recharge,use UPI to transfer money

Fatakpay Digital P. Ltd (Fatakpay) is renowned for our award-winning platform that simplifies credit and financial product access for salaried and self-employed, accessible anytime

Services Provided*
1. Personal Loans upto ₹2Lacs
2. Employee Financial wellness: Earned Wage advance offerings to corporate employees
3. Access to Digital Gold and silver investments
4. Access to Mutual funds
5. Insurance offerings
6. BBPS facility
7. Access to job portal
8. Credit score and credit report
9. Rewards and Offers
*Subject to terms and conditions

1. Instant Personal Loan App for Salaried & Self-Employed Professionals Apply for personal loans starting from ₹5000 - ₹2 lakhs & get quick approvals! 
Both for salaried/self-employed, Fatakpay will find perfect product offering and lending partner for your financial needs. (Loan will be approved and disbursed by Fatakpay lending partners - Fatakpay is a Loan Service Provider only)

Why Choose FatakPay?
- Personal EMI Loans: from ₹1,000 to ₹2Lac.
- Interest Rates: P.a - 12% to 42%.
- Tenure: 3 -36 months.
- 100% digital process & 10 min disbursal
- Rewards: Monthly cashback and savings on purchases through our merchant partnerships.

Data Protection & Privacy:
FatakPay is ISO 27001:2013 certified, ensuring encrypted data at rest and in transit. Customer data is securely stored in India with restricted access. Users can request data deletion.

description:
About this App :- 
The next generation online Trading practice platform 
Trade wherever you are using any Android device with the advanced trading app.

With the power of Android devices, you can trade wherever you are with your device. You can trade with ease using the latest technology involved during the development of the TradNow advanced trading system.

TradNow for Android allows you to trade at a glance so you won't miss a trade.

Some of the advantages you have with our App:
* Advanced and Simple Quotes views.
* Very high refresh rate for price movements.
* Very fast trading execution.
* Ability to trade with any script you want with ease.
* Ability to check your Trades, Orders, History.
* Switch between multiple accounts with ease if you are using Office login.
* Check your Financial Standing on any screen with the ability to hide it to give you more space to check data.
* News from many providers to check the latest news within the app.
* Dark & Light Modes available.

 Crypto Pump Finder (CPF) is a crypto trading assistant that gives you everything one crypto trader & hunter needs daily! From auto crypto analysis and crypto tracker or crypto screener pump/dump data to crypto portfolio manager with crypto price alerts and crypto signals, having CPF by your side is like having a veteran trader by your side giving you tons of useful data. Our proprietary cryptocurrency trading assistant system monitors the coin markets 24/7 on your behalf.

REAL-TIME MONITORING - Where crypto Technical analysis is not time consuming anymore

 📊 Our crypto pump alert app will monitor the market, 24/7. Crypto Pump Finder will notify you of purchasing opportunities based on common technical crypto indicators and oscillators. Also, this crypto pump detector app provides advanced interactive candlestick charts with crypto indicators such as SMA7, SMA25, SMA99, Ichimoku, MACD, RSI for mobile bitcoin technical analysis and Altcoins analysis. TECHNICAL ANALYSIS AND CHARTS 📈 Time Frames: 30 Minute(30m), 1 Hour(1h), 4 Hour(4h), Daily(1d), Weekly(1w) and Monthly(1M). 📈 Indicators: Moving Averages (sma7, sma25, sma99), Ichimoku, GoldenCross Strategy, MACD, RSI. 📈 Net Volume: Show buying and selling volume per timeframe. 📈 Unusual Activity: Show count for buying/selling volume sudden changes on market.

CRYPTO SIGNALS - Crypto ChatGPT

 Join the VIP signal crypto trading channels for crypto futures signals. View ratings for each crypto signals group on Telegram. Get free signals crypto indicators as a free user. Upgrade to premium to fully unlock the crypto pump detector app and get unlimited cryptocurrency trading signals for your crypto exchange. Unlock the powerful 1h Pulse tool by becoming a VIP user. ■ Utilizing Strategies: The trading assistant of CPF will examine real-time trading opportunities, including Ichimoku, RSI, MACD, SMA(7,25,99) indicators and GoldenCross strategy. ■ Notifications: Enable push notifications on CPF for new potential trading opportunities in the market. ■ Simple and Easy to Use: CPF makes advanced cryptocurrency trading easy; with CPF all the important remarks are available at the earliest released point. ■ Authentic Coins Check-up: CPF has an indefatigable eye on digital coins' performance 24/7 and keeps you updated with the latest value changes in the cryptocurrency market.

CRYPTO PUMP FINDER – CRYPTO SIGNALS APP FEATURES:

 ‣ Track your portfolio And crypto tracker ‣ Easy Trader: technical analysis, coin watch list, coin alerts ‣ Hunter: set notifications; see hunting and results for BTC & USDT ‣ Market Pulse: check market growth or decline for different coins ‣ Crypto signals: join channels and see reviews for each channel; set crypto signal notifications for each group; content, signals & results. ‣ Crypto events: calendar of upcoming crypto events with proof and source. Now it’s time to try this crypto assistant for trading analysis and crypto signals. ☑️ Download Crypto Pump Finder – Signals! Try VIP for free! _____ Unlike most coin signal apps, we are completely transparent! Contact us at cryptopumpfinder@gmail.com or join our telegram channels via @cryptopumpfinder_app and Website: http://cryptopumpfinder.com/

description:
Looking for urgent personal loan? RupeeRedee will credit money in your account in 10 mins following simple application process. 
 
NBFC Lending Partner: FincFriends Private Limited which is a registered NBFC with RBI. 
 
Why RupeeRedee : Chota Loan Badi Khushi 

 
⇒ Fast Loan Approval and Quick Disbursal: With 100% online process, get fast approval and quick loan disbursal. 

 
⇒ Loan for All Purposes and Needs: Loans to fulfil all types of credit needs including covering emergency expenses, consolidating debt, travel, shopping, bill payments, school fees and much more.  

 
⇒ Flexible Interest Rates and Tenures: Flexi personal loans with interest rates from 12% to 36% p.a., depending on your credit score. Also, get flexible tenure options of 62 days to 6 months for repayment of the loan. 

 
⇒Transparency and Security: We only work with RBI-certified NBFCs/banks which are guaranteed to be transparent, safe and secure. 
 
Our Loan Offerings: 
👉 Flexi Personal Loan - We offer personal loans ranging from ₹2,000 to ₹25,000 with short repayment tenures of 3-4 months. Documentation required for this loan consists of just a PAN card and proof of address 

 
👉 Personal Loan for Self-Employed & Salaried - Personal Loans for Self-Employed ranges between ₹2000 to ₹30000 with flexible repayment terms from 3 to 6 months. You need PAN card & proof of address to avail this loan 
 
Top Features 
✔Simple EMIs: Payback in 2-12 months at your convenience 
✔100% Online: The application process is completely paperless 
✔Complete Transparency: There are no hidden costs, all costs are mentioned on Application summary before processing of loan 
 

 
FincFriends Private Limited 

 
On Approval, get a direct bank transfer within minutes from our lending partner registered NBFC “Fincfriends Pvt Ltd”. FincFriends follow a dynamic risk-based pricing model with loan terms & rates described below 
 
Personal Loan Charges (Example): 
Loan Amount: From ₹2000 to ₹30000 
Minimum Period of Payment (Minimum Tenure): 62 Days 
Maximum Period of Payment (Maximum Tenure): 365 Days 
Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 36% to 160% 
Interest Rate: 2.5 % to 3% per month 
Processing Fee: Starting 10% of Loan Amount (Inclusive of GST) 
Service Charges: Starting 3% of Loan Amount (Inclusive of GST) 
 
 
Representative Example of the total cost of loan is provided in example below: 
Description All Amount are in INR 
Loan Amount: ₹11000 
Loan Tenure: 3 Months 
Processing Fees (10% Inc GST) = ₹1100 
Service Charges (3% per EMI% Inc GST)= ₹990 
Interest (32%)= ₹ 583.6	 
Amount Disbursed: ₹9900 
 
Repayment Schedule Below: 
First Instalment: ₹4191 
Second Instalment: ₹4191 
Third Instalment: ₹4191 
Total Repayment ₹12573 
 
Eligibility: 
Must be an Indian National with a Valid Pan Card and Aadhaar Card 
Must be over the age of 18 years 
Minimum Monthly Income should be ₹15000 
 
Steps to avail a loan: 
Install the RupeeRedee App 
Register with your Mobile no 
Enter basic information and verify your KYC by Aadhaar OTP or upload KYC documents 
Verify Bank Account 
Approved: Read & provide acceptance on the charges and Sign loan agreement 
Loan disbursed 
 
Documents Required: 
1. Address Proof {acceptable documents - Aadhaar} 
2. Selfie 
3. PAN Card 
4. Bank Account / Access to bank account details 
 
Why Rupeeredee Needs the following Permissions: 
 
Location - ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION 
Explanation: To collect and monitor the location of your device and access the serviceability of your loan application. This also 
helps in quicker credit risk decision and ensure KYC compliance as per guidelines of regulator 
 
Camera & Media Access - CAMERA, READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE 
Explanation: To capture KYC documents and selfie for liveness test and ensure KYC compliance as per guidelines of regulator

Queries:
Mail: care@rupeeredee.com

Address:
Vatika Triangle, 7th Floor, Mehrauli Gurgaon Road, Block B, Sushant Lok Phase I, Gurgaon, Haryana - 122002

description:
Securely buy, sell, and hold cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and PEPE (PEPE) with low trading fees. Used by over 240 million users worldwide, Binance is the largest cryptocurrency exchange* in the world.
Here is why:

TRADE YOUR FAVORITE TOKENS AND MORE

Trade over 350 listed cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), PEPE (PEPE) and Notcoin (NOT).
Track the market using price alerts and trade with advanced trading tools. 
Set up recurring orders (DCA) to buy crypto every hour, day, week or month.
Enjoy best-in-class liquidity on each crypto trade. 
Buy cryptocurrency and fund your wallet in minutes with flexible payment options, including credit/debit, bank transfers, and peer-to-peer (P2P) trading.
Find leading traders and replicate their trading strategies with one tap.

EARN DAILY REWARDS ON YOUR IDLE ASSETS

Earn rewards from staking, dual investment and yield farming. Reap the benefits of staking cryptocurrency on popular assets like Bitcoin (BTC) or Solana (SOL).
Use Auto-Invest to buy crypto and earn passive income at the same time. 
Support emerging blockchain and cryptocurrency projects on Binance Launchpad.**


SECURE, COMPLIANT, AND REGULATED CRYPTO EXCHANGE

Binance is the most regulated crypto exchange in the world, with licenses, registrations, and approvals across multiple jurisdictions. 
All user funds are held 1:1 in a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion. 
Our system is secured with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, strict KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption.

FAST AND SECURE KYC PROCESS

Binance partners with leading KYC vendors to provide a speedy registration process, so you can verify your Binance account and buy Bitcoin in minutes.


SPEND AND SEND YOUR CRYPTO BALANCE

Use the tokens in your wallet to buy flight tickets or shop at crypto-friendly brands.
Make secure crypto transfers from your wallet to your friends and family worldwide. 


EXPLORE THE BEST OF WEB3, CRYPTO, AND THE BLOCKCHAIN

Get tailored blockchain and crypto Web3 content delivered to your app. 
Earn crypto rewards by learning and completing quizzes on how certain cryptocurrencies work. 
Unlock the future of finance with the Binance Web3 Wallet, your all-in-one crypto wallet within the Binance app. Seamlessly trade your favorite tokens on-chain, access multiple blockchains, and explore top dApps without leaving your wallet. Effortlessly transfer funds between exchange and wallet, and navigate CeFi, DeFi, and Web3 with ease. Manage your cryptocurrencies, execute token swaps, and earn yields securely with our advanced bitcoin wallet.

ACCESS 24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Let us help you on your crypto journey, whether you’re an avid crypto trader or a beginner looking to buy Bitcoin.
Get help from 24/7 live chat customer support, available in 18 languages (English, Arabic, German, French, Filipino, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, Russian, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Turkish, Korean, Ukrainian, and Vietnamese).


*by trading volume - Source: coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges
**Region Limitation Disclaimer: This is a general announcement. Products and services referred to here may not be available in your region. Not investment advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
***Binance App is available only to non-U.S. citizens and residents. For U.S. citizens and residents, please install the Binance.US App.

Investment involves risk.

Binance Investments Co., LTD
House of Francis, Room 303, IIe Du Port Mahe, 28001
Seychelles


Still undecided? Download now and discover why over 240 million users choose Binance to buy crypto, trade over 350 cryptocurrencies, and securely hold their assets. The Binance App goes beyond your traditional trading app, enabling users to learn more about blockchain, earn passive income through staking, and spend their cryptocurrency.

description:
Kissht is India’s trusted quick loan app, which offers online instant loans, business loans, & a seamless experience. Whether you need funds for unexpected expenses or business growth, Kissht advance loan app provides you immediate financial assistance. 
 
What is Kissht App? 
Kissht offers online personal loans of up to ₹5,00,000 with minimal documentation. In just 5 minutes, you can apply for a personal loan and get your funds. Furthermore, Kissht provides competitive business loans to meet entrepreneurs' needs, enabling them to access capital quickly. 
 
Example of Unsecured Personal Loan
Loan amount (Sanctioned): ₹ 1,25,000.
Tenure: 24 months.
Interest Rate: 33% per annum.
Processing Fee (incl. GST): ₹ 8,850.
Total Interest: ₹ 47,467.
EMI: ₹ 7,184.
APR: 41 %.
Sanctioned Loan amount is ₹ 1,25,000.
Net Disbursed amount is ₹ 1,16,150.
Total loan repayment amount is ₹ 1,72,416.
Total Cost of the Loan = Interest Amount + Processing Fees = ₹47,467 + ₹8,850 = ₹56,317.
 
We work with RBI-registered NBFCs. These NBFCs are as follows:  
-Si Creva Capital Services Pvt Ltd 
-MAS Financial Services Ltd 
-Northern Arc Capital Ltd. 
-Piramal Capital & Housing Finance Ltd. 
-SMFG India Credit Co. Ltd.    
 
How to apply for Kissht instant loan? 
1. Install Kissht app  
2. Register with a mobile number & accept basic permissions  
3. Complete 100% digital KYC for an instant credit check  
4. Sign online loan agreements from approved NBFCs 
 
Why Choose Kissht for Your Instant Personal Loan Needs? 
Whether it’s for an emergency or business growth, Kissht provides instant loan & financial assistance with flexible repayment plans. 

Kissht stands out among loan apps by providing quick, reliable, and secure instant small loans. This is the cash loan app that can help you get a quick personal loan to manage emergencies or meet your financial goals. Further, Kissht offers a convenient online loan application process with transparent terms and competitive interest rates. Our low-interest loan and easy repayment plans make managing finances stress-free. 
 
The Expense tracker feature analyzes your transactional messages to provide insights into your spending habits, including summary of your expenses and income across categories. 

What Makes Kissht a Unique online instant loan app?
1. Easy Approval: Get instant loans online with minimal documentation in a fully digital process. 
2. Instant Fund Transfer: With The Kissht advance loan app, you can get funds directly transferred to your bank account. 
2. Safe & Transparent: Kissht prioritizes user safety and follows RBI guidelines for collections. Our processes are transparent, with no hidden charges. 
3. Customer-Centric: We adopt a human-first approach, ensuring a delightful experience at every interaction. 
4. Competitive Rates: Enjoy a lower-interest loan with flexible repayment options.
 
Our Commitment to Customer Safety 
All communication for payment reminders is done via registered landline numbers only. We never use personal mobile numbers, foreign numbers, or VOIP calls. 
Payments are collected only through our app or website. We never request payments to personal accounts or demand commissions on dues. 
Our collection processes strictly follow RBI and MeitY guidelines. All calls are monitored and recorded to ensure no threats or abusive language are used. 
The Kissht app respects your privacy — it does not access your Contacts List, and we do not contact your friends or relatives regarding loan repayments. 
 
 
Contact Us: 
1. Write to care@kissht.com OR call our customer care number on 08044745884 / 
08062816309.  
2. Share with us a screenshot or recording of the message or call.  Address: 10th Floor, 
Tower 4, Equinox Park, LBS Marg, Kurla (West), Mumbai - 400070 

Need quick access to funds? Download the Kissht loan app today! This trusted app offers online personal loans up to ₹5,00,000 with minimal documentation, competitive interest rates, and a seamless experience.

developer.name: OnEMI Technology Solutions Pvt Ltd
developer.legalAddress: 10th Floor, Tower 4, Equinox Business Park, LBS Marg, Kurla, Mumbai, Maharashtra, 400070, India

description:
RUBI application is oriented to be a social networking platform applying blockchain technology rules that can increase income for all users by interacting with the social network "RUBI Socialchain".

The "new theory" promotes awareness of digital assets and changes users' perception of the value of every activity from themselves on the internet.

Any user can join the search for digital assets with simple operations without any technical barriers.

Make friends, expand your social network, and drive digital asset income together on the platform.

Owning the platform's digital asset Rubi Block is like owning a kind of "user stake" on the social network Rubi.

Types of income

∆ Mining Rubi blocks
• Interact regularly with the app to mine the Rubi Block digital blockchain and sell it on the free market.
• Collect Mana - a kind of digital commodity entity that crystallizes from your interactions with other users' content, so you can sell Mana on the free market for money.

∆ Make money on the platform
• Develop and share content to add value to the community, generate income for yourself.
• Many other Social content you also get income with your phone simply you are there.

description: SBI Anywhere Corporate app is now Yono Business An integrated mobile application for SBI Corporate Customers Yono Business is a mobile application for corporate internet banking users providing common user experience to Khata Plus, Vyapaar/ Vistaar and Saral and other variants of SBI Corporate Internet banking. Corporate Maker, Authorizer and Enquirer can use this product for initiating payments and account management. CMP (Cash Management Product) Payments users who are availing cash management services of SBI for bulk payments can also use this same app for authorizing payments through this app and manage accounts. It is a safe, secure and easy to use application with host of features to SBI Internet banking users to operate their account on the move. Key features – (Khata Plus, Vyapaar, Vistaar, Saral) • Manage Accounts - View Account Summary (all account types) , Mini Statement and Add/Manage accounts • Initiate Payments (For Corporate Makers and Authorizers) - Fund Transfer – Own, SBI and Non SBI Accounts (NEFT, RTGS, IMPS) - Pay Suppliers – Make Payments to registered Suppliers - Bill Payments – View/ Pay and Schedule Bills and View Biller details • Open Fixed Deposits (e-TDR, e-STDR) • Authorizations (For Corporate Authorizers) - Transactions - Merchant Transactions - Cancel E-cheques • Enquiry – View e-cheque and e-TDR\STDR details SARAL Features: SARAL is a simplified single user product ideally suited for sole proprietorship concerns, micro enterprises or individual businessmen who require online transaction facility in their business accounts. • Quick Transfer • Mobile Top Up and DTH Recharge • Apply/ Edit/ Manage IPO • Add and Manage Beneficiaries • Profile Management - Change Account Nick Name and Display Name CMP Payments:- CMP Payments is for business entities availing cash management product of SBI. It helps the corporate manage their finances on the move. Corporate users can approve or reject payments for salary payments, vendor payments etc. Corporate Uploader, Approver, Authorizer and Releaser can access this app) Corporate Uploader - View upload status of the file uploaded by him Corporate Approver - Authorize transaction Corporate Authorizer - Authorize transactions and manage accounts. Corporate Releaser – Authorize transaction and manage accounts. Other Services:- Corporate users can acquaint themselves regarding different product offerings and services of SBI and raise service request for any banking services through Other Services product. Post submitting request, bank representative will give a call back to customer to take the request forward. Services Dashboard includes the following services with further sub menus: - Online and Offline collections services - Payments - Channel Finance - Trade Finance - Treasury - Additional Services CMP Collections :- CMP Collections product is an easy-to-use, cost effective, eco-friendly, fast, and secure cash and cheque deposit solution for SBI Corporate Customers. It facilitates corporate dealers/ agents to deposit cash and cheque by using Cash Collections and Cheque Collections options. The corporate dealers and agents can select the CMP collections product in YonoB app and access the application. They can use mobile number for registration and login using MPIN. Key Features - Raise request order for cash and cheque collection, - Track the order - View pending collections - Check cash/cheque deposit status - Activate expired transactions - Agents can view assigned orders and update the order status. For complaints and help: Please visit https://yonobusiness.sbi and select Contact us
summary: Mobile Banking Application for SBI Corporate customers.
title: Yono Business

extra.descriptionHTML:
SBI Anywhere Corporate app is now Yono Business
An integrated mobile application for SBI Corporate Customers

Yono Business is a mobile application for corporate internet banking users providing common user experience to Khata Plus, Vyapaar/ Vistaar and Saral and other variants of SBI Corporate Internet banking. Corporate Maker, Authorizer and Enquirer can use this product for initiating payments and account management.

CMP (Cash Management Product) Payments users who are availing cash management services of SBI for bulk payments can also use this same app for authorizing payments through this app and manage accounts.

It is a safe, secure and easy to use application with host of features to SBI Internet banking users to operate their account on the move.

Key features – (Khata Plus, Vyapaar, Vistaar, Saral)

• Manage Accounts
- View Account Summary (all account types) , Mini Statement and Add/Manage accounts
• Initiate Payments (For Corporate Makers and Authorizers)
- Fund Transfer – Own, SBI and Non SBI Accounts (NEFT, RTGS, IMPS)
- Pay Suppliers – Make Payments to registered Suppliers
- Bill Payments – View/ Pay and Schedule Bills and View Biller details
• Open Fixed Deposits (e-TDR, e-STDR)
• Authorizations (For Corporate Authorizers)
- Transactions
- Merchant Transactions
- Cancel E-cheques
• Enquiry – View e-cheque and e-TDR\STDR details

SARAL Features:
SARAL is a simplified single user product ideally suited for sole proprietorship concerns, micro enterprises or individual businessmen who require online transaction facility in their business accounts.
• Quick Transfer
• Mobile Top Up and DTH Recharge
• Apply/ Edit/ Manage IPO
• Add and Manage Beneficiaries
• Profile Management
- Change Account Nick Name and Display Name


CMP Payments:-
CMP Payments is for business entities availing cash management product of SBI. It helps the corporate manage their finances on the move. Corporate users can approve or reject payments for salary payments, vendor payments etc. Corporate Uploader, Approver, Authorizer and Releaser can access this app)

Corporate Uploader - View upload status of the file uploaded by him
Corporate Approver - Authorize transaction
Corporate Authorizer - Authorize transactions and manage accounts.
Corporate Releaser – Authorize transaction and manage accounts.

Other Services:-
Corporate users can acquaint themselves regarding different product offerings and services of SBI and raise service request for any banking services through Other Services product. Post submitting request, bank representative will give a call back to customer to take the request forward.

Services Dashboard includes the following services with further sub menus:
- Online and Offline collections services
- Payments
- Channel Finance
- Trade Finance
- Treasury
- Additional Services

CMP Collections :-
CMP Collections product is an easy-to-use, cost effective, eco-friendly, fast, and secure cash and cheque deposit solution for SBI Corporate Customers.
It facilitates corporate dealers/ agents to deposit cash and cheque by using Cash Collections and Cheque Collections options. The corporate dealers and agents can select the CMP collections product in YonoB app and access the application. They can use mobile number for registration and login using MPIN.

Key Features
- Raise request order for cash and cheque collection,
- Track the order
- View pending collections
- Check cash/cheque deposit status
- Activate expired transactions
- Agents can view assigned orders and update the order status.

For complaints and help:
Please visit https://yonobusiness.sbi and select Contact us

description:
This app was made to read public data on an NFC banking card compliant with EMV norm.

✔ Read multiple cards
✔ Store cards
✔ Read applications
✔ Track 1&2 data
✔ Extended history
✔ Export data
✔ Disable application launch with NFC

This application is an analysis tool to read contactless NFC EMV credit cards data.
In some new EMV card, holder name and the transaction history have been removed by issuer to protect privacy.
Be sure your card is NFC compliant (NFC logo printed on them).
This app is not a payment app and does not contain ads.
For security reason, this app doesn't access to Internet (No Internet permission) and you must confirm that you own the credit card before access to the application. 
By default, credit card number is masked.


Compatible EMV cards:
• Visa
• American Express
• MasterCard
• LINK (UK) ATM network
• CB (France)
• JCB
• Dankort (Denmark)
• CoGeBan (Italy)
• Banrisul (Brazil)
• Saudi Payments Network (Saudi Arabia) 
• Interac (Canada)
• UnionPay
• Zentraler Kreditausschuss (Germany) 
• Euro Alliance of Payment Schemes (Italy)
• Verve (Nigeria)
• The Exchange Network ATM Network
• RuPay (India)
• ПРО100 (Russia)

Banking card reader, credit card reader, NFC card, EMV

developer.legalAddress:
27 ter rue jacques prevert
63540 Romagnat

Looking for online payment apps that actually reward you? Download POP, India's most rewarding UPI payment platform and credit card app. No random luck, no useless cashback – just real, valuable rewards on every transaction.

For more details about POP’s online payment apps and features, visit popclub.co

Frequently Asked Questions

 POPcoins are valid for 365 days (1 year) from the date of credit.

Check your POPcoins balance in the POP UPI app by clicking the coins section at the top right corner of the app

description:
This version shows no ads.

IMPORTANT: If you want to use your data from the free app, please use the export function in the free app before you start the Pro app for the first time.

Description: Easy income and spending management for your family with "Our Budget Book": Keep an eye on your money in self-created categories. Create monthly bookings. Use the report page to see a graphical overview of your finances. Synchronize several installations of the app on different devices via Google Drive.

All features:
•	Plan your personal finances and keep track of your spending
•	Free categories for income and expenses
•	Material design
•	Synchronization across multiple devices with Google Drive
•	Various color themes
•	Report page with several diagrams
•	Optional Pin protection
•	Optimized for use on tablets

How to use Google Drive Sync:

When you hit the synchronize button the first time, the app creates the file "BBSync.bin" in your Google Drive. The file will be used for further synchronizations. You can move the file to another folder on your Google Drive and share the file with your family members so they can edit it and use it for synchronization too.

The permissions are needed for the synchronization.

description: Use the mPokket Loan App to get Instant Personal Loans of up to ₹50,000 in just a few minutes! mPokket is the best instant loan app for salaried professionals, self employed, merchants, contract workers and gig workers, and students with part time incomes. It is trusted by more than 3.5 crore Indians. Most secure Instant Loan App with 100% digital loan processing. So, if you are short of pocket money or you want to avail an urgent cash loan in case of an emergency or business or travel or for any other purpose, just login to mPokket app. ⭐️Key Features ✔ Instant personal loan of up to ₹50,000 ✔ Online cash transfer to bank account in 2 minutes ✔ Flexible repayment options; Repay in Easy Monthly Instalments from 6 to 12 months ✔ Rewards for timely repayments ✔ Processing fee starting from ₹40 + 18% GST depending on the loan amount and category ✔ Interest rates between 2% to 3.25% per month with a maximum Annual Interest Rate (AIR) of 39% and maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR) of 63.1% ✨Why choose mPokket? ✔ Trusted by more than 3.5 Crore happy customers ✔ One of the highest rated online personal loan apps (पर्सनल लोन एप्स) ✔Loans given by mPokket Financial Services, an RBI registered NBFC ✔ 100% digital process with minimum documentation and fast online verification ✔ mPokket offers a safe and reliable system with a strict user data policy ✔ Amount is transferred to your verified bank account only ✔ Best in class customer support Example of a personal loan calculation when you borrow from mPokket Loan amount: ₹25,000 Tenure: 12 Months EMI Interest Rate: 24% Per annum Processing Fee: ₹1,000 GST on Processing Fee: ₹180 Disbursed Amount: ₹23,820 Total Interest: ₹3,368 Other fee including GST: ₹29 APR: 36.3% EMI: ₹2,364 Total loan repayable amount is ₹28,397 excluding any applicable payment gateway charges 🏆Eligibility Criteria ✔ Age 18 + ✔ Should be a resident of India ✔ Should have a minimum household income of Rs.3,00,000 per annum ✔ Should be a salaried professional with minimum salary of Rs.9,000 Or, should be a student with part time income Or, should be self employed / merchant / gig worker or contract worker 📑 Documents Required ✔ Aadhaar Card ✔ PAN Card ✔ For students with part time income, college ID card and bank statements ✔ For salaried professionals, last 3 months’ bank statement, salary slip/joining letter ✔ For self-employed, small business owners, merchants or gig workers, last 3 months’ bank statements, company or business details and business proofs such as Udyam Aadhar, GSTIN, FSSAI certificate etc. Loans are given out by our RBI registered NBFC, mPokket Financial Services Private Limited. We store and analyze the transactional SMSs present on the user's device to assess his/her credit worthiness. 👤Support 📧 Email: support@mpokket.com 🌐 Website: www.mpokket.in 🏢 Address: PS Srijan Corporate Park, Tower 1, 1204, Sector V, Kolkata, WB 700091

title: mPokket: Instant Loan App

extra.descriptionHTML:
Use the mPokket Loan App to get Instant Personal Loans of up to ₹50,000 in just a few minutes! mPokket is the best instant loan app for salaried professionals, self employed, merchants, contract workers and gig workers, and students with part time incomes. It is trusted by more than 3.5 crore Indians. Most secure Instant Loan App with 100% digital loan processing. So, if you are short of pocket money or you want to avail an urgent cash loan in case of an emergency or business or travel or for any other purpose, just login to mPokket app.

⭐️Key Features
✔ Instant personal loan of up to ₹50,000
✔ Online cash transfer to bank account in 2 minutes
✔ Flexible repayment options; Repay in Easy Monthly Instalments from 6 to 12 months
✔ Rewards for timely repayments
✔ Processing fee starting from ₹40 + 18% GST depending on the loan amount and category
✔ Interest rates between 2% to 3.25% per month with a maximum Annual Interest Rate (AIR) of 39% and maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR) of 63.1%

✨Why choose mPokket?
✔ Trusted by more than 3.5 Crore happy customers
✔ One of the highest rated online personal loan apps (पर्सनल लोन एप्स)
✔Loans given by mPokket Financial Services, an RBI registered NBFC
✔ 100% digital process with minimum documentation and fast online verification
✔ mPokket offers a safe and reliable system with a strict user data policy
✔ Amount is transferred to your verified bank account only
✔ Best in class customer support

Example of a personal loan calculation when you borrow from mPokket
Loan amount: ₹25,000
Tenure: 12 Months EMI
Interest Rate: 24% Per annum
Processing Fee: ₹1,000
GST on Processing Fee: ₹180
Disbursed Amount: ₹23,820
Total Interest: ₹3,368
Other fee including GST: ₹29
APR: 36.3%
EMI: ₹2,364
Total loan repayable amount is ₹28,397 excluding any applicable payment gateway charges

🏆Eligibility Criteria
✔ Age 18 +
✔ Should be a resident of India
✔ Should have a minimum household income of Rs.3,00,000 per annum
✔ Should be a salaried professional with minimum salary of Rs.9,000
Or, should be a student with part time income
Or, should be self employed / merchant / gig worker or contract worker

📑 Documents Required
✔ Aadhaar Card
✔ PAN Card
✔ For students with part time income, college ID card and bank statements
✔ For salaried professionals, last 3 months’ bank statement, salary slip/joining letter
✔ For self-employed, small business owners, merchants or gig workers, last 3 months’ bank statements, company or business details and business proofs such as Udyam Aadhar, GSTIN, FSSAI certificate etc.

Loans are given out by our RBI registered NBFC, mPokket Financial Services Private Limited. We store and analyze the transactional SMSs present on the user's device to assess his/her credit worthiness.

description:
Trade Smarter, Invest Wiser with the PL Digi-Trade App!
Your search for a trusted stock market companion ends here. 
PL Digi-Trade app is powerhouse of unmatched trading features and capabilities. 
Leverage PL Capital’s (Prabhudas Lilladher) 80 years of market expertise and research – backed advisory with PL Digi-Trade App, a one-stop-shop for all your investment and trading needs. 
Enjoy award winning ideas, calls, machine driven screeners, and the ability to trade directly from charts. A powerful stock market app with an easy-to-use interface, minimal clicks, intuitive design for a seamless customer experience. 
PL Digi-Trade App is not just a platform; it’s a pocket-sized financial advisor that offers insights and guidance based on solid research. 
The app allows you to invest, trade and grow your wealth in the domestic share markets, US stocks, options, futures, commodities, currencies, ETFs, and IPOs. 

Why PL Digi-Trade App?
    • Real-time stock prices from NSE, BSE , MCX & Currency at your fingertips
    • Easy fund transfers via UPI/Gpay/Net banking
    • Actionable live charts for effortless trading
    • Powerful stock scanners for in-depth analysis
    • Lightning-fast trade execution with a single click
    • Access to PL's award-winning research across Technical, Derivatives, and Fundamental Ideas
    • Advanced Option Chain & Multi Leg Orders 
    • Customizable multi-asset watchlist
    • After market order placements
    • Margin Trade Funding
    • Smart portfolio insights and analysis
    • SIP in stocks & ETFs 
Open your Demat Account by clicking https://instakyc.plindia.com/ and kickstart your journey with one of India’s most trusted brands in financial services in just a few clicks! 
Visit www.plindia.com/digitrade for more information & Download PL Digi-Trade App for a seamless trading and investing experience.
About PL Capital
Established in 1944, the Prabhudas Lilladher (PL) group is one of India's most trusted financial services organisations. We serve 160,000 clients through 1,300+ partners across 200+ locations, catering to corporates, institutions, family offices, HNIs, and retail clients in India and across the globe. 
We operate in Wealth Management (Broking, Distribution, Lending), Asset Management (PMS), and Capital Markets (Institutional Equities, Investment Banking) businesses, and have been early adopters of Quantitative Investing in India.
Our unwavering commitment to integrity, transparency, and a client-first approach sets us apart. With our team of highly qualified professionals, we have built a value-added integrated financial services ecosystem where sound financial advice meets seamless experience and superior performance.
We’re listening: 
We are just a call away at 1860210222 or email us at customerconnect@plindia.com. Reach out on WhatsApp Chatbot, Lila, at +917400432222 for quick assistance.

summary: Accept UPI payments, order a SoundPod, get a business loan
title: Google Pay for Business

extra.descriptionHTML:
Meet Google Pay for Business, a simple and secure digital payment app made for businesses of all sizes. Receive payments directly to your bank account, order a SoundPod for instant payment audio notifications, apply for a business loan for up to ₹8 lakh, and allow new customers to discover your shop.

+ Accept payments from millions of customers, instantly
Let Google take care of payments while you run your business with a peaceful mind! Customers using any UPI app can make a payment to a Google Pay QR code, available for free by signing up on Google Pay for Business. Accept payments from customers using RuPay credit cards, and wallets as well.

+ Order a SoundPod for instant payment audio notifications
Multiple customers at your store paying at the same time can make it difficult to track payments. Google Pay SoundPod is now available to help you in this situation! Get loud audio notifications instantly, on receiving a payment, in the language of your choice.

+ Apply for business loans and supplier credit line
You can now apply for business loans & credit lines to purchase more inventory, renovate your store, open a new store, and much more! Business loan details are below:
Amount: From ₹10,000 up to ₹8 lakh
Lenders: ICICI Bank, DMI Finance, Indifi Technologies, ePay Later
Repayment period: 6-36 months
Interest rate: 15% per annum onwards

+ Allow customers to discover your shop on Google Search & Maps
While signing up on Google Pay for Business, you can also sign up to be visible by customers on Google Search and Google Maps, in a few clicks! Get discovered easily by millions of customers, and grow your business!

+ View customer reviews and ratings
Access all ratings and reviews shared by customers for your store, in one place. Get notified when you have a new rating or review.

+ Track how your business is doing
View your sales figures at a glance, which will give you useful insights to grow your business! Get daily, weekly, or monthly views of your transaction history.

+ Multi language support
Use the app in the language you prefer - choose between English, Hindi, Bengali, Gujarati, Kannada, Marathi, Tamil, or Telugu while onboarding and switch between them at any point in time.

+ Backed by Google security
Google Pay for Business protects you and your customers' money through a world-class security system that helps detect fraud and prevent hacking. If you ever need it, our help center and phone support are easily available.

Any concerns? We are here to help 24/7
We speak your language!Customer support is available in Hindi, English, Kannada, Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam, Marathi, Assamese, Bengali, and Punjabi.
Help center: https://support.google.com/pay-offline-merchants
Toll free number: 1800-309-7597
