description:
“Money Manager” is an optimized application for personal asset management. 

※ PC manager function 
You can view ‘“Money Manager” application using Wi-Fi. You can edit and sort the data by date, category or account group on the screen of your PC. In addition, you can see fluctuations in your accounts indicated on graphs on your PC. 

※ Applying double entry bookkeeping 
It facilitates efficient asset management. It does not just record your money coming in and out of your account but deposits your money into your account as soon as your income is input and draws money from your account as soon as your expense is input.

※ Budget management function 
You can manage your budget. It shows your budget and expense by a graph so you can see the amount of your expense against your budget quickly. 

※ Card / Debit Card management function 
Entering a settlement date, you can see the payment amount and outstanding payment at the asset tab. You can arrange the automatic debit by simply connecting your debit card with your account. 

※ Passcode 
You can check passcode so you can safely manage your account book. 

※ Transfer, direct debit and recurrence function 
Transfer between assets is possible, which makes your asset management more efficient. In addition, you can manage your salary, insurance, term deposit, and loan more easily by setting automatic transfer and recurrence. 

※ Instant statistics 
Based on the data entered, you can instantly see your expense by category and changes between each month. And you can see the change in your assets and income/expense indicated by a graph as well. 

※ Bookmark function 
You can easily input your frequent expense all at once by bookmarking them. 

※ Backup / Restore
You can make and view backup files in Excel file and backup/restore is possible.
Google Drive backup is supported.


※ Other functions
- Change of starting date
- Calculator function (Amount > upper right button)
- Sub Category ON-OFF function

description: Take Control of Your Finances with Money Manager Money Manager is the ultimate app to help you track and manage your finances easily, securely, and without hassle. Designed with simplicity in mind, this app allows you to effortlessly track your expenses, manage your budget, set goals, and organize your accounts, all in one place. • Income & Expense Tracking: Add your income and expenses with just one tap—quick and easy! • Customizable Dashboard: Personalize your dashboard by adding, removing, or rearranging widgets to suit your unique financial needs. • Reports: View weekly, monthly, and annual spending trends, and export reports in PDF or Excel format for easy sharing. • Goal Planner: Set and track financial goals. Monitor your progress and stay on top of your achievements. • Budget Planning: Create budgets for the week, month, or year. Keep track of your spending and control your finances. • AI-Chat: Get personalized advice and tips from Money Manager’s AI assistant. Whether it’s budgeting or saving strategies, AI has you covered. • Cashbook: Keep track of your cash transactions and manage borrowed money with the built-in cashbook feature. • Smart Reminders: Never miss a transaction with reminders for daily, weekly, monthly, or custom dates. • Account: Add and manage multiple accounts to track your assets and liabilities in one place. • Recurring Transactions: Automate repetitive entries like salary, EMI, or any other regular payments on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis. • Backup & Restore: Securely back up your financial data to the cloud or your device and restore it whenever needed. • Import/Export Data: Easily import or export data in PDF, Excel, or database formats, making it easy to manage your financial records. • Passcode Protection: Safeguard your financial information with a secure passcode, ensuring your data is always safe. • Bookmarks: Quickly access important transactions or data with the bookmark feature. • Multi-Profile Support: Manage personal, family, or business finances with multiple profiles. Switch easily between them. • Multi-Currency & Language Support: Track your finances in different currencies and languages, making it truly global. • Real time support: Get real time support and feel free to connect with us at budgetmanagerapps@gmail.com. • Ad-Free & Unlimited Features: Enjoy Money Manager for free with no ads or feature restrictions. Security You Can Trust Your financial data is fully encrypted and protected by advanced security features to keep your information safe. Download Money Manager Now! Start managing your finances with ease today and take control of your financial future!
